SA15arhebt2u:105_9: tasmiṃstathābhūte dṛṣṭe “sa” padārtho “yena” vastunā “asādhāraṇaḥ” samānasvabhāvo na bhavati tadrūpavikalasvabhāvatvāt “tadasādhāraṇatāṃ” tena tenātadrūpeṇāsamānasvabhāvatāṃ etadeva vyanakti /
SA15arhebt2u:105_10: “tataḥ” arthāntarād “bhedaṃ” vailakṣaṇyamanyarūpamidaṃ na bhavatīti “abhilapantī” abhimukhayantī dṛṣṭavailakṣaṇye pravartamānatayā “smṛtirutpannā pratyakṣabalena” /
SA15arhebt2u:105_11: yadi tu liṅgabalenotpadyeta vyavacchedaviṣayāpi smṛtirna syāditi bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:105_12: kiṃ viṣayā? / “atadvyāvṛttiviṣayā /” tacchabdena darśanaviṣayasya vastunaḥ parāmarśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:105_13: na tat atat vijātīyam / atasmād vyāvṛttiḥ atavdyāvṛttiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:105_14: sā viṣayo yasyāḥ sā tathā / athādṛṣṭa evārthāntarebhyo bhedo mayāpi kalpyate iti pratipatra (ttara) dhyavasāyāccaivamuktam /
SA15arhebt2u:105_17: kasmāt na pramāṇam? / yathādṛṣṭasyākāro 'bhyāsapāṭavādipratyayāntarasāpekṣo viśeṣastasya grahaṇāt /
SA15arhebt2u:106_1: pramāṇaṃ tu kasmānna bhavatīti parasya taduktapramāṇalakṣaṇavirahaṃ darśayannāha- “prāg” [Hbṭ_27] ālocanājñānodayakāle “asādhāraṇam” assaṅkīrṇarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā asādhāraṇamarthāntararūpaṃ na bhavatīti “abhilapataḥ” vikalpayataḥ “pratiṣedhavikalpasyāpūrvārthādhigamābhāvād” apūrvārthavijñānatāvirahāt /
SA15arhebt2u:106_2: apūrvārthavijñānaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ bhavatocyata iti bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:110_0: ityādi / tadetat kumarilavacanamāśaṅkya vidhivikalpasyāpi prāmāṇyamanupa(mapa)nudannāha- “arthakriyāsādhanasya” svalakṣaṇasya “ālocanājñānena darśanādadṛṣṭasya punastatsādhanasya” arthakriyāsādhanasya svabhāvasya “vikalpenāpratipatteḥ vidhivikalpo na pramāṇam” /
SA15arhebt2u:110_1: yadyapi tenānadhigataṃ sāmānyamadhigamyata iti varṇyate tathāpi tad arthakriyāsādhanaṃ na bhavati iti tadadhigantā taimirikādijñānaprakhyo vidhivikalpo na pramāṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:112_0: iti cocyate / tatra punarvastugrahaṇena nirvikalpakapratyakṣaviṣayasyaiva vastuno jātyādi viśiṣṭasya vikalpabudhyā(ddhyā)'vasāya ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:112_1: tasya ca nirvikalpajñānenaivādhigamāt na tatra prāmāṇyam,
SA15arhebt2u:112_7: yathā pratyakṣeṇārthakriyāsādhane pradeśākhyai dharmiṇyadhigate 'pyanadhigatasyāgnerarthakriyāsādhanasyāsāmānyākāreṇa parokṣasya svalakṣaṇākāreṇa pratipattumaśakyatvāt pratipattirnaivaṃ vidhivikalpena sāmānyakāreṇānadhigamarthakriyāsādhanamadhigamyate,
SA15arhebt2u:114_0: “arthakriyāsādhanaviṣayameva pramāṇam” netaraditi kuta etat? iti cet “arthakriyārthī hi” puruṣo yasmāt hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthī “sarvo” na kākatālīyanyāyena kaścideva,
SA15arhebt2u:114_1: “prekṣāvān” buddhipurvakārī “pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ vā” pramāṇādeva sarvadā pravarta(rte)ya apramāṇāt mā kadācit,
SA15arhebt2u:114_7: kuta eva tat prāpayet tat kathamavisaṃvādakatayā prekṣāpūrvakārī pramāṇamācakṣīta? /
SA15arhebt2u:116_0: yadyevaṃ sāmānyamapyarthakriyāsādhanameva tatastadviṣayo vidhivikalpaḥ pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ced āha- “na ca”naiva “sāmānyaṃ kāñcit” tatsādhyatayopagatāmabhinnajñānābhidhānalakṣaṇāmanyāṃ vā vyaktisādhyām “arthakriyāmupakalpayati” /
SA15arhebt2u:116_3: ‘tataḥ paraṃ punarvastu'; ityādi parairabhidhānādevaṃ bravīti darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasya pratyakṣapramāṇatāṃ nirākartum /
SA15arhebt2u:116_5: [Hbṭ_29] yat tu sāmānyamanumānavikalpagrāhyaṃ tat kāraṇavyāpakasambaddhaliṅganiścayadvārāyātaṃ sambaddhasambandhādanadhigatārthakriyāsādhanaviṣayāmarthakriyāmupakalpayatīti tadviṣayo vikalpaḥ pramāṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:116_7: atrodāharaṇam “yathā- nīlaṃ dṛṣṭvā nīlamiti jñāne” pratibhāsamānamiti śeṣaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:117_0: nanu ca liṅgavikalpapratibhāsi sāmānyaṃ prakṛtam tat kimanyadudāhriyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:117_1: sarvasya darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasya paropagatāṃ pratyakṣapramāṇatāṃ tulyanyāyatayā nirākartum /
SA15arhebt2u:117_2: kāṃpunarnīlamiti vikalpajñāne darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvini pratibhāsamānaṃ sāmānyamarthakriyāṃ nopakalpayati? /
SA15arhebt2u:117_4: atha svasādhyām; tadasiddham, abhinnajñānābhidhānalakṣaṇāyāḥ svasādhyāyāḥ karaṇādityāśaṅkayāha- “tadeva hi” yat tadālocanājñāne nopalabdhaṃ “nīlasvalakṣaṇam” nīlavyaktiḥ “tathāvidhasādhyārthakriyākāri” /
SA15arhebt2u:117_7: tena tathāvidhasādhyāṃ nīlasāmānyasādhyāmabhinnajñānābhidhānalakṣaṇāmarthakriyāṃ kartuṃ śīlamasya svalakṣaṇasyeti tat tathoktam /
SA15arhebt2u:118_0: evaṃ manyate- yathā bhinnā api vyaktayaḥ kayācit pratyāsattyā tadekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇayā tadekamabhinnaṃ sāmānyamupakurvanti,
SA15arhebt2u:118_4: tathā hi- anumānādike jñāne yathāvidhamasyāspaṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ pratibhāsate na tathāvidhaṃ vyaktiṣu dṛśyamānāsupalakṣayāmaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:118_5: ekameva hi vyaktidarśanakāle spaṣṭaṃ nīlādirūpaṃ vibhāvayāmaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:118_10: na ca sāmānyasya dve rūpe staḥ spaṣṭamaspaṣṭaṃ ca,
SA15arhebt2u:121_1: jāyate dvayātmakatvena vinā sā ca na yujyate //”
SA15arhebt2u:124_0: iti / ekatrāpi ca vyaktāvupalabhyamānāyāṃ sakalatrailokyavyāpi rūpaṃ sakalasvāśrayavyāpi vā dṛśyeta? /
SA15arhebt2u:124_1: na hyekasyāḥ kiñcid dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā nāma kṣaṇikatādivad /
SA15arhebt2u:124_4: na hi niścayaviṣayīkṛtaṃ cāniścitaṃ ceti yuktam /
SA15arhebt2u:124_6: na hi taddarśane [Hbṭ_31] tatsahacāriṇa upalabhyasya tadabhinnasvabhāvasya cānupalambho yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:125_1: na hi tāsu sāmānyagrāhiṇīṣvaspaṣṭo vyaktyākāra iva lakṣyamāṇaḥ svalakṣaṇapratibhāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:125_2: tadabhāve 'pi tāsāṃ bhavāt / ākārāntareṇa ca svajñāne[']pratibhāsanāt anekākārāyogād ekasya,
SA15arhebt2u:125_3: apratiprasaṅgācca / tasmānneyaṃ bhinnārthagrāhiṇyabhinnā sāmānyabuddhiḥ pratibhāti svalakṣaṇodbhavā satī /
SA15arhebt2u:125_7: na cāsyāstat sambhavati, leśato bādhakasyoktatvāt / vistaratastu syāvdādabhaṅgād yathāvasaramihaiva tatra tatra vidhāsyamānād bādhakamavadhāryam /
SA15arhebt2u:125_8: tasmād yathā vyaktayaḥ sāmānyāntaramantareṇa tadekamupakurvanti tathābhinnajñānābhidhāne api pravartayiṣyantīti tadeva nīlasvalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyasādhyatvopagatārthakriyākāri /
SA15arhebt2u:130_2: tā hi tena vinotpannā mithyā syurviṣayādṛte /
SA15arhebt2u:130_3: na tvanyena vinā vṛttiḥ sāmānyasyeha duṣyati //”
SA15arhebt2u:131_1: iti mithyātvaprasaṅgadoṣa ukto nāsau tathāgatasamayanayāvadātabuddhīn bādhate /
SA15arhebt2u:133_0: iti vacanāt ‘vyaktisvabhāvaṃ ca sāmānyam / na cāsādhāraṇam vyaktyudayavināśayordhyā(yośca) nodayavyayayogi';
SA15arhebt2u:134_3: prāgāsīnna ca taddeśe sā tayā saṅgatā katham? //
SA15arhebt2u:134_4: vyaktināśe na cennaṣṭā gatā vyaktyantaraṃ na ca /
SA15arhebt2u:134_5: tacchūnye na sthitā deśe sā jātiḥ kveti kathyatām //
SA15arhebt2u:136_0: yadi nīlasvalakṣaṇameva sāmānyasādhyārthakriyākāri tadeva tarhyadhigacchan vikalpaḥ pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha- “tacca” nīlakhalakṣaṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:136_2: tato niṣpāditakriye karmaṇyaviṣeṣādhāyi vikalpajñānaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:136_3: atha matam- sāmānyameva tarhyadhigacchan nīlavikalpaḥ pramāṇamastu /
SA15arhebt2u:136_5: yato nīlasādhyāmevārthakriyāṃ nīlena saha sambhūya kariṣyati /
SA15arhebt2u:136_6: vyaktisvabhāvānyeva hi sāmānyānītyāha- “na ca” naiva “tat svalakṣaṇagrahaṇottarakālabhāvino” nīlavyaktidarśanottarakālaṃ bhavanaśīlasya /
SA15arhebt2u:136_7: liṅgagrahaṇottarakālabhāvinastu pūrvoktena prakāreṇa vyaktisādhyārthakriyā sāmānyasya kalpitasya [Hbṭ_33] vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:136_10: na ca nityasvabhāvatāmābibhrāṇena nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyānyā vārthakriyā kriyate /
SA15arhebt2u:138_0: tadevaṃ ‘nīlaṃ dṛṣṭvā nīlam'; iti jñāne pratibhasamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ na kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayatīti prasādhya anarthakriyākāriviṣayasyāpi vikalpasya pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvinaḥ prāmāṇyaprasaṅgādativyāptiriti “tatrāpūrvārthavijñānam” iti pramāṇalakṣaṇe mīmāṃsakairviśeṣaṇamupādeyamiti darśayannāha- “tasmād” yata evamanarthakriyāsādhanaviṣayatayā darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasya prāmāṇyamayuktam tasmādasmadabhimataṃ “pramāṇamavisaṃvādi jñānam” iti pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ vyudasya “anadhigatārthaviṣayaṃ pramāṇam”,
SA15arhebt2u:138_1: “tatrāpūrvārthavijñānaṃ pramāṇam” “iti api” etasminnapyāhopuruṣikayānyasmiṃ(smin) “pramāṇalakṣaṇe” kriyamāṇe “ativyāptiparihārāya viśeṣaṇīyaṃ” viśeṣaṇamupādeyam /
SA15arhebt2u:138_3: anena hi viśeṣaṇenānumānavikalpasya ca prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyati,
SA15arhebt2u:138_4: ālocanājñānapṛṣṭhabhāvinaśca vikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ vyudasyata iti sarvaṃ sustham /
SA15arhebt2u:139_0: tadevaṃ vidhivikalpasyānarthakriyāsādhanaviṣayatayānadhigatasāmānyadhigame 'pi prāmāṇyaṃ nirākṛtya caśabdasamuccitaṃ smṛtitvaṃ pratiṣedhavikalpena sādhāraṇamaprāmāṇyakāraṇaṃ darśayannāha- “adhigate tu svalakṣaṇe” ālocanājñānena “tatsāmarthyajanmā” svalakṣaṇādhigamabalabhāvī “vikalpastadanukārī” sākṣādanutpatterddarśanasaṃskārādheyavaśaccāspa(cca spa)ṣṭanīlasvalakṣaṇākārānukārī dṛśyavikalpyayoścaikīkaraṇādevamucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:139_4: tadadhyavasāyaśca / yataśca kāryataḥ tadviṣayatvāt smṛtirevāto “na pramāṇam” darśanabalotpanno vikalpaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:139_8: tacca vidhivikalpe 'pi samānamiti kathamasau smṛtirna syāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:141_1: tathā hi- yadevānagnivyāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ mahānasādāvanubhūtamāsīt tadeva pradeśaviśeṣe dhūmadarśanāt smaryate /
SA15arhebt2u:141_3: evammanyate- yat mahānasādāvanagnivyāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ prāganubhūtaṃ na tat taddeśādisambandhitayaivānumānavikalpena smaryate kintu yatra pradeśe prāgananubhūtaṃ tatsambandhitayā /
SA15arhebt2u:143_1: pramāṇaṃ tu kasmānna bhavatīti ced āha- “vastvadhiṣṭhānatvāt” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:143_4: yadi vastvadhiṣṭhānā pramāṇavyavasthā kathaṃ viprakṛṣṭaviṣayāyā [Hbṭ_35] anupalabdheḥ prāmāṇyam iti cet;
SA15arhebt2u:143_5: tatrāpi pradhānādivikalpasyaiva bhāvānupādānatayā sādhyatvāt tasyā api vastvadhiṣṭhānatāstyevetyadoṣaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:144_0: atha vastvadhiṣṭhānaiva pramāṇavyavastheti kuta etad? ityāha- “arthakriyāyāṃ” sukhaduḥkhalakṣaṇāyāṃ yad “yogyaṃ” śaktaṃ “tadviṣayatvāt tadarthinām” arthakriyārthināṃ “pravṛtteḥ” prāptityāgalakṣaṇāyāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:144_1: yadi nāmarthakriyāyogye tadarthināṃ pravṛttistathāpi kathaṃ vastvadhiṣṭhānā pramāṇavyavasthā?,
SA15arhebt2u:144_2: arthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānā hi tathā sati syāt iti cet;
SA15arhebt2u:144_4: tato 'rthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānatvena vastvadhiṣṭhānatvaṃ kathaṃ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:145_0: idaṃ ca vastvāśrayeṇa pramāṇavyavasthāpratipādanamanadhigate svalakṣaṇa ityukte kadācit paro brūyāt- vastumātranibandhanā hi pramāṇavyavasthā na svalakṣaṇāśrayaiva /
SA15arhebt2u:145_1: tato yadyapyanadhigataṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ nādhigacchati tathāpyanadhigatavasturūpamadhigacchato vikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti tadasiddhatodbhāvanārthamuktam- “anadhigatavasturūpe”tyādi /
SA15arhebt2u:145_2: tadasiddhatodbhāvane cānadhigatavasturūpādhigantureva prāmānyaṃ netarasyeti kutaḥ? iti paryanuyoge “arthakriyāyogye”tyādi uktam /
SA15arhebt2u:145_3: tathā ca vastuviṣayamapi prāmāṇyaṃ bruvatā svalakṣaṇaviṣayamevoktaṃ bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:146_0: punarapyanubhavottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyamapanetumupacayahetumāha- “tato 'pi” yathoktād vikalpād na kevalaṃ nīlasvalakṣaṇānubhavād “vastunyeva” svalakṣaṇa eva “tadadhyavasāyena” svalakṣaṇādhyavasāyena anyathā tatra pravṛttyayogāt “puruṣasya pravṛtte” adhigate svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpo na pramāṇamiti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:148_0: yadi nāma tadadhyavasāyena vastunyeva puruṣasya pravṛttistathāpyanadhigatasāmānyagrāhiṇo 'sya darśanāt pṛthak prāmāṇyaṃ kimiti neṣyate? iti cet;
SA15arhebt2u:148_6: abhinnaḥ kṣema ālocanāvijñānādiva vikalpādapi svalakṣaṇa eva pravṛtteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:148_7: ayamasyābhiprāyaḥ- yadi vikalpo nirvikalpacetasaḥ prameyāntaraviṣayastadā tatraiva puruṣaṃ pravartayatu tatsādhyāmarthakriyāmadhigantum /
SA15arhebt2u:148_8: naiva vā pravartayet, tadviṣayatvābhimatasya sāmānyasyābhinnajñānalakṣaṇāyā evārthakriyāyā upagamād vikalpodayādeva ca tatsiddheḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:148_9: nahi nīlānubhavāt prameyāntaraviṣayāḥ pītādipratyayāḥ puruṣaṃ nīlavastuni pravartayanti,
SA15arhebt2u:150_0: iti / tato nīladarśanasyaiva nirvikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ yuktam,
SA15arhebt2u:150_1: na tadabhinnopayogasya smṛteriva vikalpasyāpi darśanāt pṛthageva /
SA15arhebt2u:150_2: anyathā niṣphalāṃ pramāṇāntarakalpanāṃ kurvataḥ smṛticchādveṣaprayatnādi pramāṇamanuṣajyata iti pramāṇānāmiyattā viśīryeteti /
SA15arhebt2u:152_1: na caivam, ato 'nekānta iti pramāṇasaṃplavavādī darśayannāha- “pūrvapratyakṣakṣaṇena” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:152_3: kutaḥ? / “nānāyogakṣematvāt” / tathā hi- pratikṣaṇaṃ viṣayaparicchedalakṣaṇo yogaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:152_7: yadā kṣaṇaviśeṣasādhye 'rthe hitāhitalakṣaṇe vāñchā prāptiparihārecchā yogināṃ paropakāramuddiśya bhavati kasyacit kathañcit kvacidupayogāt tadā /
SA15arhebt2u:152_8: yathā darśanamārge duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirddamānāmanuśayānāṃ vāsanāṃ nirodhayati,
SA15arhebt2u:152_11: tat eṣāṃ grāhakāṇi paracittajñānāni pṛthageva pramāṇāni /
SA15arhebt2u:152_12: parahitādhānadīkṣāvatāṃ ca samastavastuvistaravyāpijñānālokāvabhāsitāntarātmanāṃ bhagavatāṃ kaścidevārthakṣaṇaḥ kasyacideva parārthasyānugrāhako biabandhako veti sarvabhāvān pratikṣaṇaṃ vīkṣamāṇānāmadhyakṣacetasāṃ tadviṣayakṣaṇānāṃ bhinnārthakriyāsūpayogato nānāyogakṣematvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:152_13: tad yadi pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇavivekadarśino 'dhikṛtyocyate tadā bhinnopayogitayā pṛthak prāmāṇyāt nānekāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:152_14: atha sarvapadārtheṣvekatvādhyavasāyinaḥ sāṃvyavahārikān puruṣānabhipretyocyate tadā sakalameva [Hbṭ_38] nīlasantānamekamarthaṃ sthirarūpaṃ tatsādhyāṃ cārthakriyāmekātmikāmadhyavasyantīti prāmāṇyamapyuttareṣāmaniṣṭameveti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? iti darśayannāha- “sādhāraṇe hi” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:152_15: tatsantānavartināṃ sarvakṣaṇānāmekatvenādhyavasitānāṃ vyavahartṛbhiryat sādhāraṇaṃ pratikṣaṇamanyānyakāraṇatayā vibhinnamapi paramārthato viparyāsādekatāyābhiniviṣṭaṃ rañjanādikaṃ nīlādikakārtyaṃ tatra “na teṣām” uktareṣāṃ jñānakṣaṇānāṃ “sāmarthya” syārthaprāpaṇaśakte”rbhedaḥ” /
SA15arhebt2u:152_16: pūrvapratyakṣakṣaṇaviṣaya eva tebhyo 'pi pravṛtterādyasyaiva tatra prāmāṇyam /
SA15arhebt2u:152_17: tathā hi- arthakriyārthināṃ tatsādhanaprāpaṇasamarthe jñāne pramāṇavyavahāraṃ kurvatāmaviklavadhiyāmarthakriyāsādhanabhedādeva prāmāṇyabhedavyavahāro jñāneṣu yuktaḥ anyathā smṛtyāderapi prāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ kathamapākriyeta?,
SA15arhebt2u:152_18: ādriyeta vā niṣphalā pramāṇavyavasthā prekṣāvatā iti? /
SA15arhebt2u:153_0: keṣāmiva sādhāraṇe kārye na sāmarthyabhedaḥ? ityāha- “aparāpare” ca te “dhūmā”śca taiḥ “pramitā”śca te “sannikṛṣṭāgraya”śca teṣviva tadviṣayāṇamiva “anumānajñānāmagnimātrasādhye 'rthe” sandhukṣaṇādike vāñchite tadarthakriyāsādhanaprāpaṇavyaktibhedābhāvāt yathā prāmāṇyabhedo na yukto viduṣāṃ tathātrāpi /
SA15arhebt2u:153_1: yadā tu pañcatapastaptukāmo bhavati tadāparāparadhūmapramitasannikṛṣṭāgniviṣayāṇāmapyanumānānāṃ sāmarthyabhedāt prāmāṇyamanivāritameva /
SA15arhebt2u:155_1: ityudāharaṇe nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ nirākṛtya prakṛte yojayannāha- “etena” nīlasvalakṣaṇadarśanottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyanirākaraṇena /
SA15arhebt2u:159_1: pūrvakameva svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ yat pareṇālocanājñānamiti vyavahṛta tat pramāṇaṃ na tu tadvalabhāvī vikalpo yathoktena nyāyeneti sthitametat- “pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi pratyakṣato 'numānato vā prasiddhiḥ” niścaya iti /
SA15arhebt2u:160_0: tadevaṃ pratyakṣataḥ pakṣadharmaniścayaṃ bruvatā prasaṅgena darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasya prāmāṇyanirākaraṇāt
SA15arhebt2u:163_3: kasmād? yataḥ pakṣadharma eva tadaṃśena vyāpta eva ca hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ tasyāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:163_4: nānya ityabhidhānāt parokṣārthaviṣayaṃ sarvaṃ pramāṇamanumāne 'ntarbhāvitamiti saṅkṣepataḥ saṅkhayāvipratipattiḥ samyagjñānaviṣayā nirastā /
SA15arhebt2u:163_5: tathā, vyāpakāṃśasya gamyatvapratīteḥ tadaṃśavyāptivacanena sāmānyaviṣayamanumānaṃ na svalakṣaṇaviṣayamityākhyātam tasyāsādhāraṇatvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:163_9: tasyārthapratītirūpatvāt / tathā, tasya dvidhā prayoga iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt parārthānumānaṃ kathayiṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:164_0: satyam, prādhānyāt tu tadgrahaṇam / tatā hi- pradhānapuruṣārthopayoginastattvasya caturāryasatyalakṣaṇasyānumānata eva niścayāt tasya prādhānyam /
SA15arhebt2u:164_5: anubhūyamānaphalaṃ vā dṛśyamānaṃ tatpravṛttiviṣayo nispannatvāt phalasya /
SA15arhebt2u:164_6: tasmād yadanāgataphalaṃ sukhaduḥkhasādhanaṃ pratyakṣamapi tatrāpyanumānameva pravartakam /
SA15arhebt2u:164_7: na hi tasyānāgate sukhaduḥkhe prati yogyatāṃ pratyakṣaṃ nirddhārayati,
SA15arhebt2u:164_8: phalasya parokṣatvāt / taduktam- “ na hyapratyakṣe kārye kāraṇabhāvagatiḥ” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:165_0: tasmāt pūrvānubhūtasukhaduḥkhasādhanasādharmyāt pratyakṣaviṣayasyāpi vastuno 'nāgataphalayogyatāniścayaḥ na pratyakṣataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:165_2: kathaṃ tarhi dvayorapi pravartakatvam? “na hyābhyāmarthaṃ paricchidya pravartamāno 'rthakriyāyāṃ visaṃvādyate” ityuktam /
SA15arhebt2u:165_4: phalamanāgataṃ prati yogyatāyā anumānata ityubhayorapi pravartakatvam /
SA15arhebt2u:165_5: samyagjñānapūrvakatvaṃ ca hitāhitaprāptiparihārayoraktam na tvanāgataphalaṃ prati yogyatāyāḥ pratyakṣato 'niścayāt /
SA15arhebt2u:167_0: tatra svabhāvakāryānupalambhānāṃ pakṣadharmaniścayastulyopāyasādhyatayābhedenaivoktaḥ anvayavyatirekaniścayasya tu bhinnopāyasādhyatayā bhedenaiva nirddeśaḥ kārya iti svabhāvahetau tāvadanvayaniścayaṃ svapramāṇanibandhanaṃ darśayannāha- “anvayaniścayo 'pi” na kevalaṃ pakṣadharmaniścaya uktaḥ kintvanvayaniścayo 'pi “svabhāvahetau” ucyata iti śeṣaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:167_1: “sādhanadharma” sya yad “bhāvamātraṃ” sattāmātraṃ mugdarādinimittantarānapekṣaṃ tasya “anubandho” anugamanaṃ vyāptiḥ tasya “siddhiḥ” yā sa svabhāvahetāvanvayaniścayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:167_4: yatra yatra sādhanadharmasya bhāvaḥ tatra tatra sādhyadharmasyāpi nimittāntarānapekṣo bhava ityetasyārthasya siddhiḥ svabhāvahetāvanvayaniścayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:167_6: ? “tadbhāvatayā” sa sādhanadharmo bhāvaḥ- svabhāvo yasya tasya bhāvatayā tadbhāvatayā /
SA15arhebt2u:167_7: yo hi sādhanadharmaḥ sādhyadharmasya svabhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ taṃ nānubadhnīyāt,
SA15arhebt2u:169_0: nanu tatsvabhāvatve bhedābhāvāt kathaṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ? ityāha- “vastutaḥ” paramārthataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:169_1: sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpakāle tu paramparayā tattadvayāvṛttapadārthanibandhanāyāṃ kalpanābuddhau bhedena pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanabhāvo na vihanyate /
SA15arhebt2u:169_2: na hyasau pāramārthikaṃ sādhyasādhanadharmayorddharmiṇaśca kṛtakatvādau bhedamavalambate,
SA15arhebt2u:170_5: samavāyād vṛttikalpanāyāṃ ca kṛtakatvādayo nityābhimateṣvapyātmādiṣu varteran /
SA15arhebt2u:170_6: ya eva hi kṛtakatvādeḥ śabde samavāyo yabdalāt tatraiva tad vartate sa eva nityābhimateṣvapi,
SA15arhebt2u:170_7: tasyaikatvenopagatatvāt ityātmādau vṛttiḥ kṛtakatvādeḥ kena nivāryeta? /
SA15arhebt2u:170_8: atha ‘ya evābhūtvā bhavanadharmā bhūtvā cābhavanadharmāsthirarūpo bhāvaḥ tatraiva kṛtakatvādayo dharmā vartante ';
SA15arhebt2u:170_9: iti vyavasthāpyate / saiva tarhyabhūtvā bhavanasvabhāvatā bhūtasya cāsthirasvabhāvatā tadviparītarūpasamāropavyavacchedaviṣayāyāḥ kalpanābuddhernibandhanaṃ kiṃ neṣyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:170_10: tayaiva paramārthābhedavatorddharmayoḥ sādhyadharmiṇi vṛtteḥ kimantarālagaḍunā kṛtakatvādinā vyatirekavatā upagatena? /
SA15arhebt2u:170_11: tathā hi- na sattāmātreṇa kṛtakatvādayo dharmāḥ sādhyadharmapratipattinibandhanam,
SA15arhebt2u:170_14: sa ca vikalpaḥ svapratibhāsinamevakāraṃ bahīrūpatayādhyavasitamanusaran kṛtakānityādirūpatāṃ vastunaḥ pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt2u:170_17: tad varaṃ yadeva tatkalpanānnibandhanaṃ tadeva tathāvidhavikalpaprasavanimittamastu,
SA15arhebt2u:170_19: tadabhyupagame ca caritārthā vyatirekavanto dharmā ityalaṃ tatkalpanayā /
SA15arhebt2u:170_20: avaśyaṃ ca vyatiriktānityatādvāreṇāpi vastuna evānavasthāyinamātmānaṃ pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt2u:170_22: anyathā vyatiriktānityatayā nityatvāt tadavagamārthitvenāyamanityasādhyārthakriyārthī nityaṃ śabdādikamāśaṅkamānaḥ kimanityatāvicāraṃ prati āhītāsthaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:170_24: kimiti nitye śabdātmani? / tadvā(ddvā)reṇa pratipatteḥ iti cet;
SA15arhebt2u:171_2: asmākaṃ tu kathañcid bhedābhedavatāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā naiṣa doṣaḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:171_7: ekasmāt svabhāvādabhedāt / tato 'pi tayoḥ kathañcid bhedābhedau sta eveti cet;
SA15arhebt2u:171_8: na, anavasthāprasaṅgāt / tathā hi- dharmayostadekasvabhāvādapi bhedavatostena svabhāvena kathañcidabhedanimittamabhinno 'paraḥ svabhāvo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:171_10: na ca kalpanābuddhāvanantobhayarūpasvabhāvaparamparā pratibhāsata iti kimiti tatkalpanayātmānaṃ vipralabhante bhavantaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:171_11: kathañcit ca bhedopagamāt kathaṃ bhedapakṣabhāvināṃ doṣāṇāmanavasaraḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:171_13: imau dharmau, ayaṃ dharmī'; iti vyavasthāpyate yadi tena bhedastadā bheda eveti kuto 'nekāntavādaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:171_14: athābhedaḥ; tadā ‘ayaṃ sādhanadharmaḥ, ayaṃ sādhyadharmaḥ, dharmī cāyam'; iti kathaṃ pāramārthikaṃ tṛ(tri)tayaṃ sidhyet? /
SA15arhebt2u:171_15: tasmāt tattatpararūpavyāvṛttisamāśrayāyāṃ kalpanābuddhau bhedavatāmiva dharmadharmiṇāṃ pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:171_16: tanmātrānubandhastu vastutaḥ tattatsvabhāvatayaiva yuktaḥ iti manyamānena “vastutastadbhāvatayā” ityuktam /
SA15arhebt2u:173_0: kā punarasau vastutastadbhāvatā yayā hetubhūtayā sādhyadharmasya sādhanadharmabhāvamātrānubandhaḥ sidhyati? ityāha- “sā” vastutastadbhāvatā “sādhya”sya “viparyayo” vipakṣaḥ tatra,
SA15arhebt2u:173_4: tasya yā “vṛtti” pravṛttiḥ “bādhakapramāṇavṛttiḥ” tatsādhyatvācca vastutastadbhāvatāyāḥ sā bādhakapramāṇavṛttiruktā /
SA15arhebt2u:173_5: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ vipakṣāt nivṛtto hetuḥ sādhyadharmavatyeva dharmiṇi vartate iti sādhyadharmasyānarthāntarasya sādhanadharmasvabhāvatā sidhyati /
SA15arhebt2u:174_3: sa ca vastutastadbhāvatayā sidhyatīti tatsiddhyupāyaṃ bādhakapramāṇavṛttiṃ darśayati- “akṣaṇikatve” kṣaṇikaviparyaye sati “artha kriyāvirodhāt” arthasya- kāryasya kriyā- niṣpattistasyā virodhāt “tallakṣaṇaṃ” sārthakriyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasya “vastutvasya” arthakriyāsāmarthyātmana,
SA15arhebt2u:174_4: tattathoktam / arthakriyayā hi tatsāmarthyarūpaṃ vastutvaṃ lakṣyate /
SA15arhebt2u:174_8: tadanayā bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā sādhyadharmasya vastutaḥ sādhanadharmasvabhāvatā sidhyati /
SA15arhebt2u:176_0: evaṃ svabhāvahetau viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyasiddhito 'nvayaniścayaṃ pratipādya koryahetau pratipādapannāha- “kāryahetau” anvayaniścayaḥ iti prakṛtam /
SA15arhebt2u:176_5: yathāśabda upadarśanārthaḥ / “idaṃ” dhūmādikam “asya” agneḥ “upalambhe” sati “upalabhyata” iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:176_7: na ca kevalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvamasandigdhaṃ sādhayati,
SA15arhebt2u:176_9: yadi tad dhūmādikamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ satsvanyai(nye)ṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu dṛśyātmakaṃ sat nopalabdhaṃ bhavati agnyādisāmagrīsannidhānāt prāk tādātmyādisāmagryāmupalabhyamānāyāmupalabhyamānaṃ tatkāryaṃ sidhyati /
SA15arhebt2u:176_14: taddeśe cāsannidhānamiti, tritayamapākriyate / etāvadbhiśca prakārairatatkāryatā bhavantī bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:177_0: na cāgnīndhanādibhāve niyatasannidheradṛśyātmanaḥ kutaścit dhūmasya bhāvaḥ syāt ityāśaṅkanīyam /
SA15arhebt2u:177_4: [Hbṭ_46] pratibandhābhāvāt / pratibandhe vā tatkāryatā tatkāraṇatā vā syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:177_12: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānādeva ca dhūmasya tat kāraṇaṃ kalpeta /
SA15arhebt2u:177_13: taccāgnyādāvapi tulyam / tadapi tatra kāraṇamastu iti cet;
SA15arhebt2u:177_19: yato dhūmadarśanāt tanniścayena pravṛttau tadvisaṃvādaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:177_20: nahi sarvasattvakarmādhipatyajanitatve 'pi jagadvaicitryasya dṛṣṭakāraṇahānitastatkāryadarśanād vā pravṛttānāṃ atatprāptirityalamatiprasaṅgena /
SA15arhebt2u:178_0: kiṃrūpaḥ punarasau kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nupalambhasahāyapratyakṣanibandhana ityāha- “tadbhāve bhāvaḥ tadabhāve 'bhāvaśca” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:178_1: ya eva hi kāraṇābhimatasya bhāve bhāva eva /
SA15arhebt2u:179_0: sa hi tābhyāmanyo bhavan svabhāvato 'pratipannakāryakāraṇarūpayorvā bhaved,
SA15arhebt2u:179_2: yadyādyaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā sarvatraivākāryaka(kā)raṇabhūte 'pi vastuni bhavet tanniyamakāraṇābhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:179_6: yato nānyayogasteṣāṃ pūrvarūpaṃ nāśayati vināśahetvayogād vakṣyamāṇakāt /
SA15arhebt2u:179_8: nahi teṣu niṣpanneṣvaniṣpanno bhinnahetuko vā tatsvabhāvo yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:179_9: ayaṃ hi bhedo bhedaheturvā viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaśca tataścet na bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:179_10: anyanimittābhāvāt ekaṃ dravyaṃ viśvaṃ syāt ityādi prasajyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:179_12: tataśca pūrvake vastunī tadavasthe eveti na tayoranyayoge 'pi kāryakāraṇarūpatāpattiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:180_0: atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadā svabhāvata eva tayoḥ kāryakāraṇarūpatvādanyastadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ na vaiyarthyamanubhavet? /
SA15arhebt2u:180_5: nahi tad arthāntaraṃ svasattāmātreṇa tabduddhī pravartayati /
SA15arhebt2u:180_10: na hi yannimito yo 'nyatrātabduddhibhāji tabdyavasāyaḥ sa tadanupalakṣaṇe yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:180_16: [Hbṭ_48] niruddhayoradhyāhṛtya tatpratyayakalpanāyāṃ ca kalpitaviṣaya eva kāryakāraṇatādhyavasāyaḥ syāt na vastuviṣayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:180_20: hani tābhyāmasau janyate, pratyekajanyaśca kathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:180_21: yadā ca kāraṇena janyate tadā kiṃ svakāryasahito janyate,
SA15arhebt2u:180_22: atha kevalaḥ? / kevalo 'pi kiṃ svakāryāt prāg,
SA15arhebt2u:180_23: atha paścāt? / yadi svakāryasahitastudubhayoranyata eva bhāvāt parasparamasambandha iti kāryasambandhitāsya hīyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:180_24: atha kevalaḥ svakāryāt prāk; tadā kṣaṇikatayā kāraṇasya tameva janayitvā dhvaṃsāt kathaṃ svakāryakrīyā? /
SA15arhebt2u:180_27: atha svakāryaṃ kṛtvā paścājjanyeta tadāpi svakāryakāle eva vinaṣṭatvād asatastaduttarakālabhāvikāryakāraṇabhāvajananaṃ kutaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:182_0: teṣāṃ ca kāraṇatvamekaikāpāye kāryavyatirekataḥ samunnīyata ityāha- “satsvapyanyeṣu” tatsāmagryantargateṣu “hetuṣu” janakeṣu [Hbṭ_49] pratyekaṃ teṣāṃ vyañjanakatvād “asyābhāve” janakatvena nirddhāryamāṇatayā vivakṣitasyābhāve “na bhavati” ityanenānupalambhasya viṣaya uktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:183_0: tathā cāyamapi tadbhāve bhāvaḥ tadabhāve 'bhāvaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kiṃsādhanaḥ? ityāha- “pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ” pratyakṣapūrvako 'nupalambhaḥ tavdivikrānyapadārthagrāhipratyakṣātmakaḥ sādhanamasyeti “pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ” /
SA15arhebt2u:183_1: yastvanupalambhasāpekṣeṇa pratyakṣeṇa sādhyata iti prāguktaḥ so 'nupalambhapūrvakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sādhanamasyeti anupalambhapratyakṣasādhana iti vaktavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:183_2: “tasya” kāryakāraṇabhāvasyānvayavyatirekātmanaḥ “siddhiḥ” niścayo “yathoktābhyāṃ” pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryahetāvanvayaniścaya iti sambandhate /
SA15arhebt2u:184_0: nanu cānvayaniścayo nāma kāryahetoḥ sarvatra kāryasya bhavataḥ svakāraṇasattayānugamanamityevamavasāyaḥ tat kathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhirevāsāvucyate? ityāśaṅkya kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhinibandhanatvādanvayaniścayasya kāraṇe kāryopacārādananyopāyasādhyatāṃ darśayitum,
SA15arhebt2u:184_1: darśanamātranibandhanaṃ ye tamicchanti tanmataniṣedhārthamasāvevamukta iti darśayannāha- “kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hi” kāryakāraṇabhāve satyeva ‘
SA15arhebt2u:184_3: yastvavyatiriktaḥ tasya viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyaniścayādevānvayaniścaya iti pūrvamuktamevetyarthāntaragrahaṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:184_6: iti niyamena ‘agneḥ tatra bhāvaḥ'; ityevaṃrūpo 'nvayaniścayaḥ / yastvakāryakāraṇabhāve 'pi rasasyārthāntarasya rūpeṇānvayaniścayaḥ sa ekasāmagryadhīnatayā tasya svakāraṇāvyabhicāradvāraka evetyadoṣaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:185_1: atha yadi nāma kāryamagnerdhūmastathāpi kimiti yatrāsau tatrāvaśyamagnirbhavati yataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhinibandhano 'nvayaniścaya ucyata ityāha- “agneḥ bhāve eva” sattāyāmeva ‘
SA15arhebt2u:185_4: yadi hi yatra dhūmastatrāvaśyamagnirna syāt tadāgnimantareṇāpyasya bhāvād agnibhāva eva bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ kāryatvaṃ hīyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:187_0: idānīmanupalabdhāvanvayaniścayamāha- “anupalabdhāvapi” na kevalaṃ svabhāvakāryaheto(tvo)ranvayaniścaya uktaḥ kintvanupalabdhāvapyanvayaniścaya ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:187_1: kiṃrūpo 'sau? ityāha- “asadvyavahārasya” sādhyadharmasya yogyatāyāśca sādhyatvāt tadyogyatāsavdyavahāro 'bhipretaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:187_2: tasya, upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya yā “anupalabdhiḥ” tadanyopalabdhirūpā ta”nmātre” nimittāntarānapekṣaṇī,
SA15arhebt2u:187_4: kutaḥ punarasavdyavahārasya tanmātre vṛttirbhavati? ityāha- “nimittāntarābhāvopadarśanāt” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:187_5: yadā hyasavdyavahārasya yathoktānupaladbhivyatiriktaṃ buddhivyapadeśārthakriyāvirahādikaṃ nimittaṃ na bhavatīti sādhyate tadā yathoktānupalabdhimātre 'sya vṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:187_7: anyathā hi nimittāntarāpekṣāśaṅkāyāṃ satyāmapi yathoktānupalabdhau nāvaśyamasavdyavahārasya bhāva iti kuto 'nvayaniścayaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:187_8: nimittāntarābhāvastu vistarato vādanyāya ukta iti tata evāvadhāryaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:188_0: athavā savdyavahārasya yannimittamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sattvam tad asavdyavahāranimittādanyatvāt nimittāntaraṃ tatrānupalabdherabhāva upadarśyate yena pramāṇena tadevamuktam,
SA15arhebt2u:188_1: tena, sati vastuni tasyā asambhavaniścayād anupalabdhāvanvayaniścayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:189_1: tadevaṃ trayāṇāmapi hetūnāṃ yathāsvaṃ pramāṇenānvayaniścaya uktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:191_0: samprati trayāṇāmapi hetūnāṃ svasvapramānanibandhanaṃ vyatirekaniścayaṃ pratipādayitukāma āha- “vyatirekaniścayo 'pi” na kevalamanvayaniścayo yathāsvaṃ pramāṇanibandhanastayoruktaḥ api tu “vyatirekaniścayo 'pi kāryasvabhāvahetvo” ryathāsvaṃ pramāṇanimitta ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:192_1: yāvatadātmaka[tadātmakau hetū kāraṇavyāpakarūpasādhyasya sādhakau] sādhyābhāve cābhāvasiddhistayoḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:192_5: kadā punaste anupalabdhī sādhike tasya bhavataḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:192_6: “kāryakāraṇavyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau” pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ kāryahetau sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasya sādhikā,
SA15arhebt2u:192_8: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ svabhāvahetau sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasya sādhiketi /
SA15arhebt2u:192_9: tadevaṃ bruvatā ubhayatra tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇapratibandhaniścayādeva dvayorapyanvayavyatirekayoḥ niścaya iti uktaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:192_12: yadi kāraṇavyāpakāvupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptau bhavatastadā tadanupalabdhī sādhyābhāve 'bhāvaṃ sādhayata iti yāvat /
SA15arhebt2u:192_13: kadā punastayoḥ dṛśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇamapekṣyate? ityāha- “uddiṣṭaviṣayasya” uddiṣṭaḥ- kathito viṣayaḥ- ādhāro vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇo yasya sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasya tasyopadarśane kriyamāṇe /
SA15arhebt2u:192_14: tatrāpi [Hbṭ_52] kasmād dṛśyaviṣayatāpekṣyate? iti cet āha- “anupalabdhi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:192_16: yadānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ viṣayaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntarūpamupādatte tadānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptau tatra kāraṇavyāpakāvapi bhavata iti “anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyaḥ” kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā “kvacid” viprakṛṣṭe viṣaye sumervādau “abhāvāsiddheḥ” kathamābhyāṃ sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasiddhiḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:193_0: athānuddiṣṭaviṣayasyāpyabhāvasyopadarśane 'nupalabdhyorddaśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇaṃ kimitti nāpekṣyate? ityāha- “anuddiṣṭaviṣayam” anuddiṣṭo viṣayaḥ- vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntarūpo yasmin sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvakhyāpane tat “pratibandhamātrasiddhau” satyāṃ dṛśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇamantareṇāpi yasmāt “sidhyati iti” tasmāt “na tatra” anuddiṣṭaviṣaye “vyatirekasādhane” anupalabdhyo “rdṛśyaviṣaya tāviśeṣaṇamapekṣyate” aṅgīkriyate /
SA15arhebt2u:193_1: tathā hi- aśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa sāmānyenāpi bruvato yo yatra pratibaddhasvabhāvaḥ tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ sa tadabhāve 'vaśyameva na bhavatīti niḥsvabhāvatvāhetukatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA15arhebt2u:195_0: tatastatra dṛśyaviṣayatāpekṣyamāṇānupakārikaiveti na tayā kiñciditi bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:196_0: “pratibandhamātrasiddhau” ityanena ye pratibandhaṃ hetorna varṇayanti kintvadarśanamātrādeva vyatirekamāhusteṣāṃ tadasambhavaṃ vca darśayati /
SA15arhebt2u:196_1: tathā hi- asati pratibandhe yadi sarve sādhyavirahiṇo 'rthā dṛśyā bhavanti tadā teṣvanupalabdhasya sādhanasyābhāvaḥ śiṣyet /
SA15arhebt2u:197_1: “gatvā gatvā tu tān deśān yadyartho nopalabhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:198_0: deśādiviprakarṣitayā tvadṛśyatve satyapi tatra hetāvanupalambhamātrasya sambhavāt sandigdho 'sāva'śeṣe sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāvalakṣaṇo vyatirekaḥ tathāvidhasyaiva yatra yatra sādhyābhāvaḥ tatra tatra sādhanābhāva iti vīpsāpadābhyāmabhidhānāt /
SA15arhebt2u:198_1: anvayaniścayo 'pi prākpratibandhanibandhana eva varṇitaḥ tatastenāpi pareṣāṃ darśananibandhanāmanvayasiddhimicchatāmabhāvo 'syāpi kathita eva,
SA15arhebt2u:198_3: aśeṣadeśādiviṣayasya ca sādhyānugamasya yatra yatra hetuḥ tatra tatra sādhyam iti vīpsayā pratipādanāt /
SA15arhebt2u:198_4: na ca katipayadeśādau sādhanadharmasya sādhyadharmeṇa sahabhāvasya bhūyo darśane 'pi vyāptiḥ sidhyati,
SA15arhebt2u:198_5: asati pratibandhe kvacid bahulaṃ tathādṛṣṭānāmapyanyāthātvasyāpi sambhavāt,
SA15arhebt2u:199_2: kimātmako 'sau? ityāha “upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptād” vidyamānopalambhapratyayāntarād dṛśyasvabhāvācca “sataḥ” vidyamānāt sādhyābhāvarūpād “anupalambhasya” tadviviktopalambhātmano yo 'bhāvaḥ sato yadgrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadbhāvalakṣaṇastasya “darśanaṃ” darśyate- pratyāyyate 'neneti darśanam upadarśakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadātmako 'nupalabdhau vyatirekaniścayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:199_4: yadi hi sannihitānyopalambhapratyayo dṛśyasvabhāvo bhāvo vidyamāno 'pi nopalabhyeta kathamasau [Hbṭ_54] dṛśyasvabhāvaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:199_5: yo hi satsvanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati sa eva dṛśyasvabhāva ākhyāyate /
SA15arhebt2u:199_8: viśeṣābhāvāditi / prayogaḥ- yad yanmātranimittaṃ tatsmin sati niyamena bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:199_10: yathoktopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatāmātranimittaṃ ca sati vastuni tathāvidhe pratyakṣamiti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:199_16: tathā hi- kāraṇavyāpakayorabhāvaḥ kāryavyāpyābhāvābhyāmavaśyamanvitaḥ kāryavyāpyābhāvavyatireke ca tadbhāvalakṣaṇe 'vaśyaṃ vyatiricyate kāraṇavyāpakayorbhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:201_0: tadetāvatā granthena “pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto hetuḥ” iti vyākhyātam /
SA15arhebt2u:201_6: tān hetūna svena svena nāmnā kīrtayati- “svabhāvaḥ kāryam anupalabdhiśceti” /
SA15arhebt2u:202_0: kasmāt punaḥ trividha eva hetuḥ? ityāśaṅkaya trividhahetuvyatiriktānāmarthānāṃ hetvābhāsatayā hetuviruddhayā vyāptestriṣveva hetutvaṃ niyataṃ bhavatiti hetvābhāsatāṃ pramāṇavatīṃ tadvyatirekiṇāṃ darśayannāha- “atraiva” svabhāvakāryānupalabdhyākhye “trividhahetau avinābhāvasya niyamāditi” trividhahetuvyatirikteṣvartheṣvavinābhāvābhāvādityarthaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:202_1: tataścāvinābhāvavikalatvāt svabhāvakāryānupalabdhivyatirekiṇo 'rthā hetvābhāsāḥ prameyatvādivat ityuktaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:204_0: atha ko 'yamavinābhāvaḥ? kasya cāsau? kathaṃ vātraiva niyata ucyate? ityata āha- “yathoktā vyāptiḥ vyāpakasya”- tatkāraṇatayā tadbhāvatayā ca /
SA15arhebt2u:204_1: yatra tadvayāpyaṃ kāryaṃ svabhāvo vā sannihitastatra bhāva eva /
SA15arhebt2u:204_3: yatra tatkāraṇasvabhāvākhyaṃ vyāpakaṃ sannihitaṃ tatraiva dharmiṇi na tadabhāve 'pi bhāva iti yā vyāpakavyāpyadharmatayā vyāptiruktā sā “yathoktā vyāptiravinābhāvaḥ” /
SA15arhebt2u:204_4: kasya? / “pakṣadharmasya” / sādhyadharmidharmasya / “sa” evaṃrūpo 'vinābhāvaḥ “tṛ(tri)vidhād” yathoktād hetoḥ “anyatraḥ” tadvyatirekiṇyarthe “nāsti” /
SA15arhebt2u:204_8: yathā ca trividhād hetoranyatrāvinābhāvo nāsti tathā prāgevoktam /
SA15arhebt2u:205_3: anupalabdherapyanyad yathoktāyāḥ anupalabdhimātramupalabdhirvā pratiṣedhyasya tadanyasyāpi viruddhasyāviruddhasya vā /
SA15arhebt2u:205_4: tatrārthāntaram yadyanantarakāryaṃ tasyārvāgdarśibhiḥ itaravivekena lakṣayitumaśakyatvāt aliṅgatvam /
SA15arhebt2u:205_5: kāryadarśanāt vivekāvasāye 'pi sādhyasidyuttarakālabhāvī pakṣadharmatāvasāyo 'nvayānugamanaṃ ca vyarthaṃ /
SA15arhebt2u:208_2: nanu sāpi naivāsati pratibandhe yuktā viśeṣābhāvena sarvataḥ sarvapratītiprasaṅgāt ityuktatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:208_4: yathā bhūtasaṃkṣobhaḥ paścātkālabhāvino varṣasyeti hetudharmānumānena kāryaliṅgajaiva kalpayitavyā /
SA15arhebt2u:209_5: kintu sa virodhastadbhāve satyanyānupalambhādeva siddha iti taddvāreṇānupalabdhireva prayuktā bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:209_9: na cāparaḥ prakāraḥ sambhavatīti nāvinābhāvo 'nyatra vidyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:212_1: sādhyate yena tat sādhanam / taccāsau dharmaśca tasya bhāvastadbhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:212_4: tasmin / “svabhāvo hetuḥ” / sādhyadharmasya śrutatvāt tasyaiva svabhāva iti gamyate /
SA15arhebt2u:212_5: kathaṃ punarasau sādhyadharmasvabhāvo? yāvatā bhedena pratīyata ityata āha- “aparasmādaparasmācca” asato 'kṣaṇikācca yā “vyāvṛtti”stasyā yo “bhedaḥ” avadhibhedopakalpitastena hetubhūtena “sādhyadharmāt sādhanadharmasya” yo “bheda”stasmin “satyapi” “vastutaḥ” paramārthato “liṅgasvabhāva eva” sādhyadharmasvabhāva eva /
SA15arhebt2u:212_6: tathā hi- ya evāsato vyāvṛttaḥ sa evākṣaṇikādapi /
SA15arhebt2u:212_7: tata ekasmād dharmiṇo bhedābhāvāt sādhyasādhanadharmāvapi paramārthato naiva bhidyete iti /
SA15arhebt2u:214_2: yo hi yasya svabhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ tanmātrānvayī na syāt?,
SA15arhebt2u:214_3: nīrūpatvaprasaṅgādatatsvabhāvatā vā ityata āha- hetuḥ svabhāvo yasya sādhyadharmasya tasmin “hetusvabhāve” “sādhyadharme” sati “anvayavyabhicārābhāvāt” sādhanadharmabhāvamātrasya yo 'nvayastasya vyabhicārābhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:214_5: atra tu sambhava eva na vyabhicāra iti “viśeṣaṇamayuktameva /
SA15arhebt2u:214_6: tathāpi” svabhavahetulakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe yadetat “sādhyadharmasya” “tanmātrānvayena” sādhanadharmabhāvamātrānugamanena viśeṣaṇaṃ “tat paramatāpekṣaṃ” naiyāyikādīnāṃ vipratipattestanmatāpekṣaṃ na tu svamatāpekṣam /
SA15arhebt2u:215_1: tāmeva paravipratipattiṃ darśayannāha- “pare hi” naiyāyikādayaḥ “arthāntaranimittaḥ” janakādarthādanyo yo 'rtho vegavaddravyayogādiḥ tannimittam /
SA15arhebt2u:215_4: evamarthāntaraṃ nimittaṃ / tata eva “arthāntaranimittapekṣamāṇaṃ” kṛtakatvādibhāve 'pyabhāvād “atadbhāvamātrānvayinaṃ” tasya kṛtakatvādeḥ bhāvaḥ sattā saiva tanmātraṃ tasyānvayaḥ sa yasyāsti sādhyadharmasya anityatvalakṣaṇasya tadviparītam “api” kṛtakatvādeḥ “svabhāvamicchanti” yataḥ tato viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15arhebt2u:215_5: tena ca viśeṣaṇena tathāvidhasyārthāntaranimittasya vināśasyātatsvabhāvatāmāha lakṣaṇe viśeṣaṇakāraḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:217_0: tathā, “tasmin” arthāntaranimitte sādhye “hetoḥ” kṛtakatvādeḥ vyabhicāramanaikāntikatāṃ cāha /
SA15arhebt2u:217_1: atrodāharaṇaṃ “yathā hetumati vināśe” sādhye “kṛtakatvasya” hetoḥ “atatsvabhāvatā vyabhicāraśceti” /
SA15arhebt2u:218_0: nanu ca kṛtakatvasvabhāvatā anityatāyā bhedopagamāt neṣṭaiva paraistat kimucyate- “atadbhāvamātrānvayinamapi svabhāvamicchanti” iti? /
SA15arhebt2u:220_0: iti / tasmād dṛṣṭā api bhāvāḥ kenacidātmanā tadanyavyāvṛttena kathañcinniścitāḥ tadanyenāpyatadrūpavyāvṛttenātmanā bhrāntikāraṇasadbhāvādaniścīyamānāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:220_1: niścitāniścitayo rūpayoḥ pramāṇāntarataḥ pratibandhāvasāyāpurovartino 'numānato niścīyate iti anityatāsvabhāvabhūtasyaiva kṛtakatvasya vināśaṃ prati liṅgatā yuktā /
SA15arhebt2u:220_2: tathā ca vināśasvabhāva eva kṛtakatvākhyo hetuḥ tairyathoktanyāyādiṣṭo bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:221_0: syānmatam- kṛtakatvena sākṣad hetumān vināśo 'numīyate tataḥ prākpradhvaṃsābhavaviśeṣaṇā sattā tatsamavāyo vānityatā vyavasthāpyate /
SA15arhebt2u:221_2: vināśa iti ca na bhāvābhāvaṃ pradhvaṃsalakṣaṇaṃ manyāmahe /
SA15arhebt2u:222_3: sukhaduḥsvasādhane jñātvā yathārhaṃ pratipitsavo hi kiñcit parīkṣante na vyasanitayā /
SA15arhebt2u:222_6: anyathā bhāvāvilakṣaṇasya pradhvaṃsābhāvasya mugdarāderudaye 'pi tasya bhāve 'nupayogāt sa bhāvastadavastha eveti kathaṃ tadviśeṣaṇā sattā tatsamavāyo vā anityatā syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:222_7: avicalitarūpasya ca bhāvasya mugdarādikṛtapradhvaṃsābhāvaviśeṣaṇau sattāsamavāyau yadyanityatā,
SA15arhebt2u:222_8: kiṃ nātmāderapi? iti prasaṅga tadavastha eva /
SA15arhebt2u:222_10: abhūtvā bhavata eva ca yā sattā saiva kṛtakatvaṃ varṇyate /
SA15arhebt2u:222_12: abhūtvā bhavanopagame ca tadeva kṛtakatvamasthirasvabhāvatā ca vināśo 'stu /
SA15arhebt2u:223_1: tathā hi- ye yatra hetvantarāpekṣiṇo na te tatrāvaśyambhāvinaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:223_2: yathā vāsasi rāgaḥ / hetvantarāpekṣī ca kṛtakeṣvapi bhāveṣu pradhvaṃsābhāva iti viruddhavyāptopalabdhiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:224_0: nanu vāsasi rāgasya parimitahetutvāt tasya ca svakāraṇāyattasannidhānatvāt tadāśrayasya ca vidhurapratyayopanipātenāsthiratayā nāvaśyambhavitā yuktaiva /
SA15arhebt2u:224_1: na punarvināśasya, taddhetūnāmānantyādavaśyaṃ kasyacid ghaṭādiṣu sannidheḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:224_2: na ca vināśasyāśrayaṃ prāk taddhetusannidheḥ kecidupaghnānti,
SA15arhebt2u:225_0: tadayuktam, yato yadyapi bahulaṃ vināśakāraṇāni santi tathāpi teṣāṃ svakaraṇāyattasannidhitvāt tathā tatkāraṇānāṃ ca sa nnihitānāmapi virodhināmapyānatyāt tadbhāve tacchaktipratibandhānnāvaśyaṃ hetavaḥ phalavanta iti kaścinna vinaśyedapīti vyabhicāro [Hbṭ_61] na nivartate /
SA15arhebt2u:225_1: nanvayaṃ vāsasi rāgaḥ sāpekṣo 'pi yadi sarvatropalabhyeta tataḥ kimavaśyambhāvī na syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:225_2: syād, yadi tathopalabhyeta / sa tvanyathāpi gṛhyate / yadyevaṃ na tarhi sarvatropalabdhasya vināśasyānyathābhāvaśaṅkayā manasi kheda ādhātavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:225_4: yenaivaṃ vadati / tathābhāve vā kathamanumānavṛttirdṛṣṭe na vaiphalyamaśnuvīta? /
SA15arhebt2u:225_5: kasyacit tu hetukṛtavināśadarśane 'pi hetvāyattajanmanamanyathāpi darśanād upajātāśaṅko deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭeṣu kathaṃ tathābhāvaṃ niścinvīta? /
SA15arhebt2u:227_0: iti / tataḥ kṛtakatva vināśe sādhye tenaiva vyabhicāraḥ kiṃ neṣyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:228_4: tasyānumānenopalambhāditi yadyucyeta tadā tatrāpyanumāne vipakṣe vṛttimanupalambha eva hetoḥ kathaṃ nivartayati? iti yatkiñcidetat /
SA15arhebt2u:228_5: tasmāt sādhūktam- ‘hetumati vināśe kṛtakatvasyāsvabhāvatāṃ vyabhicāraṃ cāha';
SA15arhebt2u:230_0: idānīṃ yadyapi svārthānumānaṃ prakṛtaṃ tathāpi kaścit prayogadarśanābhyāsāt prayogabhaṅgayaiva pratipadyata iti svārthānumāne 'pi [Hbṭ_62] tatsvambhavāt prasaṅgena parārthānumānaṃ ca vyutpādayitumāha- “tasya” svabhāvahetoḥ “dvidhā” trailakṣaṇyapratipādako vacanodāhāraḥ “prayogaḥ” /
SA15arhebt2u:230_1: tameva darśayati- samāno dharmo yasya tasya bhāvaḥ tena “sādhya(dha)rmyeṇaikaḥ” prayogaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:230_2: “aparo” visadṛśo dharmo yasya tasya bhāvaḥ tena “vaidharmyeṇa” /
SA15arhebt2u:231_4: “yathā ghaṭādayaḥ” iti / yasya sattvakṣaṇikatvayoḥ pratibandhaprasādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ ghaṭādau pravṛttaṃ taṃ prati tatra smṛtisamādhānārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ na sādhyasiddhyartham /
SA15arhebt2u:231_6: na hyekasya tathā bhāve sarvastathā bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:232_1: tathāśabdaḥ samuccaye / vaidharmyeṇa ca prayoga udāhriyate /
SA15arhebt2u:232_2: atrāpi sarvagrahaṇaṃ vibhaktivipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam “kṣaṇikatvābhāve” sarvasmin “sattvā(ttvā)bhāvaḥ” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:233_0: prayogadvaye 'pi sarvagrahaṇasya phalaṃ darśayannāha- “sarvasmin sādhanadharmavati” dharmiṇi na dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyeva “sādhyadharmasyo” pasaṃharaṇaṃ “upasaṃhāro” ḍhaukanaṃ tena yā “vyāptiḥ” ‘
SA15arhebt2u:233_1: vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva'; ityādirūpā tasyāḥ pradarśanaṃ pratipādanaṃ tadeva “lakṣaṇaṃ” yayoḥ tau tathoktau /
SA15arhebt2u:233_2: tataśca ye sādhyadharmiṇaṃ parihṛtya bahirvyāptiṃ pradarśayanti te- yadyapi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sādhyadharmeṇa sādhanadharmo vyāptaḥ tāvatāsya sarvatra tathābhāvābhāvāt sādhyasiddhirayukteti- nirastā bhavanti /
SA15arhebt2u:233_3: sarvatra vā sādhyadharmeṇa sādhanadharmasya vyāptiḥ tadbhāve,
SA15arhebt2u:233_4: sā tathāvidhaiva kinna pradarśyate yenāsamarthā bahirvyāptirākhyāyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:233_5: na hi ‘sa śyāmaḥ, tatputratvāt, paridṛśyamānaputravad'; iti tatputratvasya [Hbṭ_63] śyāmatvena sādhyād bahiḥ paridṛśyamānaputre vyāptipradarśane 'pi sādhyasiddhirbhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:233_6: tasmād yaiva sarvopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptiḥ pramāṇasiddhapratibandhanibandhanā sādhyasiddhau samarthā saiva tatsmṛtaye pradarśanīyā /
SA15arhebt2u:233_7: na ca sarvopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptipradarśane 'pi dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmyapi tadaiva pratīyate,
SA15arhebt2u:233_10: tatpūrvikāyāṃ ca vyāptau anantaraṃ viśeṣaviṣayamanumānaṃ kathaṃ smṛtiḥ syāt? iti /
SA15arhebt2u:235_3: tatra hi kevalaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaḥ kathyate,
SA15arhebt2u:235_4: na tu hetau sati sādhyasya bhāva eveti /
SA15arhebt2u:235_5: naiṣa doṣaḥ / na hyatra sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvastuccharūpo darśyate,
SA15arhebt2u:235_6: tasya heturūpatāvirodhāt / vastudharmo hi sattvādiko hetuḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:235_8: yatastrirūpo heturbhavet / kintu nivṛttau nivṛttidharmakatvaṃ svagato dharma upadarśyate vaidharmyaprayogeṇa,
SA15arhebt2u:235_9: tathāvidhe ca sādhanadharme 'vaśyaṃtayā sādhyadharmasya bhāvaḥ pratīyata eva,
SA15arhebt2u:235_10: anyathā tannivṛttau nivṛttidharmakatvasyaivāyogāditi na vyāptipradarśanalakṣaṇatvaṃ vaidharmyaprayogasya na yujyate /
SA15arhebt2u:237_0: nanu dvividhe 'pi prayoge pratijñāprayogo nopadarśitaḥ tat kathaṃ tadarthāvagatiḥ?,
SA15arhebt2u:237_1: tadarthapratyāyanāya ca sādhanaprayogo 'bhimataḥ ityata āha- “atra” anayoḥ prayogayoḥ “pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrasāmarthyādeva” [Hbṭ_64] vakṣyamāṇakāt “pratijñārthasya” dharmadharmisamudāyalakṣaṇasya sādhyasya “pratīteḥ” hetoḥ “na” “pratījñāyāḥ prayoga upadarśitaḥ” /
SA15arhebt2u:237_2: paraḥ sāmarthyamanavavudhyamāna āha- “apradarśite” vacanena “prameye” sādhye “kathaṃ” na kathañcit “tatpratītiḥ” pratijñārthapratītiḥ “iti” evaṃ “ced” yadi manyase tadā svārthānumānakāle “svayaṃ” paraṃ pratipādakamantareṇa “pratipattau” prameyasya “ka upadarśayitā”? naiva kaścit /
SA15arhebt2u:237_3: svayameva tu sādhyavinābhūtasādhanadharmadarśanāt prameyaṃ pratipadyate tatha parārthānumāne 'pi tata eva tatpratītirastu kiṃ pratijñāvacanena? /
SA15arhebt2u:238_0: yadi svayaṃpratipattikāle na kaścit prameyasyopadarśayitā kathaṃ tarhi tatpratipattiḥ? ityata āha- “pradeśasthaṃ” sādhyadharmiṇi sthitaṃ “dhūmaṃ” sādhanadharmaṃ “upalabdhavataḥ” pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭavataḥ sataḥ “tasya” dhūmasya “agninā” sādhyadharmeṇa pramāṇataḥ pratibandhaniścayabalāt prākpratipannāyāḥ “vyāpteḥ” avinābhāvasya “smaraṇe” sati “tatsāmarthyādeva” pakṣadharmagrahaṇavyāptigrahaṇasāmarthyādeva pratijñāprayogarahitād “agniratra iti” evaṃrūpā “pratijñārthapratītirbhavati” /
SA15arhebt2u:239_0: syānmatam- tatrāpyasya karṇapiśācikādiḥ prameyaṃ kathayatyevetyata āha- “na ca” naiva “tatra” svārthanumānakāle “kaścit” karṇapiśācikadiradṛśyo “‘
SA15arhebt2u:239_1: agniratra'- iti” evam “asmai” pratipatre(tre) prameyaṃ “nivedayati” kathayati /
SA15arhebt2u:239_3: tathā hi- vayamapi pradeśasthadhūmadarśanāt tasyāgninā vyāptismaraṇasāpekṣādagniṃ pratipadyāmahe /
SA15arhebt2u:239_5: agniratra'; iti, bhavati ca tatpratipattiḥ, tathā tadanyasyāpi sā yuktarūpaiveti /
SA15arhebt2u:240_0: yadyapi na kaścit nivedayati tathāpi svayameva prameyaṃ vyavasthāpya tatpratipattaye liṅgamanusariṣyatīti cet,
SA15arhebt2u:240_1: āha- “nāpi” na kevalaṃ na kaścit nivedayati “svayamapi prāgeva” liṅgavyāpārāt na pratipadyate “kiñcid” agnyādikam /
SA15arhebt2u:240_6: atha liṅgamantareṇāpyevaṃ pratītirbhavatiti brūyāt tadā pratītāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ liṅgasya vaiyarthyam,
SA15arhebt2u:240_8: tena vinā tatpratipattau kathamasya niṣprayojanatā na syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:241_0: atyantamūḍhatāṃ ca parasya darśayannāha- “svayameva” svatantra eva ‘
SA15arhebt2u:241_3: “akasmāt” pramāṇamantareṇa vyavasthāpanāt “tatpratipattaye” nirnimittavyavasthāpitaprameyapratipattyarthaṃ “paścāt” “liṅgaṃ” tannimittam “anusaratīti ko 'yaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ” paripāṭiḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:241_7: yattalloke gīyate- śīro muṇḍayitvā nakṣatraṃ pṛcchatīti tattulyatvādasya kramasya /
SA15arhebt2u:241_9: tacca pratipādakaṃ kathitemaveti na kiñcit prameyanirddeśena /
SA15arhebt2u:242_0: yadi nāma svārthānumānakāle svayameva sādhyaṃ pratipadyate tad yuktameva,
SA15arhebt2u:242_2: parārthānumāne tu parato yathā liṅgaṃ pratyeti tathā prameyamapi parata eva pratyetavyam /
SA15arhebt2u:242_3: ato yukta eva pratijñāprayoga ityata āha- “pareṇāpi” na kevalaṃ svayameva prāg vyavasthāpyamānaṃ plavate pareṇāpi vādinā “tat” prameyam “ucyamānaṃ plavat eva” tadvacanasya sandigdhārthabhidhāyakatayā sādhyaniścayānaṅgatvāt prameyagāmbhīryānavāgāhinaḥ paramparayāpyatatsambaddhasya vivakṣāmātranibandhanatayoparyevāvasthāpanāt /
SA15arhebt2u:242_4: kasmāt plavate? iti cet, “upayogābhāvāt” nāsya sādhyapratītiṃ prati kaścidupayogaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:243_1: parastūpayogamātraṃ kadācid brūyād ityāśaṅkayāha- “viṣayopadarśanaṃ” hetoryo viṣayaḥ sādhyaṃ tadupadarśanaṃ pratijñāvacanasyopayogaḥ “cet matam” /
SA15arhebt2u:243_2: atrāha “tenaiva” viṣayeṇa, “tāva”cchabdaḥ krame / viṣayasyopadarśyamānasyārthavattāyāṃ tadupadarśanaṃ pratijñāvacanasya prayojanaṃ bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:244_3: yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam'; ityukte ‘kimayaṃ sādharmyavāna prayogaḥ? uta vaidharmyavān?';
SA15arhebt2u:244_4: iti na jñāyeta / ubhayaṃ hyatrāśaṅkyate- kṛtakatvenānityatve sādhye sādharmyavān,
SA15arhebt2u:244_6: ‘anityaḥ śabdaḥ'; ‘akṛtako vā iti tu pratijñāvacane satyubhayamasandigdhamavagamyate /
SA15arhebt2u:244_9: anityaḥ śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvāt'; iti hetubhāvaḥ pratīyate, ‘nityaḥ, kṛtakatvāt'; iti viruddhatā, ‘pratyatnānantarīyakaḥ kṛtakatvāt';
SA15arhebt2u:244_12: sati pratijñāvacane avayave samudāyopacārāt sādhyadharmī pakṣa iti tatra vṛttasya kṛtakatvasya pakṣadharmatvaṃ;
SA15arhebt2u:244_13: sādhyadharmasāmānyena ca samāno 'rthaḥ sapakṣa iti tatra vartamānasya sapakṣe sattvam;
SA15arhebt2u:244_14: na sapakṣo 'sapakṣa iti sādhyadharmavirahiṇyavṛttasyāsapakṣe 'pyasattvaṃ pratīyeta ityāśaṅkayāha- “yadi pratīti” sādhyasya niścayalakṣaṇā sādharmyavatprayogādeśca svarūpāvadhāraṇātmikā /
SA15arhebt2u:244_15: “anyathā” pratijñāvacanamantareṇa “na syāt tadā” yaduktaṃ sādhyasidhyarthaṃ sādharmyavatprayogādijñānārthaṃ ca viṣayopadarśanam iti tat “sarvaṃ śobheta” yāvatā svarthānumānakāle pratijñāvacanamantareṇāpi pakṣadharmagrahaṇa sambandhasmaraṇataḥ sādhyasiddhilakṣaṇā bhavatyeva pratītiḥ ityākhyātameva /
SA15arhebt2u:244_17: [Hbṭ_67] yata evaṃ “tasmāt” “eṣa” pratijñāprayogavādī yadā svayaṃ sādhyaṃ pratyeti tadā svayaṃ sādhyasya “pratītau” viṣaya upasthāpyate yena pratijñāvacanadvāreṇa puṃsā “kenacit” tena “vināpi” “pratiyan” sādhyaṃ niścinvan liṅgasāmarthyadeva /
SA15arhebt2u:244_18: yadāsmābhiḥ pratipādyate tadā “asmān kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā vyaktaṃ” pratijñāprayogalakṣaṇaṃ “mūlyaṃ mṛgayate” /
SA15arhebt2u:244_20: yathā dakṣiṇāmantareṇāpyanyadā aurdhvarathiko brāhmaṇo bhuñjāno 'nyadā śrāddhādiparvaṇyarthinaṃ śraddhāluṃ bravīti- yadi me ghṛtapūraṃ ghṛtapūraṃ prati rūpakaṃ dadāsi tato 'haṃ bhuñje nānyatheti /
SA15arhebt2u:245_0: kiñca, yadapi bravīṣi- parārthānumānakāle yathā liṅgaṃ pareṇānabhidhīyamānaṃ na pratyeti pratipādyastathā sādhyamapīti /
SA15arhebt2u:245_1: tadaitad yujyate yadyasau vādivacanamātreṇa liṅgamapi niścitya tadanusāreṇa sādhyamavagacchet,
SA15arhebt2u:245_2: parapratītyarthinaśca tadā vayamapi pratijñāṃ kinna prayuñjmahe liṅgavacanarahitām? /
SA15arhebt2u:245_5: na caitadasti, yataḥ “asmadvacanādapi” na kevalaṃ svārthānumānakāle asmadvacanamantareṇa ityapiśabdaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:245_6: kintu yadāpyasmadvacanaṃ pravṛttaṃ tadāpi “naiva” asmadvacanāt “liṅgamapi pratyeti” kuta eva sādhyasiddhye 'nusariṣyati? /
SA15arhebt2u:245_7: api tu svayamasya yadi talliṅgaṃ kutaścit pramāṇataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati “asmadvacanena tu” kevalaṃ tatra “smṛtisamādhānamātraṃ kriyate” /
SA15arhebt2u:245_8: tadā svayaṃ siddhameva liṅgamanusṛtya sādhyaṃ pratyeti /
SA15arhebt2u:245_13: tataḥ sādhyapratītiṃ ca prati viśeṣābhāvāt pratijñopanyāsaḥ parārthānumāne 'pi vyartha eva /
SA15arhebt2u:245_14: liṅgamapi hi tāvadatra nābhidhīyate yadi tat [Hbṭ_68] pūrvaprasiddhaṃ svayamanusmaret kimaṅga punaḥ sandigdhārthābhidhāyakaṃ pratijñāvacanamupādīyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:246_0: syānmatam- yadi nāma sādhyasiddhau pratijñāvacanasya nopayogastadartho 'sya prayogo mā bhūta,
SA15arhebt2u:246_2: tasyānyathā pratītyabhāvāt ityata āha- “dṛṣṭā ca sādharmyavatprayogādeḥ pratijñāvacanamantarenāpi pratītiḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:247_0: kutaḥ punaḥ sādharmyavatprayogāderasati sādhyanirddeśe pratītiḥ? ityāha- pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrāditi” /
SA15arhebt2u:247_5: tatra yadi ‘kṛtakaśca śabdaḥ'; iti brūyāt tadā sādhya(dha)rmyavatprayogapratītiḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:247_6: atha ‘nityaśca'; ityabhidadhyāt tadā vaidharmyavata iti sambandhavacanapūrvakāt pakṣadharmavacanāt prayogadvayāvagatiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:248_1: yadā tu sambandhavacanamapi kriyate tadā kathamapratītiḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:248_2: tathā hi- ‘yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam'; iti pakṣadharmavacane satyukte heturavagamyate,
SA15arhebt2u:248_4: ‘yatkṛtakaṃ tannityam'; ityabhidhāne viruddhaḥ, viparyayavyāpteḥ / ‘yat kṛtakaṃ tat prayatnānantarīyakam';
SA15arhebt2u:249_2: yatra ca vyāpyo dharmo dharmiṇyupasaṃhriyate sa vyāpakādharmaviśiṣṭatayāvagamyamānaḥ sādhyasamudāyaikadeśatayā pakṣa ityupasaṃhṛtasya vyāpyadharmasya pakṣadharmatvāvagatiḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:249_3: sā ca vyāptiryatra dharmiṇyupadarśyate sa sādhyadharmasāmānyena samāno 'rthaḥ sapakṣaḥ pratīyata iti sapakṣe [Hbṭ_69] sattvamavagamyate,
SA15arhebt2u:249_4: sāmarthyācca vyāpakanivṛttau vyāpyanivṛttiryatrāvasīyate so 'sapakṣa ityasapakṣe 'pyasatva(ttva)mapi niścīyata iti,
SA15arhebt2u:249_7: tathā hi- yat kvacid dṛṣṭaṃ tasya yatra pratibandhaḥ tadvidastasya tad gamakaṃ tatra iti hi loke vastugatirbhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:249_9: tatra yatheṣṭaṃ śāstrakārā gamakarūpapratipattaye svasaṅketenānyathā vā lakṣaṇaṃ praṇayantu /
SA15arhebt2u:249_11: tatsaṅketapratipāditameva tu yathoktaṃ gamakaṃ rūpamupayogi vyavahartṝṇām /
SA15arhebt2u:249_12: taccet pratipannaṃ tāvataiva sādhyasiddhiḥ sañjātā iti pakṣasapakṣādisaṅketāparijñāne 'pi na kiñcit plūyate /
SA15arhebt2u:249_15: svaprajñāparādhāstu tatrāpi kaiścidasanta eva doṣāḥ prakīrtyanta iti kimatra brūmaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:249_16: “tasmāt” sādharmyavatprayogādijñānārthamapi pratijñāvacanaṃ pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātra eva yathoktena prakāreṇa pratīterayuktamiti “kastasya” pratijñāvacanasya “upayogaḥ” naivaṃ kaścit /
SA15arhebt2u:250_0: svayaṃ cāyaṃ vādī yena krameṇānumeyaṃ pratipannavāṃstamullaṅghya parapratipattaye kramāntaramāśrayan pravañcakatayā dhūrta eva pratīyate,
SA15arhebt2u:250_2: yathātmano niścayasyotpādanaṃ kṛtaṃ tathaiva “anyeṣāmapi niścayotpādā(da)nāya” ca parahitanirataiḥ “sādhanamucyate”,
SA15arhebt2u:250_3: “tatra” etasmiṃ(smin) nyāye sati svayamayaṃ vādī “prameyasyopadarśanena” upadarśakena vacanena “vināpi” svārthānumānakāle “pratipadya” prameyaṃ “paraṃ” saṃśayitādikaṃ “pratipādayan” svapratipannaṃ prameyamavabodhayan “apūrvaṃ” svapratipattikāle pūrvaṃ yaḥ prameyapratipattau “kramaḥ” upāyo 'nubhūtastasmādanyam “āśrayata iti kimatra” kramāntarāśrayaṇe “kāraṇam”? naiva kiñcit paravyāmohanaṃ muktvā /
SA15arhebt2u:250_4: tathā hi- yadi svapratipattikramaḥ [Hbṭ_70] pratītinibandhanaṃ kiṃ tatparityāgena kramāntarāśrayaṇam?,
SA15arhebt2u:250_6: yata evaṃ “tasmānna prameyasya” sādhyasya “vacanena” pratijñākhyena “kiñcit prayojanam” /
SA15arhebt2u:252_0: evaṃ pratijñāṃ sādhanavākyādapanīyāparamapyupanayanigamanādikaṃ paraparikalpitaṃ sādhanavākyādapanetumuktameva nyāyamatidiśannāha- “etena” anyathāpi pratipatterutpatteḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:252_5: etenetyetadeva darśayati- “etāvataiva” pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātreṇaiva upanayādirahitena “sādhyapratīteḥ bhāvāt” utpatteriti /
SA15arhebt2u:253_1: yato lokaḥ prathamaṃ karma cchedyādikaṃ nirūpayati /
SA15arhebt2u:253_3: upanayenāpi yāvad dṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭasāmarthyo heturddharmiṇi nopasaṃhriyate tāvat kutaḥ sādhyapratītiḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:253_5: tathā hi- svārthānumāne prathamaṃ pradeśe dhūmaṃ paśyati,
SA15arhebt2u:253_7: iti vyāptiṃ smarati / tato ‘dhūmaścātra'; iti punaḥ pratyavamṛśati, sa pratyavamarśārthaḥ parārthānumāne upanayenocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:253_9: yato yadyapi pūrvaṃ anityaḥ śabda ityuktam,
SA15arhebt2u:253_13: tathā hi- āgamaḥ pratijñā, heturanumānaṃ, [Hbṭ_71] dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratyakṣamupamānamupanayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:253_14: tadetasya pramāṇacatuṣṭasyāpi vyāpāro nigamanenopasaṃhriyate- iti kathamasya na sāphalyam? ityetadāśaṅkayāha- “ḍiṇḍikarāgaṃ parityajya” ḍiṇḍikāḥ- nagnācāryāḥ te niṣphalamuparyupari nāmalekhane prasaktāḥ tatasteṣāmiva ‘
SA15arhebt2u:253_16: ityasthānābhiniveśaṃ tyaktvā “akṣiṇī nimīlya” bahirvikṣepamupasaṃhṛtya “cintaya tāvat”- “kimiyatā” pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrakeṇa vākyena sādhyasya “pratītiḥ syāt na vā?” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:253_17: yāvatā yāvāneva parārthānumāne 'rtho 'bhidhānīya ityasmābhiranujñāyate tāvānevānyūnānatiriktaḥ svārthānumāne 'pi pratītiheturdṛṣṭaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:253_18: tasya ka iha śaktervyāghātaḥ? yenāsau parārthānumāne 'pi pratītiṃ na kuryāt /
SA15arhebt2u:253_21: tathā hi- pratijñopanayanigamanaprayoge 'pi yadi pramāṇaniścitā svasādhyavyāptiḥ sādhanadharmasya na syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:253_23: tatsambhave tu pratijñādyabhāve 'pi svārthānumāna iva gamakarūpāvaikalyāt sā na nivāryata iti kimasthānanirbandhena iti? /
SA15arhebt2u:253_24: nahi sādhyadharmākṣepaṇasāmarthyavirahe sādhanadharmasya vādivacanamātrāt sādhyaniścayo yuktaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:254_3: iti karma nirūpyaiva tat prayuktamiti na laukikanyāyātikramaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:254_4: anyathā yadi sādhanād yasya sādhyapratītirupajāyate tenaiva karma nirūpaṇīyam kathaṃ tadabhāve svārthānumāne sādhyasiddhiḥ sādhananibandhanā [Hbṭ_72] syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:254_6: kvāgniḥ kvāgniḥ?'; ityagniṃ paryeṣate sa pradeśe dhūmadarśanamātrādevāgniṃ pratipadyata iti kathaṃ svārthānumāne pratyavamarśapratyayaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:254_7: atha kadācidasau dṛṣṭastatreti parārthe 'pyasyopādānaṃ tadā dadhyādikamapi bhuktvā kadācid dhūmādagniṃ pratipannavāniti kinna dadhibhojanāderapi kādācitkasyopādānam? /
SA15arhebt2u:255_0: yat punaruktam ‘āgamaḥ pratijñā'; iti, tatra yadi vādivacanamevāgamastadā tata eva sādhyasiddherhetvādyupadānamanarthakam /
SA15arhebt2u:255_2: tadā na kvacidāgame paṭhyate atra pradeśe 'gniriti kathamāgamatvaṃ pratijñāyāḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:256_1: tasya trirūpatvāt / dṛṣṭānto 'pi na sarvaḥ pratyakṣa iti kathaṃ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:256_2: dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratyakṣam'; bhavet? / upamānaṃ tu pramāṇameva na bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:256_4: yadi cāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭasāmarthyo heturdvarmiṇyupaneyaḥ tadopanaya evāstu kiṃ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:256_5: kṛtakatvāt'; iti pakṣadharmanirddeśena?, sa eva dṛṣṭasāmarthyaṃ hetumupasaṃhariṣyati pakṣadharmatāṃ ca darśayiṣyatīti na kiñcittena /
SA15arhebt2u:256_6: tato yatra ca pratijñāyāḥ prathamata eva prayogo neṣyate tatra tasyāḥ punarvacanaṃ kuto nigamanaṃ bhaviṣyati? ityāha- “iti” tasmād “iyāneva” pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrātmakaḥ sādhanavākye “prayogo jyāyān” na pañcāvayavātmaka iti sthitam /
SA15arhebt2u:258_0: atra sādhanavākye na kevalaṃ pratijñādiprayogo na yuktaḥ paropagataḥ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:258_3: kutaḥ? sarvathā yadi pūrvaṃ hetuḥ paścād vyāptiḥ atha pūrvaṃ vyāptiḥ paścāt pakṣadharmaḥ prayujyate,
SA15arhebt2u:260_1: yatastrividho hetuḥ- anvayī vyatirekī anvayavyatirekī ceti naiyāyikāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:260_2: tatastasya trighā prayogaḥ sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ ceti vaktavyamityata āha- “sambandhavacane 'pi” na kevalaṃ kramaniyamo na yuktaḥ kintu “artha bhedo 'pi na kaścid” ubhayatrāpi trirūpasadbhāvāta /
SA15arhebt2u:260_4: na tvanvayī vyatirekī vā kaścidveturastīti bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:260_5: tat kutastrividhyaṃ prayogasya syāt? iti manyate /
SA15arhebt2u:260_7: āha- “ubhayathā” sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca prayoge yadyapi vidhipratiṣedharūpatayā dharmabhedaḥ pratīyate tathāpi “tadbhāvasyaiva” sādhanadharmasya sādhyasvabhāvatāyāḥ eva sādharmyavaidharmyaprayogābhyāṃ “khyāpanāt” /
SA15arhebt2u:261_4: yadi sādharmyaprayoge tadbhāvo nākṣipyeta tadā sādhanasya “atatsvabhāvasya bhāve” kimiti “ekāntena” avaśyantayā “sādhyasya bhāvaḥ?” /
SA15arhebt2u:261_5: kādācitkastu bhavatu nāma? / ‘yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam'; ityekāntabhāvaśca hetau sati sādhyasya vyāptyā sādharmyaprayoge 'bhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt2u:261_6: sa ca tādātmyamantareṇānarthāntarasya na sambhavatīti sāmarthyāt tadākṣipati /
SA15arhebt2u:262_0: kathamivātatsvabhāvasya bhāve na ekāntenānyabhāva iti āha- “kṛtakatve”tyādi /
SA15arhebt2u:262_1: yadi pratyatnānantarīyakatvamantareṇāpi kṛtakatvasya bhāvādatatsvabhāvatvam anityatve 'pyayameva vṛttāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:262_3: tannivṛttau vā nivṛttiriti kathaṃ tatastat [Hbṭ_74] pratīyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:262_5: tatra ca tādātmyasadbhāvād anvayavyatirekāvanivāritau anityatvakṛtakatvamatrāpekṣayā tu tādātmyaviraho 'syābhihita iti /
SA15arhebt2u:263_2: tena tayoḥ vyāpteḥ, tadabhāve tayorapyabhāvāt / tatrārthāntarasya dhūmasyāgnau “tadutpattilakṣaṇaḥ pratibandho 'nvayavyatirekanimittama” stīti bhavetāṃ tau /
SA15arhebt2u:263_3: yatra tvanarthāntarasya tāvucyete tatrāvaśyaṃ tādātmyena bhavitavyamityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:263_5: yat pratyatnāntarīyakaṃ na bhavati tat kṛtakamapi na bhavati';
SA15arhebt2u:263_6: ityevaṃrūpā / yata evaṃ tasmadanvayavyatirekayoryathālakṣaṇaṃ hetubhāve sādhyasyāvaśyaṃ bhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:263_7: sādhyābhāve ca hetoravaśyamabhāvaḥ ityeko 'pi sādharmyamukheṇa vaidharmyamukheṇa vā prayukto dvitīyamākṣipati,
SA15arhebt2u:263_8: svavyāpakapratibandhākṣepāt, tasyāpi cetareṇa vyāpteḥ / tasmādubhayatra trairūpyapratīterekasya śabde(bda)to 'parasyārthata iti sambandhavacane 'pi prayoga eva vidhimukhena pratiṣedhamukhena vā bhidyate nārtha iti siddhaṃ tatastasya dvidhā prayogaḥ sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca /
SA15arhebt2u:264_0: sarvo heturanvayavyatirekyeva vastuto na kaścidanvayī vyatirekī vā nāmetyetadupasaṃharannāha- “iti naikatrā” nvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā sādhanavākye “dvayo” ranvayavyatirekayoḥ “prayogaḥ” sākṣācchabdena pratipādanamiṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:265_2: yadi tatsvabhāvatayā sādhyena hetoranvayaḥ sidhyati tata eva “tadabhāve 'bhāvo 'pi sidhyatyeva” /
SA15arhebt2u:265_4: “tathā” tatsvabhāvatayā sādhyābhāve sādhanasyābhāva “siddhau” “ca” satyāṃ tata eva sādhyena hetoḥ “anvayasyāpi siddheriti” /
SA15arhebt2u:266_0: yaistu vyākhyāyate- “sādharmyavati prayoge tadabhāva eva vipakṣe hetorabhāvakhyātiryathā syāt nānyatra vipakṣe viruddhe vā hetvabhāvaprasaṅgāt viruddhata eva vyavacchedaprasaṅgācceti niyamakhyāpanārtho vyatirekaprayogaḥ” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:266_1: sa tadartho 'pyayuktaḥ / kutaḥ? “anyaviruddhayorapi” na kevalaṃ tadabhāvasya “vipakṣatvāt” yasya hi- anya eva vipakṣo 'nyadharmayogī vānyo,
SA15arhebt2u:266_2: na vivakṣitadharmānāśrayaḥ, viruddha eva vā sahānavasthānalakṣaṇenaiva virodhena,
SA15arhebt2u:266_4: kṛtakatvādivṛtteḥ, hetvabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ / auṣṇye ca sādhye 'gnilakṣaṇasya hetorviruddhādeva śītāt nānuṣṇaśītādapyanyato vyavacchedaprasaṅgāt naikāntenauṣṇyamagnirgrasayediti tasyāyaṃ doṣaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:266_5: taṃ pratyācāryeṇoktam- yadyekasya vipakṣatvamiṣyate tadā tadabhāvasyaiveṣyatām,
SA15arhebt2u:266_6: na viruddhasya anyasya vā, tasyānyatrāpi vivakṣitadharmānāśraye viruddhe ca bhāvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:268_0: yadi svabhāvahetāvanvayavyatirekayoḥ sādhanadharmasya sādhyasvabhāvatā nibandhanamityanvayena vyatirekeṇa vā sādharmyevaidharmyavatoḥ [Hbṭ_76] prayogayorabhidhīyamānena tādātmyākṣepadvāreṇārthāditarākṣepa ucyate,
SA15arhebt2u:268_1: tadā pramāṇasiddhaiva tatsvabhāvatā tayornibandhanaṃ na śabdamātrataḥ pratīyamānetyabhiprāyavānāha- “kathamidam” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:268_4: pṛcchataścāyamabhiprāyaḥ- iha dvividhāḥ santaḥ- kṛtakāśca ghaṭādayaḥ akṛtakāścākāśādayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:268_5: tatra ye tāvadakṛtakāste “sadakāraṇavat nityam” iti nityalakṣaṇayogādanityā eva na bhavanti kuta eva kṣaṇikāḥ? iti na satva(ttva)sya kṣaṇikatvasvabhāvatā /
SA15arhebt2u:268_6: ye 'pi santaḥ kṛtakāsteṣāmapi mugdarādyanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitayā vināśasya sahetukatvāt tadvetvasannidhāvavināśāt kṛtakātmano 'pi satva(ttva)sya kṣaṇikatvasvabhāvatā na samastyeveti nānvayavyatirekayoḥ sambhava iti /
SA15arhebt2u:269_1: vinā saṃsargitāṃ yāti na vināśo ghaṭādibhiḥ //”
SA15arhebt2u:271_0: nanu cānvayaniścayaṃ pratipādayatā bādhakapramāṇavṛttivaśāt tatsvabhāvatā pūrvameva pratipāditā ‘
SA15arhebt2u:271_3: satyam, kintu pūrvācāryaiḥ kṛtakatvasya kṣaṇikatāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ paraiḥ kṛtakānāmante 'vaśyaṃ hetunibandhanavināśopagamāt tadvetvayogapratipādanenānapekṣā vināśaṃ prati viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tādātmyaprasādhakamuktaṃ tat prasaṅgamukhena kṛtakalkṣaṇasyaiva sattvasya tadātmatāṃ gamayati nānyasya iti darśayitum /
SA15arhebt2u:271_4: arthakriyāvirodhalakṣaṇaṃ tu sarvasya sattvasya iti vastumātreṇa [Hbṭ_77] prāguktamapi vipañcayituṃ pūrvapakṣopanyāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:271_7: tataḥ pūrvācāryairna tasyaikāṅgavaikalyādeva “sadakāraṇavat nityam” iti nityatāsambhava iti na tadātmatāṃ prati yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:271_9: kṛtakalakṣaṇasya api ca, deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭasyāpi vastusthityaiva tadātmatām arthakriyāvirodhena,
SA15arhebt2u:272_0: [11. sahetukaṃ vināśaṃ nirasituṃ tasya bhāvasvabhāvatāyāḥ samalocanam /]
SA15arhebt2u:273_0: tatra pūrvācāryoktaṃ ‘sarvasya sataḥ kṛtakasyavaśyamante hetukṛto vināśa iti';
SA15arhebt2u:274_1: sa teṣāṃ kṛtakānāṃ satāmavaśyambhāvī vināśaḥ kutaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:274_2: na hyākasmikaḥ kaścitsvabhāvo yukta ityāha- “svabhāvata eva” /
SA15arhebt2u:274_9: tadeva kāṣṭhādikaṃ vināśyam, aṅgārādikamavasthāntaram, kāṣṭhādinivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ cābhāvaṃ tuccharūpaṃ,
SA15arhebt2u:274_11: etāvatyāṃ ca vastugatau na kvacidatra vināśahetauḥ sāmarthyaṃ yujyate /
SA15arhebt2u:274_12: yato “nahi vināśaheturbhāva” syendhanādeḥ svahetubhyaḥ sthirarūpasyotpannasya “svabhāvamevā” sthirātmatālakṣaṇaṃ “karoti” /
SA15arhebt2u:274_14: nahi sthirātmano [Hbṭ_78] nirvṛttasyānyathābhāvaḥ tadātmā śakyate kartum,
SA15arhebt2u:275_0: athavā tritaye samīkṣyamāṇe yat tāvat vināśyaṃ kāṣṭhādi na tatsvabhāvamevāgnisaṃyogādirvināśahetuḥ karoti tasya svahetubhya eva nirvṛtteriti /
SA15arhebt2u:277_0: kumārilastu manyate- nāgnisaṃyogādinā bhāvasvabhāva eva kriyate kintvindhanādeḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:279_0: tathāvidhasya cābhāvasya hetumattopagamo naiva virudhyate / tathā cāha kaścit-
SA15arhebt2u:280_1: abhāvaḥ sammatastasya hetoḥ kinna samudbhavaḥ? //” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:281_3: tataśca yathāgnisaṃyogāt prāg indhanāderupalabdhiḥ anyā ca tatsādhyārthakriyā tathāṅgārādyutpattāvapyupalabdhyādeḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:282_0: nanu bhāvāntarasya pradhvansā(dhvaṃsā)bhāvarūpatāyāṃ tadutpattāvindhanādīnāṃ pradhvastatvādasatāṃ kathaṃ tathopalabdhyādiprasaṅgaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:282_1: satyam, evaṃ manyate- sarvasyendhanāderanyasya gavāderapi tathābhāvo mā bhūt ityaṅgārādeḥ dhvaṃsavyavasthāyāṃ nibandhanamabhidhānīyam /
SA15arhebt2u:282_3: aho vacanakauśalam yato nivṛttestucchasvabhāvatānaṅgīkaraṇāt tadeva bhāvāntaramaṅgārādikaṃ nivṛttiṃ brūṣe /
SA15arhebt2u:282_7: ko 'yamupamarddo nāma? / yadi nivṛttiḥ sāṅgārādilakṣaṇaiveti na pūrvasmād viśiṣyate /
SA15arhebt2u:283_0: api ca- yadi bhāvāntaraṃ pradhvaṃsābhāvo ya ete 'nupajātavikārāḥ pradīpabuddhyādayo dhvaṃsante teṣāṃ katarad bhāvāntaraṃ pradhvanso(dhvaṃso) vyavasthāpyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:283_1: te 'pyavyaktatāmātmabhāvaṃ ca vikārameva dhvaṃsaṃ samalambanta iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:283_3: yadi hi śaktirūpatāpattiravyaktatā tadā śakteḥ kāryadarśanonnīyamānarūpatvāt tadabhāve kathaṃ pradīpādayaḥ śaktyātmanāvasthitāḥ kalperan? /
SA15arhebt2u:283_7: ātmanaścāsattvāt kathaṃ tadbhāvo buddhyādīnāṃ vikāraḥ pariṇāmaśca? /
SA15arhebt2u:283_8: anyatra vihitapratikriyatvāt neha pratanyata ityalaṃ prasaṅgena /
SA15arhebt2u:284_0: syānmatam- bhāvāntareṇāṅgārādināvṛtatvāt indhanādestathopalabdhyādayo na bhavantītyata āha- “nāpi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:284_1: svabhāvāntaram “anyasye”ndhanāderā”varaṇamapi”na”yujyeta” “tadavasthe” avicalita rūpe “tasminni”ndhanādau sa”tyāvaraṇasyāpi” na kevalamanupalabdhyāde”rayogāt” /
SA15arhebt2u:286_0: na kevalaṃ bhāvasvabhāvo bhāvāntaraṃ vā vināśahetunā na kriyate bhāvābhāvo 'pi na kriyata ityāha- “nāpi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:286_1: kutaḥ? iti cet, “abhāvasya vidhinā” paryudāsena vivakṣitādbhāvāda”nya”tayā kāryatvo”pagame” kriyamāṇe kimindhanādirūpa evāsau? athārthāntaram? iti “vyatirekāvyatirekāvikalpānatikramāt” /
SA15arhebt2u:288_1: naśyan bhāvaḥ kathaṃ tasya na nāśaḥ kāryatāmiyat //
SA15arhebt2u:288_2: prāgabhūtvā bhavan bhāvo hetubhyo jāyate yathā /
SA15arhebt2u:288_3: bhūtvāpi na bhavaṃstadvaddhetubhyo na bhavatyayam //” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:289_1: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yadyanapekṣitabhāvāntarasaṃsargaścyutimātrameva tuccharūpaṃ dhvaṃsaḥ tadā tatra kārakavyāpāro naiva sambhavati bhavanadharmiṇyeva tatsambhavāt /
SA15arhebt2u:289_2: tasyāpyabhūtvā bhāvopagamāt kāryatā na virudhyata iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:289_8: nahyakāraṇaṃ pratītiviṣayaḥ, atiprasaṅgāt / tadaviṣayasya vā kathaṃ hetumattāvagatiḥ? vastutā vā? /
SA15arhebt2u:289_9: uemācyate ‘tuccharūpameva tad vastu'; iti / pratītijanakatve vā kathaṃ na sāmarthyasambandhitā? /
SA15arhebt2u:289_11: kāryatāpyasya katham? / svahetubhāve bhāvāt iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:289_13: [Hbṭ_81] tathā hi- yadi svahetubhāve bhavatīti pratīyate sadityapi pratīyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:289_15: na cāsti, bhavati, bhāvaḥ, sanniti śabdānāmarthabhedaḥ paramārthataḥ kaścit /
SA15arhebt2u:289_17: na / vyāhatatvāt, yato na bhavatītyabhāva ucyate sa kathaṃ bhavatīti vyapadiśyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:289_18: pratiṣṭhitena kenacid rūpeṇa svajñānātmanyapratibhāsanāt na bhava iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:289_20: na / teṣāṃ jñānaheturūpatayā pratibhāsanāt iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:289_25: ahetośca viṣayatvāyogāt / asmākaṃ tvabhāvabuddhyaḥ svavāsanāparipākānvayā nirviṣayā eva /
SA15arhebt2u:289_26: abhāvasya ca bhavitṛtve kathaṃ praryudāsāt prasajyapratiṣedho bhidyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:289_27: asadrūpasya vidhānena paryudāsāt sa bhidyata iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:289_28: na / asadrūpsya bhavanavirodhāt / bhavatīti hi bhūtyā sattayābhisambadhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:289_31: sarvatra vidheḥ prādhānyāt / so 'pi vā na bhavet / yadi hi kiñcit kutaścit nivartyeta tadā tavdyatireki saṃspṛśyeta tatparyudāsena /
SA15arhebt2u:289_32: tacca nāsti / sarvatra nivṛttirbhavati ityukte vastvantarasyaiva kasyacit vidhānāt /
