SA15arhebt2u:318_5: tacca samagrāvasthāyāmeva tatkāryaṃ janayati na vyagrāvasthāyām /
SA15arhebt2u:318_11: tato yadasya samagreṣu cakṣurādiṣu janakaṃ rūpaṃ tadekaikābhāve 'pi vidyate na ca janayatīti ‘
SA15arhebt2u:320_0: siddhāntavādyāha- “na, yathāsvam” ityādi / evaṃ manyate- kiṃ punaridaṃ kāraṇamabhimataṃ bhavataḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:320_1: yadi pratyekaṃ cakṣurādikam; [Hbṭ_93] tadayuktam / sāmagrījanyasvabhāvatvāt kāryasya,
SA15arhebt2u:320_2: tasyā eva kāraṇatvāt / nanu tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekameva sāmagrīśabdavācyānāṃ jananasvabhāvatvābhyupagamāt pratyekameva cakṣurādikaṃ kāraṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:320_3: yadyevaṃ ko 'yaṃ niyamo yadanekasmād bhavatānekena bhavitavyam viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:320_4: ekenaiva tat kāryaṃ kartavyamiti ca na niyamakāraṇamutpaśyāmaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:320_6: tadbhāve bhāvāt iti cet / anekatrāpi samānametat / taduktam- “tasyaiveikasya janane samarthāḥ nānyasya iti nāparāparajananam” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:320_11: taccānekabhāva eva bhāvāt tatkāryamucyate tasya kuto 'nekatāprasaṅgaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:320_12: yattvabhinnaṃ rūpaṃ janakamucyate tasyaikasthitāvapi bhāvāt tatkāryajananasvabhāvācca tataḥ kāryaprasavaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:320_13: tadanyasannidhau tasya viśeṣābhāvāt tadāpi vāna janayet /
SA15arhebt2u:320_14: tasmād yeṣuṃ bhāvābhāvavatsu kāryaṃ bhāvābhāvavad dṛṣṭaṃ ta eva viśeṣā janakā iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:321_2: “tanna”, “yathāsvaṃ” yasyāḥ sāmagryāḥya ātmīyaḥ svabhāvastadbhedena “tadviśeṣopayogataḥ” tasya- vijñānalakṣaṇasya kāryasya,
SA15arhebt2u:321_4: teṣūpayogataḥ tadupayogaiḥ bhinnasāmagrīvyāpāraiḥ kāryāḥ ye svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ- kāryāṇāṃviśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvāḥ teṣāmasaṅkarātparasparavyāvṛttarūpatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:321_5: sāmagrībhedād bhinnarūpataiva kāryāṇāmiti kathanna kāraṇabhedād kāryabhedaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:321_11: tato 'pyabhrāntavijñānasambhūtiriti bhinnasāmagrījanmanāṃ kāryasvabhāvaviśeṣāṇāmasāṅkaryādastyeva [Hbṭ_94] sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bheda iti /
SA15arhebt2u:321_12: nanu yadā viṣayendriyamanaskārebhyo vijñānasambhavaḥ tadā teṣāmupayogaviṣayasyaikatvāt kathamasāṅkaryam? /
SA15arhebt2u:322_2: kiṃ nu vai samagrāṇāmanyānyakāryajananena janakatvam yatastadabhāve tanna syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:322_3: janakatvaṃ hyeṣāṃ tadbhāva eva kasyacid bhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:324_0: nanvekasyāḥ sāmagryā anekasya bhāve sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhavatu bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:324_2: tatra yadā cakṣūrūpamanaskārebhyo vijñānajanma tadā cakṣūrūpakṣaṇayorapi bhāvād vijñānenābhinnahetujatvāt tayorvijñānātmatā,
SA15arhebt2u:324_3: vijñānasya vā tadrūpatā kathaṃ na prasajyeta? /
SA15arhebt2u:326_0: naiṣa doṣaḥ / teṣāṃ yathāsvaṃ svabhāvabhedena nimittopādānatayā tadupayogāt /
SA15arhebt2u:326_5: anyādaśī ca vijñānāderiti tadvailakṣaṇyādeva kāryāṇāṃ vailakṣaṇyam /
SA15arhebt2u:327_0: syādetat- sarveṣāmanvayavyatirekāvanuvidhīyete tadā cakṣurādikṣaṇairiti kuto 'yaṃ bhedaḥ- ihopādānabhāve bheda(bhāveneda)mupayujyate,
SA15arhebt2u:327_5: evamanyadapi pratyeyam / niyamena ca vijñānamātrabhāve samanantarapratyayasya vyāpāro na cakṣurādeḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:327_6: cakṣuḥkṣaṇāntarodaye ca pūrvabhāvinaścakṣuṣo na svavijñānayogyatāhetoḥ samanantarapratyayasya /
SA15arhebt2u:327_7: evaṃ rūpasyāpi vācyam / tasmādavasthābhede 'pi yad ekākāraparāmarṣa(rśa)pratyayanibandhanatayā svasantatipatitakāryaprasūtinimittaṃ tad upādānakāraṇaṃ yat santānāntare prāgavasthāpekṣaviśeṣodayanibandhanaṃ tat sahakārikāraṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:327_8: sā ceyaṃ bhāvānāṃ svahetuparamparayātā prakṛtiryayā kiñcit kāryaṃ svasantānavyavasthānibandhanaṃ janayantyaparaṃ ca santānāntaravyapadeśanibandhanamiti tasyā eva sāmagryā avāntaraviśeṣakṛtatvāccakṣūrūpavijñānakṣaṇānāṃ parasparato vailakṣaṇyaṃ na virudhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:329_0: tasmād yadi ‘kāraṇabhedāt'; kāraṇānekatvāt “kāryasya bhedaḥ” anekatvaṃ tadā pratibandhābhāvādanekāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:329_1: na ca tadabhyupagamyata iti na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:330_0: atha sāmagrīlakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya bhedaḥ sāmagryantarād vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryasyāpi bhedo 'tatkāraṇebhyo bhinnasvabhāvatocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:330_1: tadā tasyeha bhāvāt kathaṃ na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt? iti abhiprāyavatā ‘
SA15arhebt2u:331_0: ubhayaṃ caitat kāryeṣu pramāṇaparidṛṣṭamiti darśayannāha- “yathā” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:331_1: mṛtpiṇḍādibhyo hi bhavato ghaṭasya na kāraṇānekatve 'pyanekarūpatā /
SA15arhebt2u:331_3: tatra sāmagryantarajanyāt tāvad bhedaṃ darśayati- “mṛtpiṇḍāt” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:331_4: iha mṛtpiṇḍakulālasūtrāṇi [Hbṭ_96] vyagrasvabhāvāni kāraṇāntarasahitāni iṣṭakādilakṣaṇāni tadanyajanyebhyo 'bhinnasvabhāvāni yāni kāryāṇi sādhayanti tebhyo vilakṣaṇameva samagrāṇi ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti /
SA15arhebt2u:331_5: tathā hi- kulālādinirapekṣo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ tadanyajanyād vṛkṣādervilakṣaṇamevopādānabhāvena mṛdātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:331_8: evaṃ kulālādikamapi tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryaṃ karoti tadvilakṣaṇameva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti samudāyārthaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:331_9: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopadānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayastebhyo bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:331_10: “kulālāt” mṛtpiṇḍopādānāhitātiśayāt sahākāribhāvenopayujyamānāt “tasyaiva ghaṭasya” mṛtpiṇḍopādānatayā mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ “saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ” pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraḥ tadātmatayā tadanyebhyo yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍastadanyanimittasahita upādānamiṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:331_11: “sūtrāt” mṛtpiṇḍakulālakāraṇāhitaviśeṣāt tasyaiva ghaṭasya “mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmano” mṛtpiṇḍakulālayostajjananasvabhāvatvāt ghaṭasya tadrūpayogāt “tayośca” sūtrakāraṇopahitaviśeṣayostannirapekṣāvasthāto bhinnātmakatayā “cakrādervibhakto” vichinnaḥ “svabhāvo bhavati” tasmādanu[krā]ntakāraṇatrayajanyo ghaṭaḥ tadanyasmādekaikakāryād dvidvikāryācca bhinnasvabhāva eva jāyata iti sāmagrībhedād bhinnānyeva kāryāṇi parasparamasaṅkīrṇasvabhāvāni bhavantīti tadupayogakāryaviśeṣāsaṅkaraḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:331_17: yata evaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhinnānyeveṣṭakācakrāvibhaktaghaṭatavdibhaktaghaṭalakṣaṇāni kāryāṇi bhavanti “tat” tasmāt “evam” uktena prakāreṇa kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍarahitādanyasāmagryantarbhūtāt na mṛtsvabhāvatā kasyacit kāryasya,
SA15arhebt2u:331_19: na mṛdaḥ kevalāyāḥ tatsāmagrībahirbhūtāyāḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ kulālopādānopakṛtāyā eva mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakakāryahetutvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:333_0: tadevaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhedaṃ kāryasyodāharaṇe pratipādya sahakāriṇāmanekatve 'pyanekātmatāvirahaṃ pratipādayannāha- “na ca tayoḥ” mṛtkulālayoḥ sahitayoḥ parasparopādānopakṛtātmanoḥ yaḥ śaktiviśeṣaḥ pratyayāntarasahitāvasthāto viśiṣṭā yogyatā tadviṣayasya tadanyāvasthāviṣayād bhede satyapi yathā tadanyasmād bhedaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:333_3: tābhyāṃ janito yo viśeṣo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakaḥ sa eva tadanyasāmagrījanyād bhidyata iti bhedo asya /
SA15arhebt2u:334_3: yadi hi mṛtkulālayoḥ tadavasthābhāvinoḥ “śaktiviśeṣaviṣayo” mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmako “bheda”stadanyasmādiva svarūpato bhidyeta tadā mṛtsaṃsthānayo “raparasparātmatayā” parasparātmatāviraheṇa kāraṇena saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa mṛt na pratibhāseta,
SA15arhebt2u:334_5: yathā tadanyarūpeṇa / na hi yo yasya svabhāvo na bhavati sa tenātmanā svagrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāsate,
SA15arhebt2u:334_6: rūparasavat; jñānaṃ vā tadrūpavikalārthasāmarthyenotpadyamānaṃ tadrūpamanukartuṃ yuktam,
SA15arhebt2u:334_8: tasmāt mṛtsaṃsthānayorekātmataiveti na kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasyānekātmakatā aikāntikī,
SA15arhebt2u:334_9: yato bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ ekakāryotpattivirodhādekarūpatayā teṣāṃ sādhāraṇaikakāryakriyā,
SA15arhebt2u:334_12: paramārthatastu tatsāmagryantargatānāṃ sajātīyasyāpi kṣaṇāntarasyārambhāt sāmagryantarāvayavatvena ca kāryāntarasyāpi yathā ekapratyayajanitaṃ kiñcidekaṃ nāsti tathā'nekapratyayajanitamapīti kāraṇānekatvāt kāryānekatvopagame 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:336_0: nanu ca mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣayorekasvabhāvatve 'pyahrīkādibhiḥ saṅkhayādibhedād bheda iṣyate tatkathamanekapratyayajanitasyaikatve etadudāharaṇam syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:336_1: sarvatraiva hi dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhayāsaṃjñālakṣaṇakāryabhedād bhedo deśakālasvabhāvābhedāccābheda iṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:336_3: tathā hi- eko ghaṭaḥ rūpādayo bahava iti saṅkhyābhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:336_8: ghaṭenodakāharaṇaṃ kriyate, rūpādībhiḥ punarvasturāga iti kāryabhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:336_9: evaṃ sarvatra dravyaparyāyoḥ saṅkhayādibhirbhedaḥ deśādibhistvabheda iti mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ kathañcit bhedāt mṛtkulālābhyāṃ janitasya kāryasyānekatāstyeva /
SA15arhebt2u:336_10: yathā tvekatā tathā tābhyāṃ tasya abhinnātmajanyataiveti yadanekakāraṇaṃ tadanekameva,
SA15arhebt2u:336_11: yat punarekaṃ tat sahakāriṇāmabhinnarūpajanyatayaikakāraṇameveti na vyabhicāra iti /
SA15arhebt2u:337_1: tadayuktam / svabhāvato bhedānabhyupagame anyathā bhedāsiddheḥ anekasmādekakāryotpatterabādhanāt /
SA15arhebt2u:337_2: svabhāvato bhedopagame vāparasparātmatayā bhṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ saṃsthānamṛtsvabhavaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaṃ durnivāram /
SA15arhebt2u:337_3: yadi hi svabhāvato na bhedo dharmadharmiṇoḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:337_5: na hi pararūpāḥ bhidyamānā api saṅkhayādaya ātmabhūtamabhedaṃ bādhituṃ samarthāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:338_1: yathā gurava iti / na ca bahuvacanasya niyamenādarśanād rūpādayo 'tra nimittam,
SA15arhebt2u:338_2: rūpādinimittatve hi guruḥ iti na kadācidekavacanaṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:338_5: brīhaya iti ca jātivacane dharmiṇo rūpādīnāṃ cānabhidhānāt na kiñciduttaram /
SA15arhebt2u:338_6: ubhayarūpasya ca vastuno guruśabdavācyatvāt kathaṃ sambhavino dharmirūpasyaikatvena vivakṣā? /
SA15arhebt2u:339_3: atrāpi indanāt śakanāt dāraṇācca śaktibhedo gamyata iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:339_4: na / samastasya kāryakartṛtvāt / na hi śaktireva indati śankoti dārayati ca /
SA15arhebt2u:339_5: kiṃ tarhi? / dharmirūpamapi, tayorekasvabhāvopagamāt, śaknotyādipadaistadvācināṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanācca /
SA15arhebt2u:339_7: yeṣāṃ ca paryāyāṇāṃ na kācidarthānugamamātrā tatra kiṃ vaktavyam? /
SA15arhebt2u:340_2: tathā hi- na kūṭasthanityatayā nityaṃ dravyamahrīkairiṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:340_6: paryāyā eva paryāyarūpeṇa nirudhyante na tu dravyamiti nityamabhyupagamyate /
SA15arhebt2u:340_7: na ceyaṃ kūṭasthanityatā vā dravye sambhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:341_3: bhinnakālamabhinnakālaṃ ca / tatra pūrvaṃ bhavati bhedanivandhanam yadīha sambhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:341_7: paṭādayo 'pi hi vibhaktapariṇāmā anekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:341_11: yata ekasya kāraṇātmanaḥ ekakāryarūpatopagame tadanyarūpābhāvāt tadanyakāryātmatopagatirna syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:341_12: kintvapūrvameva kasyacid bhāve prāgavidyamānaṃ bhavat tatkāryam /
SA15arhebt2u:341_13: tatra viṣayendriyamanaskārāṇāmitaretaropadānāhitarūpabhedānāṃ sannidhau viśiṣṭasvetarakṣaṇabhāve pratyekaṃ tadbhāvābhāvānuvidhānādanekakriyopagamo na virudhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:343_1: tathā hi- te tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekaṃ viśiṣṭasajātīyetarakṣaṇajananātmakāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:343_3: tatra vijñānajananasvabhāvataiveti tasyājananasvabhāvatā vyavacchidyate tasyā eva pratiyogitvāt nānyajananasvabhāvatā /
SA15arhebt2u:343_6: na hi tadanyāpekṣayā viparyavyāvṛttimupādāyānekena śabdenābhidhīyamānaṃ vastu anekarūpatāṃ pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt2u:343_20: ekasyānekakriyānabhyupagame ca yo 'yaṃ rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāṇāṃ kvacit sahabhāvaniyamaḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:343_25: anekenaikasvabhāvatāṃ cānubhavataḥ tadvadanekatāyā durnivāratvāt anyathā dharmadharmiṇāṃ kathaṃ [Hbṭ_102] naikāntiko bhedaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:343_26: tathā hi- yamātmānaṃ purodhāyāyaṃ dharmī paryāyāścaite iti vyavasthāpyate,
SA15arhebt2u:344_1: na hi parasparopādānakṛtopakārānapekṣā viṣayendriyamanaskārāḥ sahaikakāryārambhiṇo yuktāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:345_0: nāpyehetukameva viśvam, deśakālaprakṛtiniyamāt / tasmādekasāmagryadhīnajanmanāmeva sahabhāvaniyamo bhāvānāmekakāryakriyāniyamo vā /
SA15arhebt2u:345_1: tataśca svasantānakṣaṇamitaropādānaṃ ca yugapadupakurvataḥ kathamekasyānekakāryatā na syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:345_3: dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ caikasvabhāvatāmācakṣāṇa ekasyānekakāryatāṃ pratikṣipatīti kathaṃ nonmattaḥ?,
SA15arhebt2u:345_5: ekasvabhāvatve ca dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ tatkāryabheda ekavastunibandhana eveti kāryabhedād bhedamabhidadhānaḥ sphuṭamahrīka evāyamityupekṣāmarhati /
SA15arhebt2u:347_0: vaiśeṣiko 'pi dravyasyaikasya dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ karmaṇaścaikasya saṃyogavibhāgasaṃskāranimittatāmekasyānekakāryakriyāṃ pratikṣipan svakṛtāntakopenaiva pratihataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:349_1: tathā hi- deśakālayorabhede 'pi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyante tataḥ kathamabhedasiddhiḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:349_11: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyośca svabhāvatve lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedo vaktavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:349_14: tad bheda eva sambhavati, sādṛśyasya sadṛśādhikaraṇatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:349_15: tataśca padārthadvayameva syāt na tvekaṃ dvirūpamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:349_21: kathaṃ tarhi sa eka ityucyate anekaḥ san? /
SA15arhebt2u:349_26: yogyatvācca viśvasya kṛtākṛtānāmekābhidhānābhidheyatvasya kvacidasambhavāt śaktibhedācca viṣayabhedaṃ brūvāṇaṃ prati abhihitam /
SA15arhebt2u:349_29: tathā hi- śaśāṅkodayaṃ bahavo nirīkṣante tasya kathamekatvamabhyupagatam? /
SA15arhebt2u:349_31: sarvathedaṃ na kathañcidapi saṅgacchate yaduta ekasya dvairūpyamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:349_32: vijñānaṃ tu nīlapraticchāyatayotpadyamānaṃ pītādipratibhāsavyavacchedena prativiśiṣṭaṃ khyāpyate,
SA15arhebt2u:349_33: na punarasya bhāvato dve rūpe staḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:350_0: atha punardravyaparyāyayoḥ sammūrcchitatvāt narasiṃhavadekaṃ śabalarūpatvāt dvīrūpamucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:350_3: te ca paramāṇavaḥ pratyekaṃ narasiṃharūpā na bhavanti,

SA15arhebt2u:378_6: tatsvabhāvasya jananāt'ityanekānta eveti manyamānaḥ para [Hbṭ_116] āha- “tāni” svakāraṇāni kṣitibījādīni “enaṃ” samartham “aparasya” anyasya pratyayasya “sannidhāna eva kiṃ” kasmāt “janayanti”? na kevalāni?,
SA15arhebt2u:378_7: sahitānāmeva sarvadā sambhavāt iti cet āha- “kadācit” kasmiṃścit kāle “anyathāpi” kevalā api “syuḥ” bhaveyuḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:378_8: tathā hi- dṛśyanta evādhyātmikabāhyāḥ kvacit kārye yādṛśā yatsahitāḥ tādṛśā eva tadrahitā apīti /
SA15arhebt2u:378_10: ko doṣaḥ? iti cedāha- “tataśca” kevalānāmapi samarthajanakānāṃ sambhavāt “eko 'pi” na kevalamanekaḥ “kvaci” ddeśādau samarthaḥ utpannaḥ kṣitibījādoiraṅkurādikāryaṃ “janayet” yadi tatsvabhāvasyāvaśyaṃ janakatvam /
SA15arhebt2u:378_11: na ca kevalo janayati tatsvabhāvasambhave 'pi tato 'nekāntaḥ iti paraḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:379_1: aparaiścāparaiśca kuśūlatadapanetṛpuruṣaprayatnapiṭakādiprakṣepakṣetranayanaprakiraṇādibhiḥ “pratyayai”ryo “yogaḥ” tena kāraṇena “pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayo” na kadācit pūrvāparakālabhāvina ekaśaktayaḥ aparāparapratyayayogalakṣaṇahetubhede 'pyabhinnaśaktitāyāmahetukatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA15arhebt2u:380_0: “saṃskārāḥ” sametya sambhūya ca pratyayaiḥ kriyamāṇāḥ “santanvantaḥ” santānena bhavanto “yadyapi kutaścit sāmyād” varṇena saṃsthānena anyena vā kenacitprakāreṇa sādṛśyādekākaraparāmarśapratyayajananalakṣaṇāt samānaṃ rūpameṣāmiti “sarūpāḥ” sadṛśāḥ “pratīyante” pratyabhijñāyante “tathāpi” kṛtrimākṛtrimāṇāmiva maṇimuktādīnāmaparāparapratyayogalakṣaṇasāmagrībhedād “bhinna eva” visadṛśa eva na pratyabhijñānavaśādabhinnaḥ tulyarūpa “eṣāṃ” bījādīnāṃ “svabhāvaḥ” yata evaṃ “tena” bhinnasvabhāvatvena bhinnaśaktitayā vāparāparasāmagrījanyatvena kṣaṇānāṃ siddhyā “kiñcideva” kṣitibījādikaṃ “kasyaci”deva kāryasyāṅkurādestajjananasamarthasya [Hbṭ_117] vā “kāraṇam” /
SA15arhebt2u:380_1: na sarvaṃ sarvasya / tathā ca vyagrāṇāṃ kṣitibījādīnāmaṅkurajananasvabhāvatā samarthakṣaṇajānanasvabhāvatā vā nāstyeveti tatsvabhāvasya jananādajanakasya cātatsvabhāvatvādityatra nānekāntaḥ yato yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetorevotpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati na punastadbhāve hetvantaramapekṣata ityatrānekāntaḥ syāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:380_2: pratyabhijñānasya ca sarūpatāviṣayasya sāmagrībhedādanumitabhinnaśaktisvabhāvatvena bādhyamānatayā prāmāṇyābhāvāt na tataḥ sarūpatāsiddhiḥ kṣaṇakṣayiṇāmiti /
SA15arhebt2u:381_0: pūrvaṃ ca ‘ata evāna(eva ta)yoravasthayorvastubhedo niśceyaḥ ityādinā ekatvaviṣayaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ nirastam /
SA15arhebt2u:381_2: etadapi tatra ‘aparāparotpatteḥ'; ityanenoktameva / vipañcanārthaṃ tu punaḥ iha upanyastam /
SA15arhebt2u:383_0: kiñcideva kasyacit kāraṇam ityuktam tatra kiṃ kasya kāraṇamiti śakyaparicchedamapyādhyātmikeṣu tāvad darśayannāha- “tatra” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:383_3: tadādiryeṣāṃ atidūrātyāsannatvādīnāṃ te 'vidyamānā yasmin deśe so 'vyavadhānādiḥ deśo yasya so 'vyavadhānādideśaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:383_4: rūpamindriyaṃ cādī yasya manaskārādeḥ sa rūpendriyādiḥ sa cāsau karaṇakalāpaśca sāmagrīlakṣaṇastathoktaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:383_5: avyavadhānādideśaścāsau rūpendriyadikāraṇakalāpaśca sa”vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ” nānyaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:383_6: tadbhāva eva tasya bhāvāt, anyabhāve 'pi cābhāvāt, etanmātranibandhanatvācca samarthāsamarthavyavasthāyāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:384_1: imamevaṃvidhaṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamaṃ niravadyamādhyātmikeṣu darśitam anyatrāpyatidiśannāha- “anena nyāyena” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:384_2: yo 'yamanantaraṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyame nyāya uktaḥ so 'nyatrāpi “sarvatra” draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:384_3: sarvatreti vacanāt akṣaṇikeṣvapi pratītirmā bhūt ityāha- “pratikṣaṇam” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:384_4: yāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe 'nyāścānyāśca svabhāvabhedānvayinyaḥ śaktayo bhavanti tatrāyamekārthakriyāpratiniyamaḥ sahakāriṇāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:384_5: na tu ye sthiraikasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ paraiḥ kalpyante teṣvapi /
SA15arhebt2u:386_0: kasmāt punaḥ sthiraikasvabhāveṣu neṣyate? ityāha- “svabhāva- “ ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:386_2: na tu svata eva svabhāvasyānyathātvaṃ sambhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:386_3: tataśca sthiraḥ padārtho yadi kāryotpādanasamarthasvabhāvaḥ tato 'syākriyā nopapadyate iti sarvadaiva kuryāt /
SA15arhebt2u:386_4: athāsamarthasvabhāvaḥ / tadāpi kriyānupapannā, sarvadaiva na kuryāditi bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:386_5: yattu kadācit karoti kadācinna ityetanna labhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:386_6: tataścākṣaṇikānāṃ tatkāryakriyāsamarthasvabhāvatve sahitāsahitāvasthayorekarūpatvāt kevalānāmapi tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena kuta ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ sambhavet? /
SA15arhebt2u:387_1: yadyapi kevalasyapyakṣaṇikasya samarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ tathāpi anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevalaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:387_3: anyasahitena svakāryaṃ kartavyam na samarthasvabhāvenāpi satā kevalena';
SA15arhebt2u:388_1: anyasahitenaiva svakāryaṃ kartavyaṃ na kevalena ityetat kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvatve yujyate nānyatheti manyamānasya praśnaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:388_3: kevalasyāpyakṣaṇikasya samartha eva svabhāvaḥ [Hbṭ_119] anyathāsyākṣaṇikataiva hīyeteti /
SA15arhebt2u:388_5: nahi samarthasyākriyā, sahitasyāvasthāyāmiva yujyata iti sahitasyaiva kriyāmicchatā kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvataivopagantavyā /
SA15arhebt2u:389_0: atha matam- kevalasya yadi śiraśchidyate tathāpi na karotītyata āha “akurvan” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:389_1: kāryānumeyaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ na ca kevalasya kadācidapi kāryakriyāstīti kathaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:389_2: nāyaṃ niyamaḥ yat samarthasvabhāvenāvaśyameva kāryaṃ kartavyam,
SA15arhebt2u:389_3: anyathāpi darśanāt iti manyamāna aha paraḥ- “kuvindādayaḥ” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:389_5: devānāṃpriyaḥ ṛjuḥ mūrkho va sukhasaṃvarddhitatvāt ramaṇasvabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:389_8: yo hyanabhiyukto durbuddhiśca sa “kṛtamapi” vastu vismaraṇaprakṛtitvāt punaḥ punaḥ “kārayatīti” punaḥ pratividhāpayati /
SA15arhebt2u:390_0: tadevamakṣaṇikasya samarthasvabhāvatve sahitasyaiva kāryakriyāsvabhāvatvavirodhāt kevalasyākriyānupapanneti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tasmāt tatsvabhāvasya” kāryakriyāsamarthasya “anyathātvāsambhā(mbha)vāt” kadācidasamarthatvābhāvāt “taddharmaṇaḥ” kāryakriyādharmaṇaḥ tathābhāvaḥ kāryakriyā “antyāvasthāvat” sahitāvasthāyāmiva “anivāryaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:392_1: tataḥ kevalo na karoti, sahitāvasthāyāṃ tvasya sāmarthyaṃ sahakāribhyo jāyate /
SA15arhebt2u:392_2: tataḥ sahita eva karotītyata āha- “antyāvasthāyāṃ sāmarthyotpattau” kīdṛśasya “prāgasamarthasya” sataḥ “tasya sāmarthyasya” yasya tadupajāyate “tatsvabhāvatve” mīmāṃsakādibhiriṣyamāṇe /
SA15arhebt2u:392_3: [Hbṭ_120] nahi teṣāṃ samarthasya sāmarthyasya ca svabhāvabhedo 'bhimataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:392_4: kathañcit tadbhede 'pi tatsvabhāvatayaiva pratīyamānatvāditi te manyante /
SA15arhebt2u:392_5: “apūrvotpattireva sā” apūrvasyaiva vastunaḥ sā utpattiryā tatsvabhāvasya sāmarthyasya /
SA15arhebt2u:392_6: nahyekasvabhāvatve sāmarthyamevāpūrvamupajātaṃ na samarthaḥ iti yuktam,
SA15arhebt2u:393_0: nanu pratīyamāne eva sāmarthyatadvatorutpattyanutpattī ekasvabhāvatā ca kathaṃ ninhotuṃ śakyate? iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:393_1: na / apramāṇena pratīteḥ, anyathā pratītyanusāriṇā bhavatā dvicandrādayo 'pi na ninhotavyāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:393_3: ihāpi vastuna ekasvabhāvasyotpattyanutpattī parasparaviruddhe bādhike kiṃ neṣyete? /
SA15arhebt2u:393_4: vyavasthitasyaiva vajropalāderddharmiṇaḥ tatsvabhāvaṃ sāmarthyamutpannamiti ca purvāparakālayorapratibhāsamānavivekaḥ kathaṃ pratīyāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:394_0: vijñānādikāryasyānutpattiyaugapadyodayaprasaṅgāt cakṣurādisānnidhye prāgasat tat sāmarthyamutpannaṃ kramavacceti niścaya iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:394_1: yadyevamekākāratayā pūrvāparakālayoradhikṛtaṃ pratyabhijñānamupajāyamānamapūrvasāmarthyapratibhāsaviviktopalādigrāhyapyanumānādarthāpattito vā bādhāmanubhavanna pramāṇamityupagataṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:394_2: tathā, utpattnutpattyorekasvabhāvatāyāṃ virodhāt samarthasyaivāpūrvasyotpattiḥ sadṛśāparabhavagrahakṛtaścārvāgdarśanānāmekatvavibhramo lūnapunarjjāteṣviva keśanakhādiṣviti kiṃ neṣyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:396_0: atha sāmarthyaṃ sahakāripratyayasānnidhyalakṣaṇamevetyatatsvabhāvamiti nāpūrvotpattiprasaṅga iti naiyāyikādayo manyeran atrāha- “atatsvabhāvatve” sāmarthyasyeṣyamāṇe “sa” bījādiḥ padārthaḥ “prāgiva” tadrūpāparityāgāt “paścādapyakāraka eva” /
SA15arhebt2u:396_1: [Hbṭ_121] kuta? / sāmarthyamityākhyā yasya padārthāntarasya sahakāripratyayasānnidhyalakṣaṇasya sa evātiśaya[śabda]vācya iti naiyāyikairabhyupagamāt /
SA15arhebt2u:396_3: te 'pi sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ yadyakṣaṇikāḥ teṣvapyevaṃ prasaṅgo 'nivārita eveti kṣaṇikatevaikārtha[kriyā]pratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvamicchato 'bhyupeyā /
SA15arhebt2u:397_1: yo 'sāvakṣaṇiko bhāvaḥ sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu svakāryaṃ karotītīṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:397_3: yena hi kāraṇena tatkāryakriyāsvabhāvatvena tadā karoti tene(nai)va sthirasvabhāvatvāt prāgapi kuryāt,
SA15arhebt2u:398_0: “kā cānyā mṛgyate yuktiḥ yathā tad dṛśyate tathā” iti sarvatreyamapratihatā yuktiriti manyamānaḥ kumārilaḥ prāha- “kurvan dṛṣṭaḥ” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:398_1: yatastadaiva kāryaṃ kurvam(n) dṛṣṭo mayā “tena darśanabalena karotīti brūmaḥ”,
SA15arhebt2u:398_3: prāk tat kurvanna dṛṣṭaḥ tena na karotītyekārtha[kriyā]pratiniyamaḥ sidhyati akṣaṇikānāmapīti /
SA15arhebt2u:398_4: bhāvo hi kāryaṃ karoti tajjananasvabhāvatayā na darśanabalenādṛṣṭasyāpi svakāryakaraṇāt ato nedamuttaraṃ sambadhyata ityupahasannāha- “aho mahāsamarthyam” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:398_6: yasmādetadbhāvān kāryakaraṇasvabhāvavikalānapi- yadi kāryakaraṇasvabhāvatvād bhāvāḥ kāryaṃ kuryuḥ tadaitadevottaraṃ kiṃ noktam?,
SA15arhebt2u:398_7: yataḥ kāryakaraṇe darśanamuttarīkṛtamiti kṛtvā- “svabhāvamātreṇa” ātmasattāmātreṇa “nānāprakāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte” tat kathaṃ mahāsāmarthyaṃ na syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:398_8: na cātra me kācidakṣamā kintu “yadi nāma kiñcit” kāraṇaṃ “kathañcid” anādṛtasya vā vyākṣiptasya vā “atra bhavata” iti pūjāvacanam [Hbṭ_122] “darśanasya viṣayatāmatikrāmet” tadā “hanta” iti dainyodbhāvanametat,
SA15arhebt2u:398_9: aprasavo dharmo 'sya tadidam- “aprasavadharmakaṃ” tato 'petasantānaṃ “syādi”ti iyamasmākaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunoti /
SA15arhebt2u:399_3: tataḥ svakāryaṃ kurvanti / “tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe” ta ete kārakasvabhāvā iti /
SA15arhebt2u:400_0: siddhāntavādyāha- “satyam, idamapyasti” / kiṃ vayaṃ nyāyānurāgitayā nyāyyaṃ vacanamupalakṣayāmaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:400_1: uta bhavāneva sarvadā nyāyyavacanarahito 'pi kathañcinnyāyyamuktavān iti sañjātaparitoṣaḥ pṛcchati- kiṃ tad? ityāha- “svabhāvasteṣāṃ” bhāvānāṃ “kāryakriyādharmā” kāryakaraṇadharmā “tena” kāraṇena “samastāḥ” samagrāḥ pratyayāḥ sahakāriṇo yeṣāṃ teṣāmakṛtvā kāryaṃ “nopekṣāpattiḥ” naudāsīnyapratipattiḥ iti satyam- idamapyasti bhavato nyāyyaṃ vacanamiti,
SA15arhebt2u:400_2: kintu idamasi praṣṭavyaḥ- “sau['kṣepa]kriyādharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadaivāntyāvasthāyāṃ” samagrāvasthāyāṃ yadanantaraṃ kāryamutpadyate tadaiva “utpannaḥ? āhosvit prāgapi” parasparavirahāvasthāyāmapi “āsīt”? /
SA15arhebt2u:401_1: atatsvabhāvatve so 'kāraka eveti prāguktadoṣabhayāt para āha- “āsīt” /
SA15arhebt2u:401_3: tasya pratiṣedhaḥ “apracyuto 'nutpa(apracyutotpa)nnaḥ” sthira ekaḥ svabhāvo yeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ teṣāṃ kasmiṃścit kāle “kasyacit” svabhāvasya tatropalabdhasya “abhāvavirodhāt” /
SA15arhebt2u:401_4: kṣaṇikeṣveva hyekadā dṛṣṭaḥ svabhāvo 'nyadā na bhavet tadā tasyānyatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:402_2: syānmatam- naivedamanena vākyena sadṛśamasmadvākyamityāha- “ko vāsya” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:402_3: yadyetadanena tulya na bhavati tadā sakalasahakāryavasthāyāḥ “prāgapi” ayam “akṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ” avilambitakāryakaraṇasvabhāvaḥ “kāryaṃ ca na karotī”tyasya bhāṣitasyārtho vaktavya iti /
SA15arhebt2u:404_3: anyatvaṃ tu kasmādbhavati? ityata āha- “svabhāvabheda” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:404_7: nahi svabhāvādanyo bhāvaḥ yatastadbhede 'pi na bhidyeta,
SA15arhebt2u:405_0: nanu coktaṃ svato janakājanakasvabhāvatāvirahāt pratyayāntarabhāvādyapekṣatvāt janakājanakarūpatāyāstadbhede 'pi kuto bhāvabhedaprasaṅgaḥ?,
SA15arhebt2u:405_1: tasyāparāpekṣasvabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvāt ityata āha- “nahi sa sāhitye 'pi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:405_2: tadaitaduttaraṃ bhāvatkaṃ sambadhyeta yadi bhāvo yo 'sau paraḥ sahakāritvābhimataḥ sannidhīyate tadrūpeṇa kartā syāt na svarūpeṇa /
SA15arhebt2u:405_3: na caitadasti, tathābhāve hi paramārthataḥ sa eva paraḥ kartā syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:405_4: tatra tu kartṛtvavyapadeśaḥ kalpanānirmita eva bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:405_7: tataśca nāsyānupakāriṇo bhāvamapekṣeta kāryamiti tadrahitebhya eva [Hbṭ_124] sahakāribhyo bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:405_8: yadvā tebhyo 'pi na bhavet / teṣāmapi pararūpeṇa kartṛtve svayamakārakatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:405_9: tataḥ sarveṣāmevaṃ svayamakārakatve pararūpeṇāpyakārakatvāt sarvathā kārakoccheda eveti na kiñcit kutaścit jāyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:405_10: tasmāt svarūpeṇaiva bhāvaḥ svakāryasya kartā na pararūpeṇeti nāsyottarasyāvakāśaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:406_0: atha yena svarūpeṇāyaṃ janakastadasya sahitāsahitāvasthayoḥ sarvadāsti tadā svarūpaṃ ca svakāryajanakamasya sthirasvabhāvasya prāgapi sahitāvasthāyāstadeva yatsahitāvasthāyāmakṣepakriyāsvabhāvamiti tasmāt na kathaṃcit kāryakriyāvirāmaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:406_1: athavā kadācit paro brūyāt svahetubhirevāyaṃ pratyayāntarāpekṣaḥ svakāryajananasvabhāvo janita iti kevalo na karoti /
SA15arhebt2u:406_3: pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryajananasvabhāvatāyāḥ sarvadā bhāvāt ityata āha- “nahi sa sāhitye 'pi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:406_4: svarūpeṇaivāsya kartṛtvāt tasya ca prāgapi bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣāyāśca tato labhyasyātmātiśayasyābhāvenāyogāt upakāralakṣaṇatvādasya,
SA15arhebt2u:406_5: anyathātiprasaṅgāt, kevalasya kāryakaraṇamanivāryamiti akurvataḥ kathaṃ sahitāvasthāyā na bhedaḥ syāt? iti bhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:406_6: pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryakaraṇasvabhāva ityapi pararūpeṇākārakasya pratyayāntarasannidhānopalakṣitakāle kārakatvaṃ na prāgityayamarthaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:406_7: tataśca kadācit kāryakriyāsvabhāvo na sarvadā iti brūvatā kathaṃ sarvadā kāryajananasvabhāvatāsyoktā bhavati? /
SA15arhebt2u:406_8: nanvevaṃ svabhāvabheda evāsya tadatatkālayoḥ samarthitaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:407_1: yadi nāma kṣaṇikastathāpi kinna bhavati? ityāha- “uktaṃ yādṛśasya” sahakāribhirapṛthagbhāvinaḥ “kriyā” /
SA15arhebt2u:407_2: ‘te samarthā [Hbṭ_125] eva svabhāvato 'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti';
SA15arhebt2u:407_3: ityatra / “sa kathamekakṣaṇabhāvī” ekasminnevāntye kṣaṇe bhavanaśīlaḥ “anyathā bhavet” antyakṣaṇāt prāk paścāt pṛthagvā bhavet? “yaśca” anyathā “bhavati sa” evāntyakṣaṇabhāvī sahakārisantānopakṛtasvabhāvo 'kṣepakriyādharmā “na bhavatīti nāyam” akṣaṇīkapakṣoditaḥ “prasaṅgaḥ” kṣaṇikapakṣe /
SA15arhebt2u:407_4: kutaḥ? / “kārakākārakayoḥ” ityādi / kārako 'ntyaḥ akārakastadanyaḥ tayoryaḥ “svabhāvaḥ” sa bhinno 'pi bhedāvivakṣayaikatvenoktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:407_7: tena kārakākārakayoryau svabhāvau tayorekatra dharmiṇi virodhāt /
SA15arhebt2u:407_8: tathā tayoḥ svabhāvayorjanakau yau hetū- ekaḥ kārakasvabhāvajanako 'nyaścākārakasvabhāvajanakaḥ- tayorapyekatra dharmiṇi virodhāt,
SA15arhebt2u:407_9: anyatve sati / akārakasvabhāvajanakahetorutpannasyākārakasya svabhāvasyānyatvāt “yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti nāyaṃ prasaṅga” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:409_0: aparastvanyathā śirarūpeṣvekārthakriyāpratiniyamaṃ kalpitavān tamupanyasyati “yo 'pi manyate” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:409_2: na tu yathā kecid brū(bru)vate- sahakārisannidhānāpekṣā vastūnāṃ karakasvabhāvavyavasthā,
SA15arhebt2u:409_3: na svata iti / svato 'kārakatve pararūpeṇa kārakatvāyogāt karakavyavasthocchedaprasaṅgāt /
SA15arhebt2u:409_4: sa evaṃvidhasvabhāvo na kadācit sāhityaṃ svakāryakaraṇe 'pekṣate yato 'nyaḥ sahito 'nyaśca kevalaḥ kārakākārakasvabhāvabhedāt syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:409_5: sa tarhi sarvadā tatsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ kinna karoti? iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:409_6: kāryasya pratyayāntarāpekṣasvabhāvatayā tasmiṃ (smin) sarvadā janakatvenāvasthite 'pi kevalādabhāvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:409_7: tenātra kāryamevāparādhyati, yat tasmiṃ(smin) kevale janakatayāvasthite 'pi pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:409_8: tataḥ [Hbṭ_126] tadātmanaḥ kāryasya sahitebhya eva bhāvādekārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvamakṣaṇikānāmapyupapadyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:409_9: siddhāntavādī pūrvadoṣānatikramamasya darśayannāha- “tasyāpi” evaṃvādinaḥ “kathaṃ sa” nityābhimato bhāvaḥ “kevalaḥ karotyeva” ‘
SA15arhebt2u:409_11: iti vacanāt / kāryaṃ ca sahitebhya eva bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:409_13: iti vacanāt / tasmāt kevalānna bhavatīti “tadavastho virodho” yaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:409_14: tathāhi- yadyakṣepakriyādharmā tadāvaśyamanena kāryaṃ kartavyam na cedavaśyaṃ karoti kathamakṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:410_0: akṣepeṇā kāryadarśanādakṣepakriyāsvabhāvatāvagamyate nānyathā iti parābhiprāyāśaṅkayāha- “na kevalaḥ” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:410_1: naivaṃ mayoktaṃ kevalaḥ karotyeveti kintvakṣepakriyāsvabhāva iti /
SA15arhebt2u:410_3: yadi karotyeveti neṣyate kathamakṣepakriyāsvabhāva iti kathyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:410_4: atha tathocyate tathā nanvetadevānena “vacasā paridīpitam” abhihitaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:410_5: kiṃ tat? / karotyeveti / sa eva hyakṣepakriyāsvabhāvo yaḥ karotyeva,
SA15arhebt2u:410_6: yastu nāvaśyaṃ karoti sa kathaṃ tadrūpaḥ syat? /
SA15arhebt2u:410_8: iti tadapyayuktam, yataḥ “kāryaṃ” cāyamakṣaṇiko bhāvaḥ “kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ san paraṃ” pratyayāntaram “apekṣamāṇaṃ kathamupekṣeta?” naiva /
SA15arhebt2u:410_10: āha- “paraṃ” pratyayāntaram “anādṛtya” tiraskṛtya etat kāryaṃ “prasahya” haṭhāt “kuryāt” /
SA15arhebt2u:410_11: ka evaṃ satyasya guṇo bhavati? iti cet,
SA15arhebt2u:410_12: āha- “evaṃ hi” paramanādṛtya haṭhāt svakāryaṃ “kurvatānena” kevalenāpi samarthena satā yat tadātmanaḥ kevalasyāpi “sāmarthyaṃ” tad “darśitaṃ” prakāśitaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:410_13: anyathānyasahitasyaiva karaṇāt kevalasya ca kadācidapyakaraṇāt na ‘
SA15arhebt2u:410_14: ayaṃ kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ'; iti pareṣāṃ buddhiḥ syāt / tato 'yaṃ tiraskṛtaprabhāva iva kathaṃ bhrājeta? /
SA15arhebt2u:411_1: kāryāpekṣayāpi virodhasya tādavasthyaṃ darśayannāha- “kāryaṃ param” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:411_2: kāryasya parāpekṣāṃ brūvan kevalāt kāraṇādanutpattimasya kathayasi,
SA15arhebt2u:411_3: ‘sa kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ'; itīdaṃ vadaṃstataḥ kevalādutpattiṃ kāryasya brūṣe /
SA15arhebt2u:411_4: ete caikasyaiva kāryasya / tat evaikasmāt kāraṇādutpattyanutpattī parasparaviruddhe “kathamekatra” kāryākhye dharmiṇi “syātām?” viruddhadharmādhyāsasya bhedalakṣaṇatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:411_5: ekatra te brūvāṇo ‘mātā ca vandhyā ca'; ityanena sadṛśaṃ brūṣa iti na pūrvoktadoṣānmucyase,
SA15arhebt2u:411_6: yata evamapi brūvāṇo viruddhameva brūte na ca lakṣayati “tat” tasmāt “ayam” akṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣasyānavadyatayā tadvādināṃ nirddoṣatāsampatsu amarṣalakṣaṇerṣyā eva śalyaṃ antarduḥkhahetutvāt tena vitudyamānāni vyathyamānāni marmāṇi yasya so “'yamīrṣyāśalyavitudyamānamarmā” varāko 'svasthacittatayā viruddhābhidhānamapyalakṣayan “viklavam” ākulaṃ pūrvāparāsambaddhaṃ “vikrośati” viroditi “iti” kṛtvā asvasthacittavacaneṣvanādarāt taddoṣodbhāvanasya sutarāṃ duḥkhotpādanena kṣatakṣāraniṣekatulyatvāt “upekṣāmeva” vipaścitānāṃ (ścitāṃ) kṛpādhanānām “arhatīti” /
SA15arhebt2u:412_0: tadevamakṣaṇikeṣu na kathañcidekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ sambhavatīti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tasmādidam” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:412_1: yeṣāṃ hi sthirarūpatayā pṛthagapi bhāvaḥ sambhavati teṣāmakṣaṇikānāṃ “pṛthak” kevalānāṃ “kāryakaraṇasambhavena” hetunā sahaiva kurvantīti sahakāritvaniyamāyogādidamekārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ kṣaṇikānāmeva /
SA15arhebt2u:414_0: nanu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇamapi sahakāritvaṃ bhāveṣu dṛśyate tat kathamuktaṃ prāk ‘
SA15arhebt2u:414_4: [Hbṭ_128] ekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva sahakāritvaṃ sarvatra na kvacidatiśayotpādanaṃ sambhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:414_5: yatra tu santānopakāreṇa pūrvapūrvapratyayebhyo viśiṣṭaviśiṣṭatarottarottarakṣaṇajanena bhāvāḥ sahakāriṇo vivakṣitakāryasya hetutāṃ pratipadyante- yathā taṇḍulādibhya odanādijanmani dahanodakādayaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:414_6: bījādibhyaścāṅkurādijanmani pṛthivyādayaḥ- tatra viśeṣotpādanaṃ pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate loke /
SA15arhebt2u:414_7: santānāśrayeṇa pūrvakṣaṇebhyo dvitīyādiviśiṣṭakṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ santānākhyaṃ kāryamāśrṛ(śri)tya purvottarakṣaṇayorekatvādhyavasāyena tasyaivāyamatiśaya iti na dravyāśrayeṇa /
SA15arhebt2u:414_9: pūrvapūrvakṣaṇebhyastu svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmabhya uttarottaraviśeṣotpattau pūrvakāraṇakalāpasyaikārthakriyālakṣaṇameva tatra paramārthataḥ sahakāritvamiti na kācit kṣatiriti /
SA15arhebt2u:415_0: yadi tarhi kṣanike taṇḍulādidravye viśeṣo notpadyate,
SA15arhebt2u:415_1: anantaramapyasau mā bhūt / tato yathā parasparato viśeṣamanāsādayanto 'pi kṣaṇikāḥ sahitā eva kurvanti na kevalāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:415_3: na ca śakyaṃ vaktum- yo yasya prāgakārakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa paścādapīti /
SA15arhebt2u:416_1: arthā na pratibhāntīti gṛhyante nendriyaiḥ punaḥ //” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:417_1: viśeṣānutpattau sannidhānasyāpyasannidhānatulyatvāt dahanādibhāve 'pi taṇḍulādibhyo naudanajanma syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:417_2: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyate tadā prāgiva paścādapyarthapratipattiṃ naiva janayet /
SA15arhebt2u:417_3: tasmādyadasambhavi [Hbṭ_129] kāryaṃ yatra dṛśyate tasya tato 'nyatvameva,
SA15arhebt2u:417_4: śālibījādiva kodravabījasyeti niratiśayādanyatvameva sātiśayatayā tatkāryakāriṇa iti /
SA15arhebt2u:417_5: evaṃ tāvad yatra sahakāribhyaḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ bhavati tatrātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇamaupacārikaṃ sahakāritvamekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva tu mukhyaṃ tatrāpīti pratipāditam /
SA15arhebt2u:418_0: yatra tvakṣepeṇaivārthasannidhimātreṇa sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvanti kiṃ tatrāpi santānāśrayamatiśayotpādanamasti? ityata āha- “akṣepakāriṣu” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:418_1: ‘ye hyavyavadhānādideśā indriyādayaḥ svahetubhyo jātāsteṣvavilambitakāriṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:419_0: yadi na viśeṣotpattiḥ tadā kathaṃ nirviśeṣā jñānasya kāraṇībhavanti? ityata āha- “tatra yathāsvaṃ” yasya ye ātmīyāḥ pratyayāḥ taiḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:419_1: “parasparopasarpaṇavyavadhānādivirahāderāśrayabhūtairye jātāḥ” yogyaścāsāvatyāsannatvātiviprakarṣavirahād deśaśca sa ādiryasyāvyavahitadeśādeḥ tatrāvasthānamavasthā yeṣāṃ “te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā” svabhāvaniṣpattirvidyata ityeva kṛtvā “jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyante” tatra kiṃ parasparato viśeṣotpattyā prārthitayā? /
SA15arhebt2u:419_2: yadi hi svahetubhya eva parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayebhyaḥ svakāryajananakṣamā yogyadeśādyavasthānalakṣaṇaviśeṣayogino notpadyeran,
SA15arhebt2u:419_5: yata evaṃ “iti” tasmāt “tatra”teṣu akṣepakāriṣvindriyādiṣu “ekārthakriyaiva” mukhyaṃ “sahakāritvaṃ” na santānāśrayeṇa vyavasthāpyamānamatiśayotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ gauṇamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:420_0: atha viśeṣotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ kathaṃ na vyavasthāpyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:420_1: tadapi hi loke pratītatvād vyavasthāpanīyamevetyata āha- “yatra tu” kārye nāvyavadhānādideśopanipātamātreṇaivendriyādaya iva sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayatāṃ pratipadyante,
SA15arhebt2u:420_2: kintu vivakṣitakāryotpādānuguṇaṃ [Hbṭ_130] pratikṣaṇaṃ prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ “tatra” kālakṣepabhāvini kārye kartavye “hetusantāno”'parāparakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇa ātmātiśayāsādanārthaṃ sahakārīṇi pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣate,
SA15arhebt2u:420_5: paramārthatastu tatrāpi pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pratyayakalāpa uttarottarakāryotpādānuguṇe viśiṣṭakṣaṇe pratiniyata ityekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva sahakāritvamanubhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:421_1: yataḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ nirvartayantītyata āha- “tatra svarasataḥ” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:421_2: “tatra” tasmin hetusantāne ye hetava upādānakāraṇākhyāḥ ye ca pratyayāḥ sahakārisaṃjñitāsteṣāṃ ye pūrve prathama upanipātakṣaṇāḥ teṣāṃ vināśahetvanapekṣitayā svarasato nivṛttau satyāṃ tebhya eva svarasato nivartamānebhyaḥ prathamakṣaṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇena viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭasya kṣaṇasyotpattiḥ tebhyo 'nuguṇataraviśeṣavatāṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇānāṃ tebhyonuguṇatamaviśeṣavatāṃ caturthakṣaṇānām;
SA15arhebt2u:421_3: evaṃ yāvadatyantātiśayavānantyaḥ kāraṇakalāpo jātaḥ tataḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ ityevaṃ sahakāribhyaḥ svabhāvāntarapratilambhaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:422_1: jātāvekavacanam, yat samutpannaviśeṣamanantaroktena prakāreṇa kāraṇaṃ antyasāmagrīkṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ tato 'ṅkurādikāryotpattau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tasyaiva viśeṣasyādyasya kāryotpādanānuguṇasya yaḥ krameṇābhivarddhamānaḥ kāryasya janaka iṣyate tasyaiva utpattirna syāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātināṃ parasparato viśeṣānāsādanāt kṣaṇānāmavivekāt anabhyupagamācca /
SA15arhebt2u:423_0: parasparato 'navāptaviśeṣā eva kāryotpādanānuguṇaṃ viśeṣamārapsyanta iti cedāha- “aviśiṣṭāda” viśiṣṭebhyaḥ parasparato “viśeṣasya” [Hbṭ_131] kāryotpādānuguṇasyotpattāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ “kāryasya” aṅkurādeḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:423_1: viśeṣābhāvādityabhiprāyaḥ / tataśca parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvīran /
SA15arhebt2u:424_1: āha- “tena” yena kṣaṇikā api parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣā eva svakāryaṃ kurvanti ekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ ca sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyante tena kāraṇena “akṣaṇikānāmapi kāraṇatā syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:424_2: apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥ svabhāvātiśayotpatiśca na syāt” ityakṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣeṇa svapakṣasya sāmyamāpādayati /
SA15arhebt2u:425_1: ajñatā vā yataḥ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣvapi tatsamam //
SA15arhebt2u:426_0: iti / tatraitat syāt prathamakṣaṇe 'pi kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparataḥ samutpannaviśeṣā eva sannidhīyante-
SA15arhebt2u:428_0: iti nyāyāddhi dūradeśavartināmapi hetuphalabhāvāt ityāśaṅkayāha- “atha sahakāriṇā” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:428_1: sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasamparkavikalā api vastudharmatayaivānyonyamupakurvantīti śahakāriṇā kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajananāya kṛtaviśeṣa eva samparkakāla upatiṣṭheta,
SA15arhebt2u:428_2: evaṃ satyanavasthā syāt / tathā hi- tadviśeṣotpattāvapyaparaḥ sahakārikṛto viśeṣo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:429_0: atha naivaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaṇimittamaparaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurvanti,
SA15arhebt2u:429_1: svabhāvata eva tatra teṣāṃ yogyatvāt ityata āha- “na ca” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:429_2: naiva hi sahakāriṇaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadutpādane “nityaṃ” sarvakālaṃ yogyāvasthā “yena” yogyāvasthatvena “nityānuṣaktaḥ” nityānubaddhaḥ “eṣāṃ” kṣitibījādīnāṃ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanako [Hbṭ_132] viśeṣaḥ syāt yataḥ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:430_1: teṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnāmupāye- yogyadeśopanipāte kāryavyaktidarśanāt apāye ca- parasparasamparkavirāme kāryānutpattidarśanāt /
SA15arhebt2u:430_2: yadi hi kāryotpādanuguṇaviśeṣotpādane sarvadā yogyāvasthāḥ syuḥ tadā so 'pi viśeṣaḥ sarvadā syat /
SA15arhebt2u:430_3: tatastatparamparābhāvi kāryamiti tadupāyāpāyayoḥ kāryasyotpattyanutpattī na syātām /
SA15arhebt2u:430_5: yataḥ sahakāriṇā pṛthagavasthitenānavasthābhayāt kṛtaviśeṣo nopatiṣṭhate parasparataśca prathamasamparkakṣaṇabhāvināṃ nopeyate yujyate vā /
SA15arhebt2u:430_6: tena kāraṇenādyo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ samānakālatayā nirupakārasya kṣitibījādeḥ “notpadyate”,
SA15arhebt2u:430_7: utpadyate cāsau itīṣyate / tena samagrāvasthāvat sarveṣāṃ vyagrāvasthābhāvināmapi kṣaṇānāmaviśeṣāt tajjananasvabhāvatve 'pyajananāt samagrāvasthāyāmeva jananād /
SA15arhebt2u:430_8: yathā kṣaṇikānāmekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ tathā sthirasvabhāvānāmapi bhaviṣyatīti kṣinasarvopāyo 'kṣaṇikavādī sāmyamevātura iva bahumanyamānastatraiva bharaṃ kṛtavān /
SA15arhebt2u:431_0: siddhāntavādī bhaṅgyā paramupahasannāha- “nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punaḥ” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:431_1: yadi punaḥ punarvacane 'pi lokasya nyāyapratītirbhavati śataśo 'pi brūmaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:431_3: nahi parārthapravṛttānāmasmākaṃ punaḥ punarabhidhāne kaścidudvego bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:431_4: evaṃvādinaśca śāstrakṛtaḥ kvacit prakārāntareṇa tamevārthaṃ sphuṭīkurvato ye punaruktatāaprihārāya yatante sa teṣāmasthānapariśrama eva /
SA15arhebt2u:431_5: yadi nodvego hanta tarhyucyatām ityata āha- “na viśeṣotpādanādeva” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:431_6: naiva viśeṣotpādanāt sahakāriṇāṃ [Hbṭ_133] sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ kvacit sambhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:431_7: yataḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvināṃ bījādīnāṃ tadabhāvāt kāryotpādānuguṇe viśeṣe kartavye sahakāritāvirahaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:431_8: kintvekārthākriyaiva sahakāriṇāṃ pāramārthikaṃ sahakāritvaṃ pūrvoktābhiryuktibhiḥ sambhāvyate /
SA15arhebt2u:431_9: sā ca prathamamasamparkabhājāmastyeveti kiṃ na sahakāriṇaḥ syuḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:432_0: para āha- sāpyekārthakriyā na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
SA15arhebt2u:432_1: yadi punaḥ parasparato viśeṣarahitānāmapi tadekārthakriyāṅgikriyate tadā pratyekaṃ tadavasthāyāṃ tadutpādanasāmarthyābhyupagamāt tadavasthāyāmiva pṛthagapi sā bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:432_2: tathāhi- te tadavasthāyāmapi parasparato nirviśeṣā eva kurvanti /
SA15arhebt2u:432_3: teṣāṃ pṛthagapi tadviśeṣakriyā kathamiva na prasajyeta? /
SA15arhebt2u:432_5: bhavatu, ko doṣaḥ? iti cet; “tathā ca” kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣasya pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge sati “tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlam” aṅkurādi “kāryamapi” viśeṣavat kevalāt sahakāriṇaḥ syāt iti cenmanyase,
SA15arhebt2u:432_6: atrāpi sarvamuktamuttaram / tathā hi- saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayonnirviśeṣā eva kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvā iti yaducyate tat kiṃ tāvadviśeṣamātrāpekṣayā? āhosvit kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakaviśeṣāpekṣayā? /
SA15arhebt2u:432_12: kāraṇabhedāt / etāvattu syāt- kaścid viśeṣaḥ kvacit kārye 'nuguṇo na sarvaḥ sarvatreti /
SA15arhebt2u:432_14: ‘aparāparapratyayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yadyapi kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante,
SA15arhebt2u:432_22: tatra svarasataḥ pūrvakṣaṇanirodhe tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādād viśeṣotpattiḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:432_23: iti / atha kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakaviśeṣāpekṣayā prāgvat prathamasamparkabhājaḥ parasparato nirviśeṣā ityabhimataṃ tadapyayuktam /
SA15arhebt2u:432_24: yataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇasya viśeṣasya janakāḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ye vyavadhānādirahitatvenopanipātinaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:432_25: tadbhāva eva tasya bhāvāt etāvanmātranibandhanatvācca janakaṃ vya(kavya)vasthāyāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:432_26: te ca tathāvidhāḥ sarvadā na bhavantīti kathaṃ pṛthagapi kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambha eṣāṃ syāt?,
SA15arhebt2u:432_27: yataḥ kevalānāmapi kāryakriyā prasajyeta tad darśayati- yogyo deśo yeṣāṃ te yogyadeśāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:432_31: naivaṃvidhāḥ sarvadā bījādaya iti kathameṣāṃ pṛthagapi tathāvidhaviśeṣārambhaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:432_32: etadapi prāgevoktam ‘tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:432_33: iti vacanāt / tasya codāharaṇamātratvāt / ihāpi tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśaḥ kṣitibījādikalāpaḥ sa kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanane samartho heturiti pratīyata eva /
SA15arhebt2u:432_34: sa ca tathāvidhoviśeṣaḥ sarvadā na bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:432_36: etadapi pūrvamevoktamityāha- teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣa[janane] viśeṣavatāṃ yata utpattistadapyuktamasakṛdeva ‘
SA15arhebt2u:432_37: yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samartho hetuḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:432_38: iti / tathā ‘yathāsvaṃ pratyayaiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayairye [Hbṭ_135] yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyanta';
SA15arhebt2u:432_39: ityanena, ihāpi gamyamānatvāt / tato yadyapyeṣāṃ parasparato 'nupapatterviśeṣo na bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:432_41: na ca svahetuta eva sañjātaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhāve parasparatastadāśaṃsā,
SA15arhebt2u:432_43: teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthye 'pi khaṇḍaśaḥ kāryotpādāyogāt sakalasyaiva pratyekaṃ karaṇāt /
SA15arhebt2u:432_45: teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścāt na pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānapi pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvabhāvino doṣā nopalīyante';
SA15arhebt2u:432_46: ityādivacanāt / tatastathāvidhaviśeṣasya svopādānamātranibandhanasyānabhyupagamena kevalānāmaprasaṅgāt kutaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambhadvārakaṃ kāryamapi syāditi? /
SA15arhebt2u:433_0: kutaḥ punarayaṃ kāmacāro labhyate yadaṅkurādikāryaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇāṃ viśeṣaparamparāṃ janayantaḥ kurvanti,
SA15arhebt2u:433_1: kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ tu viśeṣaṃ vyavadhānādirahitadeśopanipātamātreṇetyata āha- “kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca yasmāt tasmādevaṃ vibhajyate” /
SA15arhebt2u:433_2: kathaṃ dvaividhyaṃ kāryāṇāmiti? ata āha- sahakāribhiravyavadhānādideśairanantaraṃ sañjanitāḥ parasparasya prāgavasthāpekṣaviśiṣṭakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā ye viśeṣāstatparamparayā uttarottaraviśiṣṭaviśiṣṭatarādikṣaṇabhavarūpayā utpattirddharmo yasya tadātmakamekaṃ kāryam /
SA15arhebt2u:433_3: anyacca tadviparītaṃ yat sahakārisannidhimātreṇa bhavati na parasparakṛtāṃ viśeṣaparamparāmapekṣate /
SA15arhebt2u:433_7: kuta etad? iti cet ; kāryakāraṇayoḥ [Hbṭ_136] svabhāvabhedāt /
SA15arhebt2u:433_10: kāraṇamapi kiñcit svasannidhimātreṇa kāryajananasvabhāvaṃ svakāraṇebhya eva bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:433_14: tadviparītaṃ cāparam / śālyaṅkuraśca tabdījajanyasvabhāvo na yavādībījajanyasvabhāva iti na bhāvānāṃ svahetubalāyātāḥ pramāṇādhigatāḥ svabhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:433_15: ye tu yajjananasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇato 'dhigatāḥ te kiṃ sarvadaiva tatsvabhāvāḥ? āhosvit tadaiva? ityatra cintā pravartate /
SA15arhebt2u:433_16: tatra sarvadā tatsvabhāvatve paścādiva prāgapi tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena pararūpeṇākārakasya bhinnasvabhāvatā kārakākārakāvasthayoḥ śāliyavabījādīnāmiva tattvacintakairūcyate /
SA15arhebt2u:433_17: sadṛśāparabhāvanibandhanaṃ caikatayā pratyabhijñānaṃ lūnapunarjāteṣviva keśanakhādiṣu ityatra virodhābhāvāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:433_19: “tatrai”tasmiṃ(smin) sati “sahakāribhyaḥ” kṣitibījādibhyasteṣāṃ parasparasantānopakāramapekṣate yat kāraṇamantyāvasthāprāptaṃ tasya yat kāryamaṅkurādikaṃ tajjanmanimittaṃ “sahakāriṇāṃ” prathamakṣaṇāntaraṃ viśiṣṭadvitīyakṣaṇabhāvarūpo yo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ “ādyo” bhavati “sa teṣāṃ” sahakāriṇāṃ prathamasamparkabhājāṃ parasparakṛto yo viśeṣastajjanmā na bhavati parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayādeva pratyayaviśeṣāt tasya bhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:433_20: tataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇādādyād viśeṣāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātibhiḥ sahakāribhiranyataḥ samāsāditaviśeṣaiḥ janitāt tatprabhṛti “ye viśeṣāḥ” prakṛṣyamāṇataduttarottarakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā jāyante “te tajjanmānaḥ” sahakārikṛtaviśeṣajanmānaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:433_21: kutaḥ? “tatprakṛtitvāt” tasyādyasya viśeṣasya parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣādāsāditatadanukūlaviśeṣaiḥ sahakāribhiḥ parasparopakāranirapekṣairjanyasvabhāvatvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:433_24: atha sahakāriṇā kṣityādinā kuśūlādyavastho 'pi bījādiḥ tenāpi kṣityādiḥ kṛtaviśeṣa evopatiṣṭhetānavasthaivaṃ syāt iti /
SA15arhebt2u:433_27: yathā prathamasamprarkabhājaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya viśeṣamanādadhānāḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ viśeṣaṃ janayanti,
SA15arhebt2u:433_28: tathā sthirarūpā api bhāvāḥ tadekakāryapratiniyatāḥ parasparakṛtaviśeṣanirapekṣā eva bhaviṣyanti';
SA15arhebt2u:433_30: kṣaṇikavadakṣaniko 'pi yadi kāryaṃ karoti karotu nāma /
SA15arhebt2u:433_31: nā kaścid vārayati / kintu yena svabhāvena kāryaṃ karoti sa yadi “avilambitakāryakartṛdharmā” akṣepeṇa karotītyevaṃśīlo dharmo yasya sa tathoktaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:433_32: tadā “pṛthagbhāvasya sambhāvāt kevalo 'pi” na kevalaṃ sahitaḥ “tathā syāt” tatkāryakārakaḥ syādityuktaṃ bahuśaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:433_33: “atatsvabhāvastu” akṣepakartṛsvabhāvavikalastu “tadāpi” sahitāvasthāyāmapi prāgvat “akāraka eva” pararūpeṇa kartṛtvasya pūrvameva niṣedhāt /
SA15arhebt2u:434_0: tadevamekārthakriyayā viśeṣotpādanena cākṣaṇikānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ niṣidhyopasaṃharannāha- “tasmāt” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:434_1: dvividhasyāpi sahakāritvasyāyogānnaivākṣaṇikasya kaścit sahakārīti kevalo 'pi svakāryaṃ kuryāditi sahakāripratyayāpekṣasyākṣaṇikasya hetutāṃ bruvāṇasya kiṃ yuktamiti darśayannāha- “prāyastu” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:434_2: yo hi sthirahetuvādī tasya yadi sa hetuḥ pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣya kāryaṃ karoti tadā “vyaktam” avaśyaṃ tasya sthirasya hetoḥ pratyayāntarāpekṣakārakasya svabhāvāntarasyotpattiriti /
SA15arhebt2u:434_4: yataḥ sahakāriṇāṃ yaḥ “saṃghātaḥ” sannipātaḥ “tatsthāyī” tatra vartamāno bhāvasantānaḥ “prāyaḥ” bāhulyena “sahakāripratyayairupajanitaviśeṣaḥ” san “svakāryaṃ kurvan dṛṣṭo bījādivat” [Hbṭ_138] tasmādevaṃ vibhajyate /
SA15arhebt2u:434_8: tasyaiva hyakārakasya tadātmā kārakaḥ svabhāvo na yujyate na tvatadātmā /
SA15arhebt2u:435_0: atha matam- kārakasvabhāvāntarotpattiriṣyeta yadi sthirasya hetoḥ prāgapi kārakasvabhāvo na syat /
SA15arhebt2u:435_1: tasya tu prāgapi bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣā tadutpattirapyayukteti ata āha- “kārakasya” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:435_2: yadi hi samagrāvasthāyāḥ prāgapi kārakasvabhāvo bhavet tadāsyākriyā na yujyate,
SA15arhebt2u:435_5: na ca karoti / tasmāt so 'sya svabhāvaḥ prāṅnaivāsīt /
SA15arhebt2u:435_6: yadi ca pratyayāntarairapyasau na kriyeta tat kimiti mudhaiva tānyapekṣate? iti /
SA15arhebt2u:437_0: tadevaṃ ‘tatsvabhāvasya jananāt'; tyasya ‘yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetorevotpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati punastadbhāve hetvantaramapekṣate';
SA15arhebt2u:437_2: tatra yena nyāyena kṣaṇikānāṃ hetuphalasvabhāvaḥ tasyākṣaṇikeṣvasambhavaṃ pratipādayituṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ yadupakrāntaṃ tat parisamāpayya prakṛtamanubadhnannāha- “tasmād yo yadātmā” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:437_3: yadi svabhāvenāsthitidharmaṇo bhāvasya na nāśakāraṇaiḥ prayojanaṃ svabhāvena sthitidharmaṇo bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “sthitidharmaṇo 'pi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:437_4: sthitidharmaṇo 'pi hi naiva nāśakāraṇaiḥ kiñcit prayojanam /
SA15arhebt2u:437_5: tasya svahetubhyaḥ samupajāto yaḥ sthiraḥ svabhavaḥ tadanyathātvasyāsthirātmatāpatteḥ [Hbṭ_139] kenacit kartumaśakyatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:437_6: kāmaṃ hi bhāvāḥ svayaṃ na bhaveyuḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:437_7: na tu santa eva svaṃ svabhāvaṃ parityajanti /
SA15arhebt2u:437_8: atha sthitidharmaṇo 'pyanyathātvapratipattiriṣyate tadānyathātvapratipattau vā “tatsvabhāva eva” sthitidharmaiva “na syāt” ātmabhūtasyāsthitidharmaṇaḥ svabhāvasya paścāt sambhave prāgapyabhāvāyogāt /
SA15arhebt2u:437_12: ityuktam / tathā ca sati “pūrva” eva “vikalpaḥ” svabhāvenāsthitidharmā bhāva iti /
SA15arhebt2u:438_0: athāsau śirasvabhāva eva, kevalamasyāśirasvabhāvatā prāgasati vināśahetorupajāyate,
SA15arhebt2u:438_1: anyathā nivṛttyayogādityata āha- “yaśca parasmāt” nāśahetoḥ sthitidharmaṇaḥ sata “anyathābhāvaḥ” asthitidharmatālakṣaṇo bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:438_2: sa pūrvakāt sthitidharmaṇaḥ svahetusamudbhūtāt svabhāvāt “aparaḥ” anyaḥ “svabhāvastasminniṣpanne” paścā[jjanya]tvād bhinnahetukatvācca “kathaṃ tasya” svabhāvaḥ “syāt”? /
SA15arhebt2u:438_4: sārūpyādalakṣitavivekasya tathā pratibhāsanaṃ syāt yadyasau pūrvasvabhāve satyevānyato bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:438_9: atiprasaṅgāt / yo 'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ sa kimiti tasya na bhavati? ityata āha- “svabhāvabheda-” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:438_10: bhavatu vastvantarameva tadaparasvabhāvatayā ko doṣaḥ? ityata āha- “tathā ca” vastvantaratve sati vināśahetorupajāyamānasya svabhāvasya pūrvako bhāvaḥ svahetubhyo yaḥ sthitidharmā jātaḥ so 'cyutidharme sthito nivṛttibhāṅna bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:438_13: atiprasaṅgāt / tadupamarddena tadutpattau ca prāgeva proktam /
SA15arhebt2u:439_2: na ca pūrvakasya pracyutidharmatā ityata āha- “etena” anantaroktena “kaṭhinādīnām” ādiśabdād dravādīnāṃ tāmrasuvarṇādināmagniśītavātādibhyo dravatvakaṭhinatvādisvabhāvāntarotpattirvyavasthitarūpasya tāmrādeḥ “pratyuktā” pratyākhyātāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:440_0: kathaṃ tarhi svabhāvāntarotpattiḥ pūrvasya cāpracyutidharme sthitasyābhāvo yuktaḥ? ityāha- “tatrāpi” kaṭhinādirūpe tāmrādau “pūrvakasya” kaṭhinadravādirūpasya “svarasanirodhitvāt” vināśahetvayogena /
SA15arhebt2u:440_2: sahakāriṇaḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśraya pratyayaviśeṣopajātātiśayā “dupādānācca” yat tat kaṭhinādirūpaṃ tāmrādi svarasato nirudhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:440_3: tata eva upādānakāraṇādagnyādisahakārikāraṇopādānapratyayopajātaviśeṣād “apara eva” anya eva dravakaṭhinādisvabhāvo dravagrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:440_4: “utpanno” na tu pūrvakameva kaṭhinadravādirūpaṃ tāmrādi vyavasthitātmakaṃ dravakaṭhinādisvabhāvena pariṇatamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:441_3: ityādyucyate / kintu sa svayaṃ sthitidharmaiva svahetubhirjanito nāsyāsthirasvabhāvatā vināśahetorupajāyate /
SA15arhebt2u:441_4: kathaṃ jñāyate yathā ‘svahetubhiḥ svabhāvena sthitidharmaiva janitaḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:441_6: yadi svabhāvenāsthitidharmā svahetorjātaḥ syāt tadā tadasambhave 'pi nāvatiṣṭheta /
SA15arhebt2u:441_7: tasya svabhāvena sthitidharmaṇaḥ svahetubhirevāyamaparaḥ svabhāvo niyamito yaduta “parasmāt” virodhino 'gnyāde “rvināśaḥ svayaṃ bhavatīti” /
SA15arhebt2u:441_8: parasmāditi karmaṇi lyaplope pañcamī paramapekṣya ityarthaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:441_9: svahetubhirevāyaṃ niyamitasvabhāvo [Hbṭ_141] jāto yathā tvayā virodhinamapekṣya svayaṃ nirva(va)rtitavyamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:443_0: nanu yadyasya vināśao virodhisannidhāne svayameva bhavatyahetukaḥ prāpnoti,
SA15arhebt2u:443_1: ahetośca deśakālasvabhāvaniyamo na yukta ityata āha- “na ca” naiva vināśo nāma vinaṣṭuraparaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:443_4: nahi sā tasya bhavati / kevalamasau svayameva na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:444_1: kīdṛśaṃ vikalpadvayam? / ‘kiṃ nityo bhāvaḥ?'; ityādi / nanu ca kālāntarasthitiradharmatāmupagacchato naiva nityavikalpasyāvakāśaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:444_3: tathā hi- yadyayaṃ saṃvatsarasthitidharmā svahetubhirjanitastadā saṃvatsaraparisamāptau yo 'syādāvudayakāle saṃvatsarasthitidharmā svabhāvo yato 'yaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ sthitaḥ sa eva tadante 'pi /
SA15arhebt2u:444_5: tadante 'pi prathamotpannasaṃvatsarasthitidharmasvabhāvāparityāgādaparāparasaṃvatsarasthitiprasaṅgāt kālāntarasthitidharmatopagame 'pi nityataivopagatā bhavatīti nityavikalpo durnivāraḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:444_6: vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nivartata iti copagamādanityavikalpo naśvarātmatāvikalpaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:444_7: tathā hi- vināśahetvabhimatasannidhau svayaṃ vinaśyato yo 'sya svabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāvasyaikarūpatvādutpannamātrasyeti tadaiva vināśaprasaṅgāt kathamasya kālantarasthitidharmatā sambhavati? /
SA15arhebt2u:444_8: evaṃ vikalpe kṛte pāścātyavikalpopagame kālāntarasthitirevāsya truṭyatīti nityavikalpa evānenopagantavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:444_9: tatra vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nāśopagame prāṅnityo bhūtvā paścādanityo vinaśvarasvabhāvo bhavatīti brūte /
SA15arhebt2u:444_13: yo 'sau nityaḥ svabhāvaḥ prāktanaḥ tasya nityābhimatasya svayaṃ paścānnāśaṃ brūvāṇaḥ sarvadā pratikṣaṇameva nāśaṃ prāha /
SA15arhebt2u:444_15: atha pratikṣaṇamasya nāśo na bhavati tadā paścādapi tadayogāt sarvadaivānāśaṃ prāheti kṛtvā pūrvasminnityābhimate svabhāve vināśaheturasamartho 'kiñcitkara eva /
SA15arhebt2u:445_0: nanu ca vināśahetornaiva sāmarthyamupagataṃ parena virodhisannidhimapekṣya svayaṃ nāśopagamāt /
SA15arhebt2u:445_4: svahetava evātrāparādhyanti yadakiñcitkare 'pi tatrāpekṣāyāṃ niyuñjata iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:445_5: kaḥ punarayamasthānābhiniveśaḥ teṣāṃ yat tatra tathā niyuñjate /
SA15arhebt2u:446_0: yadapyuktaṃ ‘yathānyeṣāṃ kṣaṇikavādināmakiñcitkaramapi mugdarādikamapekṣya ghaṭādipravāho nivartate tathāsmākamapi kālāntarasthāyī bhāvaḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:446_2: yato nāsmākaṃ pravāho nāma kṣaṇavyatirikto 'sti yo 'kiñcitkaramugdarādisannidhau nivarteta /
SA15arhebt2u:446_3: kṣaṇā eva hi kevalaṃ santi / te ca svanivṛttau na mugdarādikamapekṣante,
SA15arhebt2u:446_4: svarasata eva nirodhāt / yā tu teṣāṃ kapālādivṛttilakṣaṇā paryudāsavṛttyā nivṛttiḥ yasyāṃ satyāmekatvābhiniveśino lokasya sadṛśāparabhāvarūpasya vibhramanimittasyāpagamāt ‘
SA15arhebt2u:446_5: nivṛttā ghaṭādayaḥ'; iti vyavahāraḥ, tatrākiñcitkaratvaṃ mugdarādīnāṃ naivāsti,
SA15arhebt2u:446_6: tadbhāva eva teṣāṃ bhāvāt / vegavanmugdarādisahakāriṇo ghaṭakṣaṇāt parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayāt [Hbṭ_143] pratyayaviśeṣāt sañjātātiśayāt kapāladerbhavanadharmatvāt tasya ca tajjannasvabhāvatvāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:447_0: svabhāvadvayopagamaprasaṅgāditi parijihīrṣayā para āha- “na prāg” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:447_1: kuta etat? / “ekasvabhāvatvāt” / sarvadaikasvabhāvasya sarvadā nityataiva na paścādanityasvabhāvatāsambhava iti /
SA15arhebt2u:448_0: siddhāntavādyāha- “sa tarhi bhāvaḥ” sarvadā nityasvabhāvaḥ svabhāvena “nāśamanāviśan” apratipadyamānaḥ kathaṃ naiva naṣṭo(kathaṃ naṣṭo) nāma? /
SA15arhebt2u:448_3: upasaṃharannāha- “yata evaṃ” sthitidharmaṇāṃ vināśo naiva yujyate tasmāt sati asya vināśe yadyavaśyambhāvī kṛtakarūpasya sato vināśa iṣyate paraistadā “vināśasvabhāvena”- vinaśyati nāvatiṣṭhata iti vināśaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:448_4: kartari bahulavacanād ghañ / sa svabhāvo yasya tena vināśasvabhāvenāsthitidharmaṇā /
SA15arhebt2u:448_5: “tena” kṛtakarūpeṇa satā vastunā svahetubhyo “bhavitavyam” anyathāvaśyambhāvitayopagatasya kṛtakātmanāṃ satāṃ vināśasyaivāyogāt /
SA15arhebt2u:449_0: bhavatvevam iti cet / āha- “tathāpi” svayaṃ vināśasvabhāvatve 'pi na kevalamavinaśvarasvabhāvatve svabhāvānyathātvāsambhavād vyartho vināśaheturiti prathamavikalpopanyāsa evoktam na punarucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:450_0: tadevaṃ vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣāmasāmarthya- vaiyarthyābhyāṃ taddhetvayogena kṛtakalakṣaṇasya sattvasya pūrvācāryadarśitāṃ pratipādya yathāsau viparyaye bādhakapramāṇatāmanubhavati tada darśayannāha- “tasmād vināśa” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:450_3: anapekṣaśca kṛtakarūpaḥ san bhāvo vināśe 'vaśyambhāvivināśatayopagataḥ [Hbṭ_144] parairiti svabhāvahetuprasaṅgaprayogo viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pūrvācāryapradarśitam /
SA15arhebt2u:450_4: “tataḥ” tadbhāvaniyatatve, nāśasyākādācitkatvādudayānantaraṃ nāśa iti “yaḥ san” kṛtakalakṣaṇo bhāvaḥ “sa vināśī” vinaśvarasvabhāvo naśvaratāyāḥ sādhyadharmasya nivṛttau ca kṛtakalakṣaṇasattvanivṛttiriti kṛtvā kṛtakalakṣaṇasya sattvasya kṣaṇikatāyāmanvayavyatirekasiddhiḥ sampadyate anapekṣayānukrāntasattvakṣaṇikatvayostādātmyasiddheḥ tannibandhanayoranvayavyatirekayorapi niścayāt /
SA15arhebt2u:451_0: tadevaṃ pūrvācāryān prati akṛtakasya sato 'bhāvāt “sadakāraṇavannityam” iti nityalakṣaṇavirahādeva na tannityatvam /
SA15arhebt2u:451_1: yattu sad utpattimat tad uktena nyāyenāvaśyaṃnāśitayopagataṃ paraiḥ kālāntarasthāyi na bhavatīti prati pāditam /
SA15arhebt2u:453_0: yadā tu yat sat tat kṣaṇikameveti sāmānyenocyate kṛtakākṛtakalakṣaṇaṃ sato bhedamanapekṣya prauḍhavāditayā kṛtakasyāpi cāvaśyambhāvī vināśa iti paropagamo nāpekṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:453_1: tadā vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvameva sarvasya na sidhyati /
SA15arhebt2u:453_2: yeṣāṃ hi vināśo bhavaṃ(van) dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnāṃ teṣāmeva taddhaitvayogat tatrānapekṣā yujyate /
SA15arhebt2u:453_3: ye tu deśādivyavahitāḥ parvatādayo vā vinaśāmāviśanto na dṛṣṭāḥ teṣāmavaśyaṃ vināśitvopagamanibandhanābhāvādantye 'pyayaṃ vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣa eva vinaśyanna'viśeṣādādāvapi tadbhāvaniyata iti vaktumaśakyatvāt tatsvabhāvasāpekṣatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:453_4: vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvāsiddherakṛtakānāṃ cākāśādīnāṃ vināśisvabhāvasāpekṣāṇāmityanapekṣayā sato naśvarasvabhāvatāsiddheḥ anvayavyatirekayostannibandhanayorayogamutpaśyannarthakriyāvirodhalakṣaṇameva tadā bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tādātmyaprasādhakamabhidhānīyamiti manyamānaḥ pūrvapakṣamutthāpayannāha- “svabhāvato” naśvaratve 'pyuktena [Hbṭ_145] nyāyena paridṛśyamānavināśānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ “kaścid” deśādivyavahitaḥ parvatādirvānupalabdhavināśaḥ kṛtako 'pi sadrūpa ākāśādirvākṛtakaḥ sanna “'tatsvabhāvo 'pi” avināśisvabhāvo 'pi syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:453_6: tataśca vināśisvabhāvasāpekṣatvāt tadanapekṣatvamasiddhamiti tadvaśāt sādhyasya kṣaṇikatvasya sattvasvabhāvatvāsiddheḥ tannibandhanā nānvayavyatirekasiddhiriti /
SA15arhebt2u:453_7: kiṃ punaratrāśaṅkānimittaṃ yena kaścidatatsvabhāvo 'pyāśaṅkayata ityāha- “na hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvaḥ” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:453_8: vicitrasvabhāvā hi bhāvā dṛśyante- kecit sapratighāḥ kecidapratighāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:453_9: tathā nīlānīlādisvabhāvāḥ, tathā kecidvināśinaḥ anye tvavināśisvabhāvāḥ śaṅkayanta iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā /
SA15arhebt2u:456_0: evaṃ manyate- iha tāvadidameva vicāraṇīyam kiṃlakṣaṇametad bhāvānāṃ sattvaṃ yuktamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:456_5: yadi ca satāmeva sattāyogaḥ evaṃ tarhyanyat sattvalakṣaṇamabhidhānīyam sattāyogasya ca vaiyarthyam,
SA15arhebt2u:456_6: tat eva vastunaḥ sattvāt / sarvārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahāt sattāyogābhāvasteṣāmiti [Hbṭ_146] cet /
SA15arhebt2u:456_7: evaṃ sati yadevārthakriyasāmarthyayuktaṃ tasyaiva sattāyoga ityarthakriyāsāmarthyameva bhāvalakṣaṇamāyātamityapārthakaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:456_8: sattāyogaḥ / “itthaṃ ca” evam / anyathā sāmānyādīnāṃ kathaṃ svarūpaṃ sattvaṃ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:457_4: yathā ca dhrauvyaṃ na tathotpādavyayāviti naikaṃ vastu yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:458_1: yasya tu na kvacicchaktiḥ sa evaikāntenābhāva ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:459_0: śaktilakṣaṇameva sattvamakṣaṇike syāt tataḥ kṣaṇikātmatā sattvasya na sidhyatīti kuto 'nvayavyatirekau? iti cet,
SA15arhebt2u:459_1: āha- “na caivākṣaṇikasya” kvacit kārye 'ntaśo jñānalakṣaṇe 'pi śaktirasti tat kutastasya tallakṣaṇaṃ sattvamatītāderiva bhaviṣyati?,
SA15arhebt2u:460_0: nanu ca śakteratīndriyatvāt kāraṇānāṃ kāryarambhaniyamābhāvācca kathaṃ tadviraho 'kṣaṇikasya bhavet yato 'sya sarvaśaktivirahalakṣaṇenāsattvena virodhinā nirākriyamāṇaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikātmatāmevānubhavet yato 'nvayavyatirekau syātāmityata āha- “kramayaugapadyābhyām” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:460_2: kintu tavdyāpakavirahāt / tathā hi- kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ kāryakriyā vyāptā prakārāntarābhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:460_3: tataḥ kāryakriyāśaktivyāpakayostayorakṣaṇikatve [Hbṭ_147] virodhāt nirvṛttestavdyāptāyāḥ kāryakriyāśakterapi nivṛttiriti sarvaśaktivirahalakṣaṇamasattvamakṣaṇikatve vyāpakānupalabdhirākarṣati,
SA15arhebt2u:460_4: viruddhayorekatrāyogāt / tato nivṛttaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣvevāvatiṣṭhamānaṃ tadātmatāmanubhavatīti- ‘
SA15arhebt2u:460_5: yat sat tat kṣaṇikameva'; ityanvayavyatirekarūpāyā vyāpteḥ siddhirniścayo bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:461_0: nanu ca prakārāntarābhāvāt kāryamaṅkurādikaṃ bījādinā kramayaugapadyābhyāmeva kriyata ityucyate sa eva tu prakārāntaravirahaḥ kāryātmanaḥ kutaḥ siddhaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:461_4: tataḥ prakarāntareṇārthakriyāsambhavāt kramayaugapadyanivṛttāvapi nārthakriyāsāmarthyanivṛttiriti kuto 'kṣaṇikatve sati sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇamasattvam?,
SA15arhebt2u:461_6: na / ubhayathāpyadoṣāt / tathā hi- kramo nāma paripāṭiḥ kāryāntarāsāhityaṃ kaivalyamaṅkurādeḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:461_9: tasya cāṅkurādisvabhāvasyānyasahitasya kevalasya vābhāve pratyakṣabodhagamyamāne satyupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta eva svabhāvaḥ kramayaugapadyabhāvabahirbhūto nopalabhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:461_10: vastunaḥ upalabhyasyānyasāhitye kaivalye cāpanīte tadviviktadeśādipratibhāsinaḥ pratyakṣasyodayāt svabhāvānupalambhata evābhāvaniścayādilakṣaṇavyavahāravṛtteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:461_11: tasya cāṅkurādibhāvasyāvasthādvayabahirbhāvaniṣedhe kayościddeśakālayoḥ deśāntarādau krameṇāṅkurādibhāvavatīratarasmin vā bhāve 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:461_12: tataḥ pratyakṣata eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddheḥ kathaṃ kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāśaktiravyāptā syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:461_13: śāstrakārastu yathā pratyakṣata eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddhiḥ tathā svayam “etena kramākramādayo 'pī”ti atidiśan vakṣyati /
SA15arhebt2u:462_1: anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatve 'pi prakārāntarasya kramayaugapadyayoranyo 'nyavya vacchedarūpatvādevāśrayasi (devābhāvasi)ddhi tathāhi- anyonyavyavacchedarūpāṇāmekaniṣedhenāparavidhānāt tasyāpratiṣedhe vidhipratiṣedhayorvirodhādubhayapratiṣedhātmanaḥ prakārāntarasya kutaḥ sambhavaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:462_2: atra prayogaḥ- yatra yatprakāravyavacchedena yaditaraprakāravyavasthānaṃ na tatra prakārāntarasambhavaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:462_4: asti ca kramayaugapadyayoranyataraprakāravyavacchedena taditaraprakāravyavasthānaṃ vyavacchidyamānaprakārāviṣayīkṛte sarvatra kāryakāraṇarūpe vastunīti viruddhopalabdhiḥ vyavacchidyamānaprakāretaravyavasthānaṃ ca,
SA15arhebt2u:462_8: viruddhopalabdhiṣu bahirddharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvamupadarśya virodhasādhanameva bādhakam,
SA15arhebt2u:462_9: taccehāsti / tato viruddhayorekatrāsambhāvāt pratiyogyabhāvaniścayaḥ śītoṣṇasparśayoriva bhāvābhāvayoriva veti kuto 'navasthā? /
SA15arhebt2u:463_4: nāpi yugapat, pratyakṣādivirodhāt, punastatkriyāprasaṅgācca / kṛtatvānneti cet, na, sāmarthyānapāyāt / anyathā prāgapyakārakarūpaviśeṣādakriyā syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:463_7: nityaśca yadā yugapat karoti tataḥ prāgapi bhāvāt tadaiva tatkriyāprasaṅgaḥ punastato 'pi pūrvataram ityevaṃ na kadācidyugapat kriyā syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:463_8: pūrvottarakālayoścaikadā yugapatkāriṇo 'nyadā sarvārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇamasattvaṃ [Hbṭ_149] syāditi kathaṃ na kṣaṇikatā? /
SA15arhebt2u:463_10: tatra cokto doṣaḥ / evamakṣaṇikatve sati cakṣurādyāyatanānāmasattvaprasaṅgāt kṣaṇikatāyāmeva sattvamiti yat sat tat kṣaṇikameveti sato naśvarātmatāsiddheḥ anvayavyatirekarūpavyāptisiddhiriti /
SA15arhebt2u:465_0: tadevaṃ svabhāvahetau tādātmyasiddhinibandhanamanvayavyatirekaniścayaṃ pratipādya kāryahetau kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhinimittatvāt tayostasyāśca pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanāyāḥ prāgeva darśitatvāt tagdatamaparamapi pareṣāṃ bhrāntikāraṇapanetuṃ tadviṣayaṃ darśayannāha- “arthāntare” hetorvyatirikte vastuni gamye “kāryaṃ hetuḥ” /
SA15arhebt2u:465_2: kasmāt punararthāntare kāryameva heturityāha- “avyabhicārāt” iti kāryameva hyarthāntaraṃ na vyabhicarati nānyat yathoktaṃ prāk tataḥ kāryamevārthāntare gamye heturucyate saṃyogavaśāgdamakatve /
SA15arhebt2u:466_0: “na ca kenacit” ityādinā yaḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaprasaṅga ācāryeṇoktaḥ parasya,
SA15arhebt2u:466_1: tamihāpi kāryahetau paraḥ kadācit prasañjayedityāśaṅkamāna āha- “kāryakāraṇa- “ ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:466_2: yadi hi kāryaṃ heturucyate tadā kāryakāraṇabhāvena kāraṇenāsya gamakatvam /
SA15arhebt2u:466_3: tathā ca sati sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
SA15arhebt2u:466_4: agneḥ sāmānyadharmavad viśeṣadharmā api tārṇapārṇādayo gamyāḥ syuḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:466_5: dhūmasyāpi viśeṣadharmavad dravyatvapārthivatvādayo 'pi sāmānyadharmā gamakā bhaveyuḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:466_8: sa ca nāgnidhūmayoraṃśena api tu sarveṇa prakāreṇa /
SA15arhebt2u:466_9: tathāhi- yathā agniragnitvadravyatvasattvādibhiḥ sāmānyadharmairjanakaḥ tathā tārṇapārṇatvādibhirviśeṣadharmairapi,
SA15arhebt2u:466_10: yathā ca dhūmo dhūmatvapāṇḍutvādibhiḥ svaniyatairviśeṣadharmairjanyaḥ tathā sāmānyadharmairapi sattvadravyatvādibhiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:466_11: tataśca yathā tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti,
SA15arhebt2u:466_13: atrāha- “na sarvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ” tataśca kutastathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:466_14: kasmāt? iti cet, [Hbṭ_151] “tadabhāve” teṣāṃ tārṇapārṇatvādināṃ viśeṣadharmāṇāmabhāve “bhavato” dhūmamātrasya tebhya eva viśeṣadharmebhyo bhavatīti evamātmanaḥ “tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt” /
SA15arhebt2u:466_15: tathā “tadabhāve” agnyabhāve bhavato dravyatvādeḥ sāmānyadharmasyāgnerevāyaṃ bhavatī tyevaṃrūpasya tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt kutaḥ sarvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ?,
SA15arhebt2u:466_17: na hyasati tadutpattiniyame janyajanakabhāvo vyavasthāpayituṃ yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:466_18: yata evaṃ “tasmāt kāryaṃ” dhūmādikaṃ “svabhāvairyāvadbhi” rdhūmatvādibhiḥ svagataiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:466_21: kairvinā na bhavati? / ‘kāraṇe yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvaiḥ'; ityatrāpi sambadhyate / kāraṇāśritairyāvadbhiḥ svabhāvairvinā te kāryagatāḥ svabhāvā na bhavanti hetuḥ taisteṣāmiti gamyate /
SA15arhebt2u:466_23: idānīṃ kāraṇasthaiḥ svabhāvairyāvadbhiragnitvadravyatvādibhiravinābhāvi teṣāṃ kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāṃ hetuḥ kāryaṃ gamakam /
SA15arhebt2u:466_24: kasmāt? ityāha- “tatkāryatvaniyamāt” teṣāmeva kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmānāṃ tat kāryamityevaṃrūpasya niyamasya sadbhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:466_25: nahi tān sāmānyadharmān kadācidapi kāryaṃ vyabhicarati /
SA15arhebt2u:467_0: evaṃ kāraṇagatamaṃśaṃ pāścātyenārthena nirūpya prāktanenārthena kāryagatamaṃśaṃ nirūpayannāha- “taireva ca” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:467_1: kāryamapi taireva dharmaiḥ svagataiḥ kāraṇagatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gamakam yathāntarā sambhavino dhūmatvapāṇḍupārṇatvādayo viśeṣarūpāstaiḥ kāraṇagataiḥ sāmānyadharmairvinā na bhavanti /
SA15arhebt2u:467_2: atrāpi ‘tatkāryatvaniyamāt'; ityapekṣyate / teṣāmeva kāryagatānāṃ viśeṣadharmāṇāṃ kāraṇagatasāmānyadharmāpekṣayā kāryatvaniyamāt /
SA15arhebt2u:467_3: na hi te viśeṣadharmāḥ kāryagatāḥ kāraṇasthasāmānyadharmairvinā kadācidapi bhavanti /
SA15arhebt2u:467_6: tadevaṃ kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva gamyā na viśeṣadharmāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:467_7: kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva gamakā na sāmānyadharmāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:467_8: tatkāryatvaniyamāt / ye tu kāraṇasya viśeṣadharmā yaistatkāryatvaniyamaḥ kāryamātrasya nāstīti na te gamyāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:467_9: ye ca kāryasya sāmānyadharmā dravyatvādayasteṣāmapi tatkāryatvaniyamābhāvādeva gamakatvaṃ nāstīti kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamakatve kutaḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ pareṣāmiva prasajyeta? /
SA15arhebt2u:468_0: [2. janyajanakabhāvasya sarvathā sattve 'pi gamyagamakabhāvasya na tathātvam /]
SA15arhebt2u:469_1: yadi hi kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva gamyāḥ kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva gamakāḥ tatkāryatvaniyamādiṣyante,
SA15arhebt2u:469_3: kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva janakā na viśeṣadharmāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:469_4: kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva janyā na sāmānyadharmā iti syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:469_9: tadāha- “tajjanya” ityādi / yadi hi kāryasya taiḥ kāraṇagatairviśeṣadharmairjanyo yo viśeṣaḥ sa grahītuṃ śakyate,
SA15arhebt2u:469_11: tathā liṅgaviśeṣo dhūmatvādi upādhirviśeṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ dravyatvādīnāṃ sāmānyānāṃ kāryagatānāṃ teṣāṃ cābhimatatvāgdamakatvasya /
SA15arhebt2u:469_12: tathā hi- agurudhūmagrahaṇe bhavatyeva tadagneranumānaṃ dhūmatvaviśeṣaṇena ca dravyatvādināgneranumānam /
SA15arhebt2u:469_13: na hi sarvathā janyajanakabhāvo 'stītyeva tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvo bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:469_14: tasya jñānāpekṣatvāt / tathā hi- na sattāmātreṇa liṅgasya gamakatvam,
SA15arhebt2u:469_15: tasya jñāpakatvāt / jñāpako hi svaniścayāpekṣo jñāpyamarthaṃ jñāpayati,
SA15arhebt2u:469_16: nānyathā / kathaṃ [Hbṭ_153] tarhyuktaṃ “tadabhāve bhavataḥ tadutpattiniyama(mā)bhāvāt” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:469_17: ? / sarvathā janyajanakabhāvābhyupagame tadabhāve bhāvasyaivābhāvādityata āha- “aviśiṣṭa”- ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:469_18: yadi hi tajjanyaviśeṣa grahaṇarahitamaviśiṣṭaṃ kāryamātramupādīyate liṅgaviśeṣopādhirahitaṃ vā dravyādikaṃ tadā “aviśiṣṭasāmānyavivakṣāyāṃ” kāraṇagataviśeṣābhāve 'pi dhūmamātrasya bhāvāt tadaviśiṣṭasya ca dravyatvāderagnyabhāve 'pi bhāvād vyabhicāra iti sarvathā janyajanakabhāvo neṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:469_20: na tu viśeṣavivakṣāyām, tatra vyabhicārābhāvāt / tathā hi- yadi nāmadhūmamātraṃ tārṇapārṇādiviśeṣābhāve bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:469_21: na tu tajjanyo viśeṣaḥ, sa yadi grahītuṃ śakyate, tadā viśeṣasya gamyatvamastyeva,
SA15arhebt2u:469_22: niścitasyaiva liṅgatvāt / tathā yadyapi dravyatvasattvamātramagnyabhāve 'pi bhavati na tu dhūmātmakamiti tadviśiṣṭasyāvyabhicārād gamakatvamapi na vāryata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:471_0: atra parasya vacanāvakāśamāśaṅkayāha- “kasyacit” dhūmādeḥ “kadācit” kasmiṃścit kāle “kutaścit” agnyādeḥ “bhāve 'pi” sati “sarvo” dhūmādiḥ “tādṛśo” yādṛśa ekadāgnyāderbhavana dṛṣṭa tajjātīyaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:471_1: “tathāvidhajanmā” yathāvidhāt sa eko bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ tādṛśādeva janma yasya sa /
SA15arhebt2u:471_4: iti / tathāhi- yadi nāma pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kasyaciddhūmasyāgnyādisāmagrīkāryatvamavagataṃ kimetāvatānyasyāpi tādṛśasya tādṛśakāryatā sidhyati,
SA15arhebt2u:471_7: tadanyasya tu kimāyātam? yena tathavidhādasya janma syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:471_8: evaṃ hi kasyāściddhūmavyakteragnyādijanyatā dṛṣṭeti kinna ghaṭāderapi sābhyupagamyate? anyatvena [Hbṭ_154] viśeṣābhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:471_9: ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ? iti cet ;
SA15arhebt2u:471_10: tathā ca pramāṇābhāvena tathāvidhajanmatvāniścayādatādṛśādapi janmāśaṅkāyāṃ tādṛśasya dhūmāderagnyādinā'nvayavyatirekau na niścitāviti kutaḥ kāryahetorgamakatvam? /
SA15arhebt2u:471_11: na hi yo 'sāveko deśakālāvasthāniyato 'gniviśeṣahetuko dhūmo 'dhigataḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tasyaivānvayavyatirekau pratipattavyau /
SA15arhebt2u:471_13: kiṃ tarhi? / tādṛśasya sāmānyātmana eva liṅgatvāt tasya cātathāvidhādapi janmāśaṅkāyāṃ kutastathāvidhenānvayo vyatireko vā? /
SA15arhebt2u:473_0: siddhāntavādyāha- “na, atadbhāvinaḥ” ityādi / evaṃ manyate- ihaikadā dhūmāderagnyādisāmagrījanyatayā pratyākṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitarūpatve 'pi tādṛśasyātādṛśādapi bhāvaḥ samāśaṅkyate yathāparidṛṣṭādanyatvena /
SA15arhebt2u:473_1: tatra yo 'sāvagnyādisāmagrījanyo dhūmaviśeṣa ekadā niścitastadapekṣayā yathānyo dhūmaviśeṣastādṛśo yo 'nyādṛśādapi- bhāvānāṃ vicitraśaktitayā- bhavediti śaṅkayate,
SA15arhebt2u:473_3: tatra yadi tadanyasya tādṛśasyātādṛśājjanma syāt tadā tādṛśasya svabhāvasya nāgnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvateti paridṛṣṭasyāpi dhūmasya nāgnyādisāmagrī kāraṇamityāyātam /
SA15arhebt2u:473_5: tataścāgnyādisāmagryā akāraṇatvāt yo mayaikadā tato bhavan dṛṣṭo dhūmaḥ so 'pi na bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:473_6: nahi yad yasya kāraṇaṃ na bhavati tat tataḥ sakṛdapi jāyate,
SA15arhebt2u:473_8: na tat atat, tavdilakṣaṇaṃ atādṛśaṃ śakramurddhādikam,
SA15arhebt2u:473_9: atasmād bhavituṃ śīlaṃ [Hbṭ_155] yasya tasyātadbhāvinastādṛśasya tallakṣaṇasya dhūmavastunaḥ “sakṛdapi” ekadāpi “tataḥ” agnyādeḥ “abhāvād” bhāvavirodhāt /
SA15arhebt2u:473_10: bhavati ca tādṛśo 'gnyādisāmagrītaḥ tatastādṛśasya svabhāvasya tādṛśameva kāraṇamityavagamyate sakṛtpravṛttābhyāmeva pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmiti kuto vyabhicārāśaṅkā? /
SA15arhebt2u:473_11: tena yādṛśo dhūmo 'gnyādisāmagryā bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt tādṛśasya tasya tajjanyasvabhāvatayā tādṛśādeva bhāvāt ‘
SA15arhebt2u:474_0: athavānyathā vyākhyāyate- iha pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanā kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ prāguktā tannibandhanāvanvayavyatirekau pratipādayitum,
SA15arhebt2u:474_1: taccāyuktam / tathā hi- “kasyacit” dhūmasyāgnyādisāmagryanantarabhāvina ādyasya “kadācit” prathamotpādakāle “kutaścid” agnyādisāmagryāḥ “bhāve 'pi” utpāde 'pi “sarvastādṛśo” yādṛśaḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvī dhūmo dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣvapi tādṛśaḥ pratyakṣata eva tasya pūrvakṣaṇāvilakṣaṇatayā pratīteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:474_2: “tathāvidhajanmā” iti yathāvidhādagnīndhanasāmagrīlakṣaṇāt kāraṇādādyo dhūmakṣaṇa utpannastathāvidhājjanma yasya sa “tathāvidhajanmetyetat kutaḥ” naiva tasya dhūmāderabhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:474_3: evaṃ ca yadyato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyānyato 'pi bhāvasya darśanāt sarvatrānāśvāsa iti manyamāna āha- “tathā ca” anagnito dhūmādapi dhūmasya bhāve śakramūrddhāderapi tasya bhāvāvirodhādagninā dhūmasya nanvayavyatirekāviti cenmanyase iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā /
SA15arhebt2u:477_0: siddhāntavādyāha- nāgnīndhanasāmagrījanyo yādṛśo dhūmastādṛśa eva dhūmādapi bhavati kāraṇabhedena /
SA15arhebt2u:477_2: tādṛśo hyagnīndhanasāmagrīkṣaṇāntarajanya ādya evāparaḥ kṣaṇastathā tadanya ādya evāparāgnīndhanasāmagrījanya iti tādṛśasya dhūmasya dhūmādasambhavāt na kvacidanāśvāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:477_3: tathā yādṛśo dvitīyakṣaṇabhāvī prathamadhūmakṣaṇajanito dhūmakṣaṇastādṛśo 'paraprathamadhūmakṣaṇajanita eva dvitīyo dhūmakṣaṇo na tṛtīyādiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:477_6: āha- “atadbhāvinaḥ” atasmād- anagnīndhanādirūpād dhūmād bhavanaśīlasya prathamakṣaṇāvilakṣaṇasya dhūmasya “sakṛdapi” ekadāpi “tataḥ” agnyādisāmagryāḥ “abhāvāda” bhāvāyogād /
SA15arhebt2u:477_7: yathā hi prathamakṣaṇāpekṣayā dvitīyastādṛśastathā tadapekṣayā prathamo 'pīti tādṛśatvāviśeṣāt tādṛśasyānagnito bhāve tādṛśo nāgnijanyasvabhāvaḥ iti sakṛdapi tato na bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:477_8: bhavan vā tajjanyasvabhāvatāmātmānastādṛśaḥ khyāpayatīti kuto 'nyādṛśād bhavet? tasmādanyādṛśād bhavannanyādṛśa eva tato na vyabhicāraḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:479_0: nanu sarveṣāṃ dhūmakṣāṇānāṃ kaṇṭhakṣaṇanākṣisrutikālīkaraṇādikāyāmarthakriyāyāmupayogāt kathaṃ tādṛśasvabhāvatā na syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:479_1: na, tasyā apyarthakriyāyāḥ kṣaṇabhedopadhīyamānarūpāyāḥ tādṛśatvābhāvāt tatrāpi tulyadoṣatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:479_2: kathaṃ tarhi loke sarvatra dhūmavyavahāraḥ iti cet;
SA15arhebt2u:479_4: sādṛśye sati kathaṃ na tādṛśatā? iti cet /
SA15arhebt2u:479_5: tādṛśādanyatvāt sadṛśasya / tathā hi- gosadṛśo bhavati gavayaḥ na tu tādṛśaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:479_6: gorevāparasya tādṛśatvāt / paramārthenātādṛśe 'pi tādṛśābhimāno mandamatīnāṃ bhavan kathaṃ nivārtyet? /
SA15arhebt2u:479_7: tathā hi- tattvādhyavasāyo 'pi tāvad- atasminnarvāgdṛśāṃ vinivārayituṃ na pāryate,
SA15arhebt2u:481_0: tattvacintakāstu tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇabhedāt tādṛśātādṛśatāṃ bhāvānāṃ anumanyante na tādṛśatām /
SA15arhebt2u:481_1: tad yadyatādṛśādapi tadṛśo bhavet tadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāva ityatadbhāvinaḥ sakṛdapi tato bhāvo na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:481_5: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭam tasya tajjanyasvabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:481_8: itarasya ca tajjananāyogāt / yadi nāmaivaṃ tataḥ prakṛte kiṃ siddham? ityata āha- “tatra” etasmin nyāye sati “yadi dhūmo” yādṛśa ādyo 'gnyādisāmagrījanitastādṛśo dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvī “agnyādisāmagryā” agnīndhanādikāraṇakalāpāt tajjanakasvabhāvatayā nirddhāritā “danyato”'gnīndhanādisāmagrījanitādādyāddhūmakṣaṇād bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:481_9: tadā “tasya” tādṛśasya dhūmasvabhāvasya “tajjanyo”'gnyādisāmagrījanyaḥ “svabhāvo na bhavati” kintu dhūmajanya eveti kṛtvā sakṛdapi “tato”'gnyādisāmagrīto “na bhaveta” /
SA15arhebt2u:481_11: nāgnyādijanyasvabhāvateti kutaḥ sakṛdapi tato bhāvo yujyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:481_13: yathā hyarthāntaramatajjanyābhimatamanyato bhavat na tajjanyasvabhāvaṃ nāgnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvamiti sakṛdapi tato na bhavati tadvat tādṛśo dhūmo 'pīti tato bhavannanyādṛśa evāsāviti gamyate /
SA15arhebt2u:482_0: syānmatam- agnyādisāmagryāsāvatajjanyasvabhāvo 'pi tādṛśo balājjanyate kastasya tapasvino 'parādhaḥ? ityata āha- “nāpi” na kevalaṃ svayamatajjanyasvabhāvatayā tato na bhavet,
SA15arhebt2u:482_1: kintvagnyādisāmagryapi taṃ tādṛśaṃ dhūmaṃ- yādṛśo dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvī- [Hbṭ_158] na janayet /
SA15arhebt2u:482_2: kutaḥ? / atajjananasvabhāvatvāt / tādṛśasya hyanyato bhāve sa eva tajjananasvabhāvo nāgnyādisāmagrīti tajjananasvabhāvavikalā kathaṃ taṃ janayet? /
SA15arhebt2u:482_5: tathā hi- sā ātmīyaṃ svabhāvamanusṛtyaiva pravartate,
SA15arhebt2u:484_0: syānmatam- agnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvo 'pi tādṛśo dhūmo dhūmajanyasvabhāvo 'pi yathā sa eva dhūma indhanajanyasvabhāvo 'gnijanyasvabhāvaścobhayato bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:484_1: tathā tādṛśo 'pi dhūma ubhayasāmagrījanyasvabhāvatayobhayato bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “na ca” naiva “dhūmasya” tādṛśasya “tadatajjanyaḥ” agnyādisāmagrījanyo dhūmajanyaśca “svabhāvo yuktaḥ” yuktyā saṅgataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:484_5: tasya yadi tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇajanyatā syāt tatastādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvataiva syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:484_10: tenāgnidhūmalakṣaṇāt “dhūmādhūmajananasvabhāvāt” tādṛśātādṛśajananasvabhāvāt tādṛśātādṛśatayāsya bhavato dhūmādhūma[svabhāva]stādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvaḥ syāt kutastādṛśa eva? /
SA15arhebt2u:484_12: kāryāṇāṃ hi ye svabhāvāḥ parasparāsaṃbhavinaḥ te parasparavilakṣaṇakāraṇasāmagrīsvabhāvakṛtā na svābhāvikā ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt /
SA15arhebt2u:485_2: kāryāṇāmutpattimātra eva kāraṇāpekṣaṇādityata āha- “akāraṇāpekṣaṇe ca” tādṛśātādṛśarūpatāyāṃ tādṛśātādṛśa- kāraṇānapekṣaṇe ca tādṛśātādṛśatāyāḥ “ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt” /
SA15arhebt2u:485_3: na hi tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvayorabhūtvā bhāvavyatirekeṇānyā kācidutpattiḥ yatra tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvakāraṇanirapekṣāṇāmapi tadapekṣā syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:485_5: tatra kāraṇāpekṣopagame kathaṃ tādṛśātādṛśatāyāṃ kāraṇāpekṣā na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:485_6: tasmāt sāmagrīṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśatvādeva kāryāṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvavibhāga iti kuto 'nyādṛśāttādṛśasambhavaḥ? iti /
SA15arhebt2u:486_0: yattūktaṃ ‘yathaiko dhūmo 'gnīndhanābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇābhyāṃ janyate tathaikalakṣaṇamapi kāryaṃ vilakṣaṇādapi sāmagryantarād bhaviṣyati';
SA15arhebt2u:486_1: iti / tadayuktam / yato nāsmābhirvilakṣaṇānāṃ janakatvaṃ vāryate janayantyeva paraspavilakṣaṇā api svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmāṇastadavasthāniyatāḥ tadekaṃ kāryaṃ,
SA15arhebt2u:486_2: tasya tu teṣāṃ ca parasparāpekṣayā janyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamāt tādṛśasya tādṛśādeva janmocyate nānyādṛśāt,
