SA15arhebt2u:486_5: yadi tvagnirivendhanopādānopakṛtastadupādānopakṛtaṃ cendhanamiva tadavasthāniyatamatādṛśamapi dhūmādikaṃ tādṛśaṃ dhūmaṃ janayet pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ ca tathāvagamyeta tadāgnyādivat so 'pi tajjananasvabhāvatāniyamāt tādṛśajanakaḥ kena nānumanyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:486_6: tadabhāve 'pi tu tādṛśasya bhāve tayorjanyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamābhāvāt kutaḥ kāryakāraṇatetyahetutaiva tādṛśasyānyādṛśād bhavataḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:486_7: yata evaṃ “tasmāt” so 'gnīndhanādisāmagrīviśeṣo mantavyo “yaḥ” ādya “dhūmajanano” nānyaḥ “sa” dhūma ādyo yaḥ “gnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa” janito nānya a [Hbṭ_160] iti kṛtvā kāryakāraṇayorevaṃ yathoktena nyāyena janyajanakarūpasya svabhāvasya niyamād yādṛśaṃ yasya kāraṇamekadā pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmevāvadhāritaṃ “tadvijātīyāt” tato 'nyādṛśāt kāraṇāt “utpattiḥ” tādṛśasya kāryasya “na bhavati” anyādṛśasya eva na vāryata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:487_0: tadevaṃ tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇakṛtakatvaṃ tādṛśātādṛśakāryasvabhāvasya pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tat” tasmāt yādṛśaṃ kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇāt dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitamekadā tat t”nna vyabhicarati” tādṛśamanyādṛśānna bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:487_1: yanaivaṃ “tena” kāraṇena “siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve” tādṛśasya “kāryasya” tādṛśameva kāraṇamiti niścaye sati yathoditena nyāyena “kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptira”nvayavyatirekarūpā “siddhā” bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:488_0: “na vijātīyādutpattiriti” dṛṣṭakāraṇavijātīyāt kāraṇādanyādṛśānnotpattirityasamumarthamapratipadyamānaḥ kāryasya vijātīyāt kāraṇānnotpattirityayamatrārtho 'bhimata iti manvānaḥ paraścodayannāha- “nanu” svato “vijātīyādapi” kāraṇāt “kiñcit” kāryaṃ “bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ” tat kathaṃ na vijātīyādutpattirityasya na dṛṣṭavirodhaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:488_1: kathaṃ yathā ityāha- “tad yathā gomayādeḥ” ādigrahaṇāt śṛṅgacandrakāntādeḥ “ śālūkādi” ādigrahaṇāccharodakādi /
SA15arhebt2u:488_2: tathā hi- gomayācchālūkasya bhāvaḥ śṛṅgāccharasya candrakāntādapāma /
SA15arhebt2u:488_3: na ca gomayādikaṃ śālūkāderna vijātīyam tat kimucyate na vijātīyādutpattiḥ iti /
SA15arhebt2u:488_4: siddhāntavādī parasya bhrāṃtatāṃ darśayannāha- “na vijātīyādutpattiḥ” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:488_5: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tat tato 'nyādṛśānna bhavati ityayamatrārtho vivakṣitaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:488_6: na tu kāryavijātīyāditi / na ca tasya vyabhicāraḥ / tadāha- “tathāvidhameva hi” gomayādirūpaṃ “tādṛśaṃ” śālakādīnāmā “dinimittaṃ” śālūkādiprabandhasya ya ādiḥ prathama ārambhakṣaṇaḥ tasya kāraṇamiti kṛtvā śālūkādiprabandhasyāderna kāraṇābhedo [Hbṭ_161] 'nyādṛśādutpattiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:488_8: yadā tu prabandhena pūrvakṣaṇanimittānāmuttarottarakṣaṇānāṃ santānenotpattilakṣaṇā vṛttirbhavati śarasya tadā śarādbhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:488_9: tadevaṃ yasya prabandhādeḥ śṛṅgādibhyo bhāvo na tādṛśasya śarādeḥ yasya ca śārādestuduttarottarasya bhāvo na tādṛśasya śṛṅgāderiti na dṛṣṭakāraṇavijātīyāt kāraṇāt tādṛśasya sambhava iti kāryahetoranvayavyatirekaniścayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:489_0: yadāpi śālūkādayaḥ pūrvapūrvasvajātinibandhanā anādisantānapravṛttā iṣyante tadāpi gomayādibhyaḥ keṣāñcidbhāve 'pi tādṛśatvābhāvānna vyabhicāra iti darśayannāha- “asti ca” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:489_1: yasya śālūkasantānasya gomayādi kāraṇaṃ yasya ca sarvadā svajātinimittatvaṃ tayorgomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayorastyeva svabhāvabhedaḥ parasparamanyādṛśatvaṃ “rūpasyābhede 'pi” sati /
SA15arhebt2u:489_3: āha- “nahi” ityādi / yasmānnākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ “tattve” tādṛśatve nimittam yato gomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayorākārasāmyāt tādṛśatvameva syānna jātibhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:489_5: yeṣāmapi hi samānākāratā keṣāñcidbhāvānāṃ teṣāmapi yata ākārādanyato viśeṣājjātibhedo dṛśyate tato nākārasāmyameva jātyekatve nibandhanam /
SA15arhebt2u:489_6: tathā hi- ākārasāmye 'pi kvacit puṣpād bhedo dṛśyate nīletarakusumayoriva sūryayoḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:489_12: tadevedam'; iti pratyabhijñānaṃ sajātīyatāṃ goamayetarajanmanoḥ śālakayorūpakalpayati tathāpi vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanyatayā tayorjātibheda evāvagantavyaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:489_13: naikajātitā / tata eva pratyabhijñānasya bhrāntatayā tatkalpitasya tādṛśatvasyālīkatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:491_0: yadi punargomayetarādijanmanaḥ śālūkākāderagnidhūmādijanmano vā dhūmādeḥ pratyabhijñāvaśād vilakṣaṇasāmagrīnibandhanatve 'pi samānasvabhāvataiva syāt ko doṣaḥ syāt? ityata āha- “anyathā hi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:491_1: yadi hi yā svajāti [lakṣaṇapratyayāntarasahitā sāmagrī yā ca] svajātinirapekṣā gomayādirūpā śālūkādeḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:491_2: dhūmasya vā yāgnīnadhanādilakṣaṇā yā ca śakramūrdvādisvabhāvā dhūmādyātmikā avi(kā tasyāḥ vi)lakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryā avilakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśameva kāryaṃ dhūmaśālūkādikamutpadyeta tadā na ‘
SA15arhebt2u:491_3: kāraṇasya'; sāmagrīrūpasya “bhedābhedābhyāṃ” vailakṣaṇyāvailakṣaṇyābhyāṃ kāryasya “bhedābhedau” vailakṣaṇyāvailakṣaṇye tajjātīyavijātīyātmake syātāmiti kṛtvā “viśvasya” sakalasya padārtharāśeḥ “ahetukau bhedābhedau” sajātīyavijātīyatve syātām /
SA15arhebt2u:491_4: tasmād yatra vilakṣaṇā sāmagrī tatra kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpatve 'pi vijātīyataiva kāryasyeti /
SA15arhebt2u:492_0: nanu dhūmendhanādisāmagrībhede 'pi dhūmasya na jātibhedamāmananti vidvāṃsaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:492_13: tasmād indhanameva tayopādānakāraṇam agnyādisahakāripratyayāhitaviśeṣaṃ tathāvidhaṃ dhūmakāryamaṅgārādi bhinnākṛti janayatītyalamatiprasaṅgena /
SA15arhebt2u:493_0: nanu ca yadi nāma sāmagrībhede 'pi kāryasya bhedo na jātaḥ tadā kāraṇabhede satyapi tasyābhāvāt tasyāhetukatāstu,
SA15arhebt2u:493_1: abhedasya tu kimāyātam? yenobhayorahetukatvamucyate ityata āha- “tathāhi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:493_2: yadā hi sāmagrībhede satyapi kāryasya bhedo na jāta iti tasyāhetukatvam- na hi hetau satyabhavataḥ kathañcidapi hetumattopapadyate- tadā yo 'pyasāvabhedaḥ kāryasya so 'pi sāmagryoḥ bhinnatvādasatyabhede jāta iti kutastasyāpi hetumattā? /
SA15arhebt2u:493_3: yathā hi hetau satyabhavato na hetumattā tathā hetāvasatyapi bhavato hetumattā kutaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:493_7: pratibhāsābhedasya ca kutaścid bhrāntinimittāt paramārthato bhede 'pyupalakṣaṇāt /
SA15arhebt2u:493_8: syādetat- yo hyatādṛśādapi tādṛśodbhavamicchati tasya bhedābhedayorahetukatvamiṣṭameva bhāvā eva kevalaṃ hetumanta ityata āha- “tadvyatiriktaśca” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:493_9: nahi bhedābhedavyatiriktaḥ kaścid bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'sti yastayorahetukatve 'pi hetumān syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:493_10: tasya tābhyāmanyatve ‘asyemau bhedābhedau'; iti sambandhābhāvaprasaṅgāt, tadanyasambandhakalpanāyāmanavasthādoṣāt,
SA15arhebt2u:493_11: ananyatve 'pi bhedābhedayorbhāvasvabhāvasya ca svātmanyevāvasthānāt anupakārācca kutaḥ sambandhitā? /
SA15arhebt2u:493_12: upakārakalpanāyāṃ ca yadi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ svahetubhya eva na kutaścid bhinno 'bhinno vā samutpanna itīṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:493_13: tadā tadbhāve 'pi svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt kuto bhinnābhinnatā bhāvasvabhāvasya syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:493_15: tāvapi yadi bhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāvastadavastha eveti na tasya kutaścit svarūpato bhedo 'bhedo vā syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:493_16: punastadvaśād bhedābhedakalpanāyāṃ bhāvasvabhāvasya tadavasthaṃ tādavasthyamanavasthā ca bhedābhedayoḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:493_17: athābhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedābhyāṃ kriyata iti syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:493_22: svahetubhya eva bhāvasvabhāvasya kutaścid bhinnābhinnātmana utpattikalpanāyāṃ vā bhedābhedayorvyatirekavatoḥ vaiyarthyam;
SA15arhebt2u:493_24: tasmād vaiśeṣikādikalpitayorbhedābhedayorviśeṣasāmānyātmanorayogāt bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedaśabdavācyaḥ tayorahetukatve bhāvasvabhāvasyaivāhetukatvamāpatitam /
SA15arhebt2u:493_26: ahetukatve hi bhāvānāṃ yadi kadācit sattvaṃ sarvadaiva syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:493_30: yasmā “dapekṣayā hi” tasyāpeṣaṇīyasya hetorbhāve bhavanto 'bhāve ca na bhavantaḥ “kādācitkāḥ” kadācidbhavā yujyante,
SA15arhebt2u:493_31: nānyatheti / tasmānna vilakṣaṇāt kāraṇāt avilakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpattirabhyupagantavyā,
SA15arhebt2u:494_0: punarapi vilakṣaṇāyāḥ sāmagryāḥ avilakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpattau doṣāntaramāha- “vyavasthāvāṃśca” pratiniyataḥ “sādhyeṣu” ghaṭapaṭādiṣu “sādhanānāṃ” mṛttantvādīnāṃ loke yo “niyogo” ghaṭārthī mṛtpiṇḍameva tatra niyuṅkte na tantūn,
SA15arhebt2u:494_1: paṭārthī ca tantūneva na mṛtpiṇḍam ityādikaḥ sa na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:494_2: kasmāt? ityāha- “kāraṇānāṃ”- sāmagrīṇāṃ yāḥ “śaktayaḥ”- ātmātiśayalakṣaṇāstāsāṃ “pratīniyame” kācideva sāmagrī kvacideva [Hbṭ_165] kārye upayujyate nānyānyatretyevaṃrūpe “hi” yasmāt “kiñcideva” mṛdādikaṃ “kasyacideva” ghaṭādeḥ sādhanāyopādīyate “nāparaṃ” tadvilakṣaṇaṃ tantvādikam kasmādevam? iti cet? “tasyaiva” mṛdādeḥ “tatra” ghaṭādau “śakte” ryogyatvāt “anyasya” tantvādestatrāśakteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:494_3: kasmāttasyaiva tatra śaktirnānyasya ityata āha “tayoḥ” mṛdādestantvādeśca “tajjanasvabhāvatvena” ghaṭādijananasvabhāvatvena “itarasvabhāvatvena ca” ghaṭādyajananasvabhāvena ca “bhedāt” anyatvabhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:494_5: yadā tu sāmagrīṇāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇānāmapi śaktipratiniyamo neṣyate vilakṣaṇādapi avilakṣaṇakāryopagamāt tadā “ tajjananasvabhāvavilakṣaṇādapi” dhūmādijananasvabhāvaṃ yat kāraṇagnīndhanādisāmagrīlakṣaṇaṃ tadvilakṣaṇādapi śakramūrdvādeḥ kṣaṇāśrayeṇa vā dhūmādestasyāgnīndhanādisāmagrījanyasya dhūmasya tatkṣaṇasya cotpattāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ “na tajjananaśakteḥ pratiniyamo” vivakṣitadhūmādikāryajananaśaktipratiniyamaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:494_10: tato vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanmanaḥ kāryasya kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpasyopalakṣaṇe 'pyanyādṛśataiveti sarvastādṛśastathāvidhajanmeti siddham /
SA15arhebt2u:495_0: syānmatam- vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryāstallakṣaṇakāryajananaśaktiḥ samāneti tallakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati kasyāścideva ca tathābhāvānna yathoditadoṣāvasara ityata āha “tajjananaśaktisāmye tu” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:495_3: ityādikaṃ dūṣaṇam / abhyupagamyāpīdamāha- “yādṛśī hyagnisahakāriṇaḥ” tadādhīyamānavikārasye “ndhanasya” svabhedena dhūmabhedahetoḥ “śaktiḥ” ātmātiśayastādṛśyeva śakramūrddhno [Hbṭ_166] dhūmasya vā yadi tatsāmagrījanyadhūmavilakṣaṇakāryajananaśaktirātmātiśayalakṣaṇā tadā tacchaktisāmye tadevāgnīndhanādikamevārthānnāmāntareṇoktaṃ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:495_5: sa eva hyagnirya indhanavikāramādadhāno dhūmaṃ janayati,
SA15arhebt2u:495_7: yadi ca śakramūrdvāderapi evaṃ bhavatābhyupagamyate tadā kevalaṃ nāmni vivādaḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:495_9: yata evam “iti” tasmāt “kāryaṃ” dhūmādikaṃ “dṛṣṭa”mekadā pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitamatadrūpavyavṛttenātmanā “kāraṇa”mindhanādikaṃ santānāpekṣayā kṣaṇāpekṣayā vā “na vyabhicarati” tadvilakṣaṇādanyato na bhavatīti kāryahetāvanvayavyatirekaniścayaḥ sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:498_0: tadevaṃ karyahetau yato yadbhavadṛṣṭaṃ sakṛt pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tādṛśasya sarvasya tathāvidhādeva janma na tadvijātīyadityekasyā api kāryavyakteḥ kutaścid bhāvadarśane vyāptyānvayavyatirekasiddhiriti pratipāditam /
SA15arhebt2u:498_4: apare tu pratiṣedhyaviṣayajñānarūpeṇāpariṇāmamātmanaḥ tadanyavastuviṣayaṃ vijñānameva vābhāvasya gamakaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ pramāṇāntaramāhurmīmāṃsakāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:498_7: abhāvāṃśe tu nāstīti jñānaṃ janayat tadabhāvapramāṇākhyāṃ labhate,
SA15arhebt2u:498_11: naiyāyikāstu nāstīti jñānameva kevalapradeśādigrāhijñānantarabhāvipratyakṣaṃ na pramāṇāntaramabhāvasya tuccharūpasya paricchedātmakamācakṣate tadevāsya ghaṭādeḥ pratiṣedhyasyānupalabdhiśabdena yadyucyate na kaścidvirodhaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt2u:498_12: tadevamanupalabdhau bhedaṃ gatā buddhayaḥ prativādināmiti tannirāsārthamanupalabdhisvarūpaṃ tāvadupadarśayannāha- “upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:498_15: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsvanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatī'tyevaṃrūpā śāstrakṛtānyatra [Hbṭ_168] vyākhyātā naiyāyikavipratipattinirāsārtham /
SA15arhebt2u:498_22: iti / indriyatvāt tvagādivat kila prāpyakāri cakṣurityanumānataścākṣuṣo raśmirupalabhyate tasya pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhiḥ kathamabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayet? iti /
SA15arhebt2u:498_24: yadā hyupalambhapratyayāntarasākalyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣaśca yathokta upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirucyate na mahattvādikaṃ tadā kuto vyabhicārāvakāśaḥ?,
SA15arhebt2u:498_27: nahi rūpādivyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ tatpratibhāsavivekinākārāntareṇa svajñāne pratibhāsate /
SA15arhebt2u:498_32: tato na mahattvaṃ dravyasyopalambhakaṃ rūpaṃ vā /
SA15arhebt2u:498_35: na ca mahattvaṃ rūpaṃ vā dravyodayakāle 'bhyupagamyate,
SA15arhebt2u:498_37: tacca pratilabdhātmakameva tathātāmanubhavatīti prathame kṣaṇe dravyaṃ nirguṇameva /
SA15arhebt2u:498_38: na cāsya dvitīye kṣaṇe prāktanarūpatyāgo 'sti rūpāntaraṃ vāvirbhavati yataḥ prāgapratipannādhārabhāvaṃ [Hbṭ_169] mahattvādiguṇapratibandhādādhāratāṃ yāyāt /
SA15arhebt2u:498_39: na cājanaka ādhāraḥ / janakatve ca kṣaṇikatā, arthakriyāvirodhādakṣaṇikasya /
SA15arhebt2u:498_41: yataḥ svotkalitaṃ kāryaṃ janayat tathā vyapadiśyate /
SA15arhebt2u:498_42: na caitat kṣaṇikatve sambhavati akṣaṇikatve vā prāga'nādhārasya paścādādhārābhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:498_43: samavāyikāraṇāsambhavādevānekadravyavattvamapyasmabhavi yasmādanekaṃ dravyamārambhakaṃ samavāyikāraṇātmanā yasya vidyate tadevaṃ vyapadiśyate /
SA15arhebt2u:498_46: yā tvabhimā(ma)tā na tayopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhirasavdyavahārasiddhāvanaikāntikīti śāstrakāro darśayāmbabhūva “upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya” yā “anupalabdhiḥ” kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā pratiṣedhyādanyasya sā “abhāvahetuḥ” kāryasya vyāpyasya ca “abhāvavyavahārahetuśca” /
SA15arhebt2u:498_48: yā tvanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣaṇā sā saṃśayahetuḥ pramāṇanivṛttāvapyarthābhāvāsiddheḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:500_2: tannirāsārthaṃ jñātṛ- jñeyadharmalakṣaṇāmanupalabdhiṃ darśayitumupalabdhimeva tāvaddvividhāmdarśayannāha- “atra” anupalabdhivākye yopalabdhiḥ śrūyate kriyārūpā sā yadā kartṛsthatayāpekṣyate tadā tasyā “upalabhamānasya” katuḥ “dharmatve” apekṣyamāṇe “tajjñānam” upalabhamānasya yajjñānaṃ tad upalabdhirucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:500_3: upalabhamānaśca buddhīndriyadehakalāpa eva ca pūrvakṣaṇasaṅgṛhīta upalabdhijanaka ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:500_4: tathāhi- upalabdherjanaka āśrayo vā kartā parairucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:500_5: na [Hbṭ_170] cendriyāderanyasya janakatvaṃ sambhavati yato 'nvayavyatirekanibandhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvavyavahāraḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:500_6: tau cānvayavyatirekau nendriyāderanyasya sambhavataḥ satsvindriyādiṣu niyamenopalabdherbhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:500_7: yadi hīndriyādiṣu satsvapi kadācidupalabdhirnopajāyate tadā satsvapyanyeṣu sakaleṣu hetuṣu kāryānutpattiḥ kāraṇāntaravaikalyaṃ sūcayatīti tavdyatiriktakāraṇāntaraṃ parikalpyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:500_8: na caitadasti, tat kathamātmanastadutpattau nimittabhāvo 'bhyupagamyeta? atiprasaṅgāt /
SA15arhebt2u:502_1: sthāpakatvādāśraya iti cet; na, kṣaṇikatve sthiterabhāvādupalabdherakṣaṇikatve 'pi svayamevāvināśādavasthānāt /
SA15arhebt2u:502_2: tathāhi- upalabdheravināśa eva sthitirucyate na pātābhāvaḥ tasyā gurutvābhāvāt “saṃyogābhāvena gurutvāt patanam” iti ca pareṣāṃ kṛtāntaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:502_3: samavāyādāśraya iti cet; nanu so 'pi ādhāryādhārabhūtānāmeveṣyate /
SA15arhebt2u:502_6: tasya sarvātmasu samānatvāt, ekatvenāsyopagamāt / kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhācca nāsyātmanaḥ sattvam,
SA15arhebt2u:502_7: tato 'sya kuto janakatvam? āśrayatvaṃ vā? ityalaṃ kṣuṇṇakṣodīkaraṇeneti /
SA15arhebt2u:503_3: abhakṣyo grāmyakukkuṭaḥ'; bhakṣyo 'pi san tadanyasya- ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:503_7: nañaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣayatvāt kathaṃ bhāvaviṣayatā? iti cet,
SA15arhebt2u:503_8: āha- “paryudāsavṛttyeti” / paryudāsena pratiṣedhyasyārthasya rvajanena yā viśiṣṭe 'rthe vṛttistayā ,
SA15arhebt2u:503_10: yatra vidheḥ prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedho 'rthagṛhītaḥ vidhibhāksvapadena nocyate ekavākyatā ca tatra paryudāsavṛttitā /
SA15arhebt2u:503_12: ityevaṃ vākyenānyopalabdhervidhānāt anyopalabdhisāmarthyādeva vivakṣitopalabdheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratīyate /
SA15arhebt2u:503_13: vivakṣitopalabdheranivartane tadapekṣayānyasyā vidhānāyogāt svapadena nañā vidhibhāṅ nocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:503_14: kiṃ tarhi? / anyaśabdena paryudāsāśrayeṇānyaśabdasyaiva vākye prayogāt anyā upalabdhiranupalabdhiriti /
SA15arhebt2u:503_15: nañaśca subantena sāmarthyaṃ na tiṅantena ityekavākyatvaṃ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:503_16: na upalabdhiranupalabdhiḥ'; iti / prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ punaretadviparīto mantavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:503_17: tatra hi pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidhirarthād gamyate vākyabhedaḥ svapadena nañā pratiṣedhabhāk sambadhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:504_0: tadevaṃ jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇāmanupalabdhiṃ vyākhyāya jñeyadharmalakṣaṇāṃ pratipādayannāha- “upalabhyamānadharmatve” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:504_1: yadā karmasthakriyāpekṣayopalabhyamānasya vastuno dharma upalabdhirvivakṣyate tadā viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhirmantavyā /
SA15arhebt2u:504_3: pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāderyadātmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ tajjanane yā yogyata tallakṣaṇo viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhiśabdenocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:504_5: kathaṃ yogyatālakṣaṇaḥ? / tathā hi yogyatā dharmaḥ, dharmadharmiṇośca bheda eva ityata āha- “yogyatāyāḥ” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:504_6: yogyatā hi paramārthato bhāvarūpaiva na vasturūpāda bhidyate,
SA15arhebt2u:504_7: anyathā bhāvo yogya eva na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:505_1: “tasmāt” pratiṣedhyād ghaṭādeḥ [Hbṭ_172] svaviṣayajñānajananayogyād yo 'nya upalambhajananayogya eva na tadviparītaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭaviviktapradeśarūpaḥ sa eva cātrānupalabdhiśabdenocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:505_4: kathaṃ punarayaṃ naña anyārthavṛttiḥ sāmānyaśabdaḥ san ghaṭaviviktapradeśasya tajjñānasyaiva vā ghaṭaviviktasyānupalabdhitvaṃ paryudāsavṛttyā prakalpayati,
SA15arhebt2u:505_5: na punaraviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāmevānyaśabdavācyānām? ityata āha- “yatra yasmin” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:505_7: “yasmin” pradeśarūpādau “upalabhyamāne niyamena” avaśyaṃtayā “yasyānyasya” padārthasya ghaṭarūpāderupalabdhirbhavati “sa” ghaṭarūpādiḥ padārthaḥ “tatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ” tena pradeśarūpādinā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:505_9: yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt / pradeśaghaṭayorhi svaviṣayavijñānajanane yogyatā tulyā /
SA15arhebt2u:505_10: yadā hi pradeśarūpaṃ vyavadhānaviprakarṣādirahitaṃ vijñāne svākāraṃ samarpayati tadā ghaṭarūpamapi tatra tathāvidhaṃ svākāraṃ samarpayatyeva /
SA15arhebt2u:505_11: yadi nāma yogyatā tasya tena tulyā svasvabhāvavyavasthitestu kathaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭatā? ityata āha- “ekajñānasaṃsargādi”ti /
SA15arhebt2u:505_12: ekatra hi jñāne dvāvapi tau svākāradvāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭau na sākṣāt,
SA15arhebt2u:505_14: kimiti punastat jñānaṃ padārthadvayākāramavaśyaṃ bhavati yatastayorjñānadvārakaḥ saṃsargaḥ? ityata āha- “tayoḥ satoḥ” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:505_15: yāvetau tulyayogyatārūpau tau yadi santau bhavatastadā naivaikākāraniyatā pratipattirbhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:505_16: kasmāt? asambhavāt / na hyeṣa sambhavo 'sti- yattulyayogyatārūpayoreka eva pratibhāseta nāpara iti /
SA15arhebt2u:505_17: tathāhi- aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyāḥ kastatra svākāraṃ na samarpayet? /
SA15arhebt2u:505_23: karaṇadharma evāyaṃ yadekasminneva karmaṇi kriyāṃ niṣpādayatinānekatra,
SA15arhebt2u:505_26: kartṛbhedādadoṣa iti cet; kartrekatvāt tarhi kriyaikatra karmaṇīti kathaṃ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:505_27: karaṇadharmaḥ'; ityādi vaco na plavate? / na ca pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu paramārthataḥ kartṛkaraṇādibhāvo yuktaḥ kriyā vā kācit /
SA15arhebt2u:505_28: na ca sarvakārakānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyini kārye kasyacidatiśayo 'sti yenāyaṃ kartā kā(ka)raṇaṃ cedamityādi parikalpyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:505_29: tasmādaviśiṣṭayogyatayoḥ kuta ekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatteḥ sambhavaḥ? iti siddha ekajñānasaṃsargaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:505_31: na hyasati tulyayogyatārūpatve yugapadekendriyajanitajñānapratibhāsitā rūparasavat sambhavatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:506_3: ye tu ‘tatrāpi pratyarthaṃ bhinnānyevaikendriyanimittānyekakālāni tadviṣayāṇāṃ yugapatsannihitānāṃ svajñāneṣu sāmarthyāviśeṣāt,
SA15arhebt2u:506_5: iti varṇayanti teṣāmekendriyajatvenaikāyatanaviṣayatvena caikakāleṣvekatvavyapadeśo loke tathādhyavasāyādaupacārikaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:507_0: yadi nāmaikajñānasaṃsargāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭastathāpi sāmānyena sarvamanyamayaṃ nañ kinna pratipadayati? iti,
SA15arhebt2u:507_1: ata āha- “tasmāt” ityādi / yasmādaviśiṣṭatvādyogyatāyā yathoktena prakāreṇaikatra jñāne dvayorapi saṃsargaḥ tasmādaviśiṣṭaṃ yogyatārūpaṃ yayoḥ tata evaikajñānasaṃsargiṇau tau tasmāt tayorevaṃrūpayoḥ “parasparāpekṣameva” na sarvānyapadārthāpekṣam “anyatvamiha” anupalabdhyadhikāre “abhipretam” /
SA15arhebt2u:507_2: loke tu yadyapyaśeṣapadārthāntarāpekṣamanyatvaṃ nañā kvaciducyate vyāptinyāyasamāśrayāt,
SA15arhebt2u:507_3: tathāpi tadiha na gṛhyate, [Hbṭ_174] “pratyāsatterāśrayaṇāt” ekajñānasaṃsargalakṣaṇā prattyāsattirāśrīyate nānyā,
SA15arhebt2u:508_1: sa eva yadā kevalaḥ pradeśo yathoktaghaṭāpekṣaya tasmādanya ucyate tadā ghaṭaviviktapradeśajñānaṃ vānupalabdhiḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:508_4: na tu tadviviktajñānameva yathāha kumārilaḥ “vijñānaṃ vānyavastuni” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:508_5: yathā hyanyavastuviṣayaṃ jñanamanubhūyamānaṃ pratiyogismaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavahāranibandhanaṃ tathā tadviviktaḥ pradeśo 'pi /
SA15arhebt2u:508_7: yataḥ kealapradeśākārameva jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭākāramapi tasmādatra ghaṭo nāsti';
SA15arhebt2u:508_9: kasyacit tu ‘yataḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ dṛśyate na tu ghaṭasahitaḥ tasmānnāstyatra ghaṭaḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:508_10: ityevam / tasmādubhayornāstitājñānajanmani tulyaṃ sāmarthyamiti dvayorapi anupalabdhivyavasthā yukteti /
SA15arhebt2u:508_11: tatra yadā tajjñānaṃ tadā jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ kartṛsthakriyāpekṣayā,
SA15arhebt2u:509_0: evamanupalabdhiṃ paryudāsavṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyamasyā darśayannāha- “sā abhāvam” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:509_1: sarvānyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavivikte 'pi pradeśādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭādau pratiyoginyarthitvādibhiḥ smṛtirasya bhavati tasyābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
SA15arhebt2u:509_2: abhāvavyavahāraṃ vā / kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī abhāvamabhāvavyavahāraṃ ca sādhayataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:509_5: tatra ‘nāstyatra ghaṭaḥ'; ityevamākāraṃ jñānam, evaṃvidhavastvabhidhāyakaṃ cābhidhānaṃ,
SA15arhebt2u:509_6: niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttiriti /
SA15arhebt2u:510_1: atreśvarasena- kumārilayorvacanāvakāśamāśaṅkaya siddhāntavyavasthāmeva kurvatā tanmate niraste 'pyāhatya tanmatanirāsārthamāha- “kathamanyabhāva” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:510_2: īśvaraseno hi manyate- kārya- svabhāvahetubhyāṃ bhāvarūpābhyāṃ anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇādavaśyamabhāvarūpatvamasyāḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:510_4: tvayā cānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya pradeśādestajjñānasya vā bhāvarūpānupalabdhirākhyāyate tannūnamanyabhāvastadabhāvo yenaivamabhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt2u:511_0: kumārilo 'pyevaṃ manyate- yeyaṃ jñātṛ- jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvidhānupalabdhirabhāvarūpā tvayocyate tasyā bhavatu nāstitājñānaṃ prati sādhanabhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:511_1: kintu sa evānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya vastunaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānādanyasya vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvo bhāvāṃśaḥ sa kathamabhāvaḥ? pratiṣedhasya tajjñānasya vā kathamabhāvāṃśaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:513_3: na hi prasajyapratiṣedha evaiko nañarthaḥ kintu paryudāso 'pi /
SA15arhebt2u:513_9: paramārthatastu pratiṣedhyābhāvavyavahārayogyatā [Hbṭ_176] vastubhūtaiva pradeśasya sādhyata iti na svabhāvahetoḥ svabhāvānupalabdhirbhidyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:514_5: hetutve vā kathaṃ na sāmarthyayogitā? bhāvarūpatā vā?,
SA15arhebt2u:514_7: abhāvasya cānapekṣitasahakāriṇo anādheyātiśayatayā nāstīti jñānajanane nityaṃ tajjananaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:514_9: athavā tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmana upalabdhyabhāvasya sādhanameva kiñcinna sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:514_15: pratipattiheturvā? / tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiḥ'; ityatrāntare svayameva vipañcayiṣyati /
SA15arhebt2u:515_3: tasyaivaṃvidhasya “bhāvasiddhireva” bhāvāṃśasiddhireva “aparasya” pratiyogino vastvantarasyābhāvasiddhirabhāvāṃśasya tvadabhimatasya siddhirastu bhāvāṃśasyaivābhāvāṃśarūpatopapatteriti manyate /
SA15arhebt2u:515_4: tathā hi- abhāvāṃśo 'pi pararūpāsaṃsṛṣṭatayaivābhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
SA15arhebt2u:515_5: anyathā tadayogāt / sā ca bhāvāṃśasyāpi samāneti sa evābhāvo 'stu tannimittasya samānatvāt kimanyenābhāvāṃśopagatena? /
SA15arhebt2u:515_7: yata [Hbṭ_177] evam “iti” tasmād “anyabhāvo 'pi” anyasya vastuno bhāvo 'pi tvadabhimato bhāvāṃśo 'pi na kevalamabhāvāṃśastvanmatyābhāva iti vyapadiśyate 'smābhiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:515_8: tato bhāvāṃśasyābhāvarūpatā saṅgataiveti na kiñcid virudhyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:516_0: yaduktaṃ ‘jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇayā svabhāvānupalabdhyā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate nābhāvaḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:516_1: iti tat paro vighaṭayituṃ, yaccoktaṃ ‘na pratiṣedhamātramanupalabdhiḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:516_2: tasya sādhanāsiddheḥ'; iti dvitīye vyākhyāne pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhi[ri]tyetasya sādhanaṃ darśayitumāha- “anyabhāvalakṣaṇa” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:516_3: evaṃ manyate- loko hi kevalapradeśadarśanāt ghaṭābhāvameva prathamaṃ pratipadyate kevalapradeśajñānasaṃvedanadvāreṇa ghaṭajñānābhāvapratipattyā vā tato ghaṭābhāvasya vyavahāram /
SA15arhebt2u:516_4: tena lokapratītyanusāreṇa pratiṣedhyādanyasya pradeśasya pratiṣedhyajñānādvā tajjñānasya yo bhāvastallakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ svayaṃ pramāṇenendriyapratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa ca siddho 'laṃ ghaṭābhāvaṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca yathākramaṃ sādhayitum,
SA15arhebt2u:516_7: tathāhi- pāramparyeṇāpi yadanupalabdheḥ tvadabhyupagatāyāḥ siddhaṃ tat tata eva siddhaṃ bhavatīti pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhitve tatsādhanapratipādane 'pi /
SA15arhebt2u:516_8: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yathā bhavato jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇā bhāvarūpā dvividhānupalabdhistathā mamāpi jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvo 'pyanupalabdhisaṃjñito dvividho bhaviṣyati /
SA15arhebt2u:516_9: tatra jñeyadharmalakṣaṇenānyabhāvena pratyakṣasiddhena pratiṣedhyābhāvo jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvarūpo 'nupalabdhisaṃjñitaḥ setsyati /
SA15arhebt2u:516_10: jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇena cānyabhāvena kevalapradeśajñānātmanā svasaṃvedanasiddhena jñātṛdharmaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānābhāvarūpo 'nupalabdhisamākhyātaḥ setsyati /
SA15arhebt2u:516_12: tatra “anyabhāvalakṣaṇa” iti pratiṣedhyāt tajjñānācca yo 'nyo bhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktaḥ pradeśaḥ tajjñānaṃ ca tadātmako 'bhāvaḥ vivakṣitād bhāvāt pratiṣedhyād bhāvāt tajñānāccānyatvādanupalabdhitvena [Hbṭ_178] bhavato 'bhimataḥ svayaṃ svarūpeṇa pramāṇenendriyapratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa ca siddhaḥ saṃstasya pratiṣedhyasyābhāvavyavahāraṃ jñānābhidhānapravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ sādhayet “tatsiddhisiddho” vā tasyānyabhāvalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya yathoktasya siddhyā siddho vā tadabhāvastasya pratiṣedhyasya tajjñānasya vābhāva iti evamapīṣyamāṇe “na kaścid viśeṣaḥ” tvadabhimatānupalabdhito 'smadabhimatānupalabdheḥ tato 'smaddarśanaṃ kimiti pratikṣipyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:516_13: nanvastyevaivamiṣyamāṇe viśeṣo 'nyabhāvalakṣaṇānupalabdhiritarayā vyavahitā tadabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayeditarā tu sākṣādityāha- sa viśeṣo nāsti yena viśeṣeṇānupalabdhyābhāvarūpayā vastusaṃsparśarahitayāsmadabhimatayābhāvavyavahārasiddheḥ virodhaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:516_16: iti, tadapyasat, yataḥ sa eva tvadabhimato 'nyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktabhūtalātmakastadviṣayā copalabdhiranupalabdhitveneṣṭā bhavatastadabhāvasyānupalabdhitvenāsmanmatasya pratiṣedhyābhāvasya tadupalabdhyabhāvasya ca “kiṃ” kasmāt “na sādhanaṃ” liṅgam “iṣyate?” /
SA15arhebt2u:516_18: “kiṃ punaḥ” kasmāt punaḥ “abhāvasya” dvividhasya “siddhireva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ” na tatsādhyā kācidanyā vidyata ityasmanmataniṣedhārthaṃ lokātikrāntamiṣyata iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:517_2: prathamaṃ tāvat kāraṇaṃ vivṛṇvannāha- “anyabhāvastadviviktadeśātmakastāvanna sādhanaṃ” liṅgaṃ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya,
SA15arhebt2u:517_4: iti paścād vakṣyate / tadarthameva tāvacchabdaḥ / kasmādanyabhāvo na sādhanam? ityāha- “yatsiddhau” yasya vastunaḥ siddhau pratītau “yasya” aparasya [Hbṭ_179] vastuno “na siddhi”rna pratītiḥ tadvastu tasya vastuno liṅgaṃ bhavatītyayaṃ liṅgaliṅginornyāyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:517_6: yathā- yadā dhūmapratītau nāgniḥ pratīyate tadā tayorlliṅgaliṅgibhāvo bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:517_8: yadi nāmaivaṃ tataḥ kim? ityata āha- “anyasya vastuno yo bhāvaḥ” svabhāva “tatsiddhyaiva” tatpratītyeva “tadabhāvaḥ” tasya pratiṣedhyasyābhāvaḥ “prasidhyati” pratīyateanyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvātmakatvāt tatsiddhereva tatsiddhilakṣaṇatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:518_0: naiyāyikāstu manyante- pratiṣedhyābhāvo hi prasajyapratiṣedhātmakastuccharūpastasya kathaṃ tadanyabhāvarūpatā?,
SA15arhebt2u:518_1: bhāvābhāvayorvirodhāt / tataḥ kathaṃ tadanyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ syāt? ityata āha- “tasya” tadanyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya tasmādanyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭādinā “asaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya” rahitātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena śūnyātmanaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:518_4: virodhāt? iti cet; na, pararūpeṇa tasyāpi tuccharūpatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:518_5: yathā hyanapekṣitabhāvāntarasaṃsargaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ śūnyavikalpapratibhāsī pratiṣedhyena tuccharūpaḥ tadrūpavirahāt,
SA15arhebt2u:518_9: anyathā kathamasyānyabhāvatvaṃ parasya vā tatrābhāvaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:518_10: yo hi yadabhāvarūpo na bhavati sa evāsau bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:518_12: tasmāt sarvabhāvāḥ pararūpeṇa niḥsvabhāvāḥ svarūpeṇa rūpavattve 'pī tyanavadyam /
SA15arhebt2u:519_1: na kaścit, kevalamanapekṣitarūpāntaramabhāvamātraṃ prasajyapratiṣedha iti loke kathyate /
SA15arhebt2u:519_3: na tu rūpāntaraṃ pararūpatucchātmakaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:519_5: [Hbṭ_180] kathaṃ tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmatā na syāt pararūpeṇa? /
SA15arhebt2u:519_8: tādātmyābhāve hi prasajyapratiṣedhasya paryudastāt pratītau tatkāraṇatve sati syāt pratipattiḥ nānyathā /
SA15arhebt2u:519_9: tasya tadanyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya yat tattvaṃ tasya pratiṣedhyatuccharūpatāyā vyavasthāpakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣarūpam tata eva- na taduttarakālabhāvino ‘
SA15arhebt2u:519_10: nāstīha ghaṭaḥ'; iti vikalpāt, tasya gṛhītagrāhitayā smṛtitvenāpramāṇatvāt- anyasya ghaṭādestatrāsato vyavacchedasyābhāvasya siddhestadabhāvātmakasyaiva pradeśasya tena grahaṇāt /
SA15arhebt2u:519_11: dvividho hyayaṃ pradeśo ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpsastavdyāvṛttarūpatayā tato 'nyo ghaṭavānapi,
SA15arhebt2u:519_13: tasya tadvivekena pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe ghaṭādanyatvaṃ ghaṭavirahaśca gṛhīta eva bhavatīti na vastvasaṃkarasiddhyartham,
SA15arhebt2u:519_16: yataścānyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāva uktena nyāyena siddhyati tato nānyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya liṅgam /
SA15arhebt2u:520_5: anyathoktena nyāyenānyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvarūpatve tādātmyāt kathaṃ sambandhābhāvaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:520_7: na pakṣāntareṇa abhihitā / “tacca tasya” ityādyasyaiva vivaraṇaṃ vyatirekamukhena “ekārthasamavāya” iti paradarśanenoktaṃ /
SA15arhebt2u:520_8: pareṣāṃ hi naiyāyikādīnāṃ vyatiriktāveva kṛtakānityatvākhyau dharmāvekasminneva dharmiṇi samavetāviti kṛtakasyānityatvenaikasminnarthe dharmiṇi samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ dhamasya veti [Hbṭ_181] sambandha evodāharaṇāntaram /
SA15arhebt2u:520_9: atraikarthasamavāya iti saṃyogaḥ sa eva samavāyaśabdenoktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:520_11: pareṣāṃ tvagnidhūmau svāvayaveṣveva samavetāviti na tayorekārthasamavāya ādhārādheyabhāvo veti dhūmasyāgnerupari darśanāllaukikaḥ sambandha uktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:521_0: nanu ceśvarasenena saha vicāraḥ prakrāntaḥ tat kimiti naiyāyikābhimasyāpi sambandhasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayorabhāva ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:521_2: pūrvaṃ hyanyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddhatvāt pratiṣedhyābhāvasya na tadarthaṃ pratyakṣāntaraṃ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:521_3: nāstīha ghaṭaḥ'; ityevamākāraṃ kalpanīyamiti prasaṅgataḥ kathitam /
SA15arhebt2u:521_4: adhunā tu prasaṅgādidamucyate- yadānyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddho 'yaṃ tadabhāvo na bhavati tadā pratyakṣāntaraṃ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:521_5: nāsti iha ghaṭaḥ'; ityevamākāraṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvalakṣaṇāt sannikarṣādiṣṭaṃ bhavatā /
SA15arhebt2u:521_7: atiprasaṅgāt / tataḥ kutastallakṣaṇāt sannikarṣāt tadabhāve pratyakṣaṃ bhavediti /
SA15arhebt2u:522_0: evaṃ sambandhasvarūpamākhyāya tasyehāsambhavamāha- “naivam” yathā kṛtakatvānityatvayoragnidhūmayorvaikārthasamavāyādilakṣaṇaḥ sambandho naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandho yena “asya” tadabhāvasyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:522_2: anyabhāvaśca pradeśākhyaḥ svāvayaveṣu yeṣu vartate na tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:522_3: evaṃ hi pradeśāvayaveṣu ghaṭo nāstīti syāt na pradeśe /
SA15arhebt2u:522_6: na ca ghaṭābhāvo dravyam / navaiva hi dravyāṇīṣyante / na ca kriyāvadādikaṃ dravyalakṣaṇaṃ tatrāsti /
SA15arhebt2u:522_9: na cāyaṃ teṣāmanyatamaḥ / nāpi karmarūpatayapañcasu karmasvanantarbhāvāt tallakṣaṇavirahācca /
SA15arhebt2u:522_16: iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi'; iti / samavāyanimitto vā, ‘iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ'; iti / na cābhāvasyādravyātmanaḥ saṃyogaḥ samasti /
SA15arhebt2u:522_17: nāpi samavāyaḥ, pañcānāmeva hi dravyādīnāṃ padārthānāṃ samavāyitvamiṣyate;
SA15arhebt2u:522_21: na ca tadabhāvo janyaḥ, kāryatāprasaṅgāt / kāryatā cāsyāsambhavinī, yataḥ svakāraṇasamavāyaḥ, sattāsamavāyo vā kāryatocyate bhavadbhiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:522_28: ekākārajñānaviṣayatvāt / sambandhibhedād bhede vā sāmānyādiṣvapi tatprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:522_29: samavāyopyasyānantarameva nirasta iti kutaḥ svakāraṇasattāsamavāyarūpā kāryatā tadabhāvasya syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:523_1: yathā hi artho viṣayaḥ śabdo viṣayīti tayorviṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:523_7: tenārthena vivakṣāviparivartinā śabdasya kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:523_8: yadyapi ca śabdārthayoḥ buddhiparikalpitasāmānyarūpatā tathāpyarthapratibhāsinyā vivakṣayā śabdasāmānyotprekṣānibandhanasya śabdasvalakṣaṇasyotthāpanāt tanmukhena kāryakāraṇabhāva ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:523_10: paro hyavinābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti vyavaharati /
SA15arhebt2u:523_14: nahi ghaṭābhāvapratipādanābhiprāye sati anyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya prayogo niṣpattirbhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:523_15: ghaṭābhāvapratipādanābhiprāyāt prāgapi pradeśasya svahetubhya eva niṣpatteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:523_18: tadvārako 'vinābhāvo vā syāt? yato viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ kalpyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:524_0: syānmatam- yathā śabdārthayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvanimitto viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ tathā anyabhāvatadabhāvayorapi ityetāvanmātreṇa śabdārthayordṛṣṭāntatetyata āha- “siddhe hi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:524_1: śabdārthayorhi kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ anyathārthāntaratve tadayogāt tathehāpi yadi tadabhāvānyabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā tanmukhena sādhyasādhanabhāvadvāreṇa viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:524_2: yāvatā sa eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'sati sambandhe kāryakāraṇabhāvādike na sidhyati,
SA15arhebt2u:526_0: naiva sambandhāntaranibandhano 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'pi tu viṣayaviṣayibhāvanimitta eveti cet;
SA15arhebt2u:526_1: āha- “anyathā” yadi sambandhāntaraṃ neṣyate kintu viṣayaviṣayibhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ tasmācca viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:526_4: kiñcānyabhāvācca liṅgabhūtādabhāvasya liṅginaḥ siddhāvanumitāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ asamudāyaśca sādhyaḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:526_5: anyabhāvena tadabhāvasya kevalasyaiva sādhanāt na kevalasambandhābhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvāyogaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:526_6: samudāyaśca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāpanno dharmadharmilakṣaṇaḥ sādhyo ya iṣṭastadabhāvadoṣaśceti ‘
SA15arhebt2u:527_2: ghaṭābhāvastadanyabhāvāt'; ityevaṃrūpe prayoge ghaṭasya sarvatra deśe sarvadā cābhāvaḥ prasajyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:527_3: dharmiṇi hi kvaciddharmasya guṇabhūtasya sādhane tatraiva tatkāla eva ca bhāvo yukto nānyadeti sarvatra samudāya eva sādhyo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ na kevalo dharma iti /
SA15arhebt2u:528_0: atrāha paraḥ- nāsamudāyasya sādhyatā anyabhāvatadabhāvayorasambandho vā /
SA15arhebt2u:528_1: kutaḥ? / “pradeśādi” ityādi / ‘iha pradeśe ghaṭo nāsti'; ityevaṃ ghaṭābhāvena pradeśādirdharmī viśeṣyate saghaṭāt pradeśāderbhedenāvasthāpyata iti tadviśeṣaṇatvaṃ prāptasādhyate na tu ghaṭo nāstītyevaṃ “kevalo” dharmiṇaḥ kasyacigduṇabhāvamanāpannaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:528_5: tathā hi- śabdādidharmiṇā kṛtakatvādestādātmyalakṣaṇa eva sambandha iṣyate bhavatā /
SA15arhebt2u:529_0: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyadharmalakṣaṇasya liṅgino ghaṭābhāvākhyasyānyabhāvena liṅgena sambandhābhāvaḥ prāgukto na dharmiṇā tataḥ damuttaraṃ sāṃbadhyata iti manyamāno dharmiṇāpyanyabhāvākhyasya liṅgasya sambandhābhāvaṃ darśayannāha- “na” liṅgaliṅginorasambandho na ceti sambadhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:529_2: kintu liṅgaliṅginorasambandha evāsamudāyasādhanameva ca evamapi bruvataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:529_4: etadeva darśayati- yatraiva hi pradeśādau dharmitayā tvayā kalpyamāne yad ghaṭādikaṃ nāsītyucyate lokena sa eva pradeśādistena ghaṭādināsaṃsṛṣṭassaṃsargarahitaḥ “anyabhāvo” liṅgatayeṣṭo nāparaḥ kaścit yataḥ “taddarśanādeva” ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭapradeśādidarśanādevāsya pratipattuḥ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:529_5: ghaṭo nāsti'; iti vikalpo liṅgijñānatayopagato bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:529_6: tataḥ sa evānyabhāvaḥ / yadeva hi dṛśyamānaṃ liṅgijñānaṃ janayati tadeva liṅgamucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:529_9: tataḥ kathaṃ tasyaivānyabhāvasya vyāvṛttito 'pi bhedamananubhavato liṅgaliṅgibhāvo liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ vā? /
SA15arhebt2u:529_13: samudāyasādhyatā vā? / śabdakṛtakatvayostu paramārthatastādātmye 'pi vyāvṛttibhedanibandhano 'styeva bhedaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:529_14: tataḥ śabdādidharmipratipattāvapyanityatvādyapratītau kṛtakatvādinā tat sādhyata iti yuktam /
SA15arhebt2u:530_0: syānmatam- sāmānyaviśeṣakalpanayā liṅgaliṅgitaikasyāpi bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “na cātra” prakṛte 'nyabhāve “sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanā sambhavati”,
SA15arhebt2u:530_1: yena sāmānyaviśeṣavikalpena sāmānyaṃ heturbhaved viśeṣo dharmī,
SA15arhebt2u:530_2: yataḥ samudāyasādhyatā [Hbṭ_186] liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandho vā syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:530_3: kuto na sambhavatītyāha- tadviśeṣapratipattereva” ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣapratipattereva “tadabhāvasya” ghaṭābhāvasya pratīteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:530_4: yataśca viśeṣa eva ghaṭābhāvapratītinibandhanaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tatra sāmānyakalpanayā kriyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:530_5: sa eva viśeṣo 'nyatra vartamānaḥ sāmānyarūpatāṃ pratipatsyata iti cet,
SA15arhebt2u:530_6: āha- “tasya” ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣasya “anyatra” sajātīye “anvayasya” anuvṛtterabhāvāt kutaḥ sāmānyātmatā? /
SA15arhebt2u:530_9: yadi hi ghaṭavivikta eva pradeśaviśeṣo dharmī,
SA15arhebt2u:530_10: tasyaiva ca hetuteṣyate, tadā pratijñāyā yo 'rtho dharmadharmisamudāyastadekadeśa eva dharmilakṣaṇo hetuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:530_12: atha mā bhūt eṣa doṣa iti na ghaṭavivikta eva pradeśaviśeṣo heturiṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:530_13: kintu pradeśamātraṃ ghaṭaviviktatāviśeṣarahitamityata āha- “na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃ tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ” /
SA15arhebt2u:530_14: saghaṭe 'pi pradeśe pradeśamātrasya bhāvādanaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:531_0: paro 'nyathā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaṃ darśayannāha- tādṛśau(śe) yādṛśo ghaṭaviviktaḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'grataḥ sthitastādṛśe sarvatra pradeśe ghaṭasyābhāva iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:531_2: yo 'sau kevalaḥ pradeśaviśeṣo dharmitayāvasthāpitastasyaiva yat kaivalyaṃ kevala ityanena viśeṣaṇenocyate bhavatā,
SA15arhebt2u:531_3: ta deva ghaṭaviraho ghaṭābhāva iti kathyate /
SA15arhebt2u:531_4: sa ca ghaṭaviraho liṅgabhūtasya kevalasya pradeśasya pratipattāveva siddho na tūttarakālaṃ tato 'nya eva ākārāntareṇa dhūmādivāgniḥ sidhyati /
SA15arhebt2u:531_6: na kasyacit / [Hbṭ_187] jijñāsitasya ghaṭābhāvasya siddheranyasya kasyacidajijñāsitatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:531_8: yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśastatra tatra ghaṭavirahaḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:531_11: yata evaṃ tasmādanyabhāvaḥ kevalapradeśalakṣaṇaḥ sādhyasādhanayorbhedābhāvānna sādhanamabhāvasyeti sthitam /
SA15arhebt2u:531_12: tadevaṃ samudāyasādhyatāṃ liṅgasya ca dharmiṇāsambandhaṃ pratipādayituṃ yaduktaṃ pareṇa- ‘
SA15arhebt2u:532_0: viṣayaviṣayibhāvena tu sambandhapratipādane niraste paro 'nyathā sambandhaṃ sādhyasādhanayorddarśayannāha- “astya”nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandho virodhākhyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:532_2: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyasādhanayorvirodhamevāsambhāvayan pṛcchati- “kena kasya virodhaḥ” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:532_4: paro virodhamabhiprāyanabhijñatayā darśayati- “anyabhāvena” kevalapradeśātmanā “pratiyogino” yasyābhāvaḥ pramātumiṣṭo ghaṭādestasyeti /
SA15arhebt2u:533_0: parasyaivaṃvādino asambandhābhidhāyitāmādarśayannāha- “kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī” ghaṭādiḥ pramātumiṣṭo yena pratiyoginaḥ prameyatvena liṅgaliṅginorvirodhaḥ sambandho 'bhidhīyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:533_1: naiva pratiyogī pramātumiṣṭaḥ kintu tadabhāva iti cet,
SA15arhebt2u:534_0: [kumārilastu manyate bhavāṃśādbhinno ']yamabhāvāṃśastato nānyabhāva eva tadabhāva iti kathaṃ tatpratipattireva tadabhāvapratipattiriti /
SA15arhebt2u:534_2: [Hbṭ_188] na cāvastuno bhedaḥ sambhavati ato 'yaṃ vasturūpa eva /
SA15arhebt2u:537_1: “tasyā”nyasya pradeśasya kevalasya yat tat “kaivalya” mekākikatvamasahāyatā tadeva “aparasya” pratiyogino ghaṭādeḥ “vaikalyam” abhāva “iti” tasmāt “tadanyabhāva eva” bhāvāṃśa eva tvadabhimataḥ “tadabhāvaḥ” pratiyogyabhāvāṃśo na tataḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmāntaramityucyate sugatasutaiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:537_2: tataśca “tatpratipattireva ca” tasyānyabhāvasya pratipattireva ca “tadapratipattiḥ” tasya pratiyogino 'pratipattirabhāvapratipattiriti yāvat /
SA15arhebt2u:537_3: evaṃ manyate- yo 'yamabhāvāṃśo bhāvāṃśāt pṛthagbhūto vastuno dharmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭādyabhāvātmakatāṃ tadrūpavaikalyādevānubhavati nānyathā /
SA15arhebt2u:537_6: nahi yad yadrūpavikalaṃ na bhavati tat tato 'nyatvamanubhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:537_7: yathā tasyaiva svarūpam, tathā cābhāvāṃśo 'pi tasya na sidhyet,
SA15arhebt2u:537_10: sarvasya ca sarvatropayogaḥ syādityavaśyamanyavastuno bhāvarūpatā tadanyābhāvātmikaiva /
SA15arhebt2u:537_12: tatsaṃyoga eva cendriyasya tadanyābhāvasaṃyoga iti kimucyate-
SA15arhebt2u:538_1: “ iti? / vikalpāpekṣayoktamiti cet, tadetadabādhakameva / pratyakṣeṇa tadākārotpattyā tadanyabhāvātmake eva vasturūpe pratipanne pāścātyasya [Hbṭ_189] yathāgṛhītābhilāpino vikalpasyopagamāt /
SA15arhebt2u:538_2: vistarataścāyamabhāvavicāraḥ pramāṇadvitvasiddhāvabhāvaṃ prameyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vicārayatā vihita iti tata evāvavadhārya iti /
SA15arhebt2u:539_2: ‘nāstyatredam'; ityabhāvavyavahārārthaṃ cābhāvapramāṇaparikalpanā yukteti darśayannāha- “anyathā” yadi tatpratipattireva tadabhāvapratipattiriti neṣyate tadā “tasya” anyavastunaḥ svarūpaparicchedena tato 'nyasyātadrūpasya “avyavacchede” anirākaraṇe tadabhāvāpratipattau “tatpariccheda eva na syāt”- tasya tadanyavastunaḥ svarūpapratipattireva na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:539_3: kiṃ kāraṇam? “tadatadrūpayoḥ” tasya tadanyavastuno yadrūpaṃ pratiniyataṃ sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaṃ yaccātadrūpaṃ tadrūpaṃ na bhavati pararūpaṃ tayoḥ “avivekād” avivecanād vivekenāvyavasthāpanādasāṅkaryeṇāprasādhanāt /
SA15arhebt2u:539_4: sakalapararūpāsaṅkirṇaṃ hi tadrūpam taccet tatsāmarthyabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā nānukṛtaṃ kevalaṃ sammugdhākārameva tadutpannaṃ tadā kathantena tatparicchedaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:539_5: na hi yadrūpaṃ yadvastu tadrūpānanukāriṇā jñānena tatparicchedo yukto yathā- śukuśaṅkharūpānanukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pītaśaṅkhāvabhāsinā jñāneneti /
SA15arhebt2u:540_0: bhavatyevaṃ tataḥ ko doṣaḥ? ityata āha- “ya eṣa vyavahāraḥ” sarvajanapratitaḥ “kasyacid” agnyādervastuno darśanāt “kvaciddeśe” tatsambandhini “prāptyartho” dṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasya ca “parihārārthaḥ” pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ “sa na syāt” /
SA15arhebt2u:540_1: kiṃ kāraṇam? / “na hi” yasmād “ayaṃ” pratipattā “analaṃ paśyannapi” saṅkīrṇatadadrūpapratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa,
SA15arhebt2u:540_3: tathā hi- asaṅkīrṇasyādarśane saṅkīrṇamapi yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭādiprakhyaṃ kathaṃ kasyacidetaddarśanaṃ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:540_4: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ saṅkīrṇadarśanavān pratipattā [Hbṭ_190] katham “analameva paśyati” na salilādikam? /
SA15arhebt2u:540_6: tataḥ kathaṃ “salilārthī tatra” agnimati pradeśe “na pravarteta”? /
SA15arhebt2u:541_3: tato jñānadvayena tadatadrūpayorvivekālloke pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyato vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:541_5: kadācit paro brūyāt salilopalambhavirahamātramityata āha- “yadi salila” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:543_0: iti vacanāt / kintu yo 'sāvātmanaḥ pratiṣedhyavastupratibhāsijñānātmanāpariṇāmaḥ sa tadanyavastupratibhāsijñānasahacarito 'bhyupagantavyo na kevala iti paramabhyupagamayitumasyopanyāsaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:543_3: na ca tadanyavastuvijñānapariṇāmādanya eva tasyāpariṇāmo nāma bhavato 'bhimato bhāvāntarasyaivābhāvatvenopagatatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:543_4: tulyayogyatārūpasyaikajñānasaṃsargiṇa eva cānyavastuno vijñānaṃ tathopeyaṃ nānyasya,
SA15arhebt2u:543_8: rūpāntarāvabhāsitve hi tasya salilopalambhābhāva eva na sidhyet /
SA15arhebt2u:543_11: tatra yadi salilopalambhābhāvaḥ tuccharūpo 'nupalambhastadā kathamabhāvaḥ [Hbṭ_191] kasyacit pratipattiḥ pariccheda iti yāvat,
SA15arhebt2u:543_13: atha na tasya pratipattirūpateṣyate kintu taddhetubhāva ityata āha- “pratipattiheturvā” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:543_14: nahi sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya pratipattiṃ prati hetubhāvo yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:543_15: hetubhāve vā tasyānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tajjñānajananādabhāvajñānamevaikaṃ pratipattuḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:544_0: na cājñātasyāsya nāstitājñānajananaṃ yuktamityāha- “tasyāpi” salilopalambhābhāvasya kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:544_1: athāyaṃ salilopalambhābhāvaḥ svayamapratīta eva salilābhāvapratītiṃ janayati tadā kasyacidapi /
SA15arhebt2u:544_4: tatrāpi tadaṅgīkaraṇe cātmano 'pariṇāmasya tadātmakatvānna tato bhedena vyavasthāpyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:544_5: tataśca kasyacidapi tasya tadanyasya vāpratipattāvapi yadyabhāvaḥ salilādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpādyavasthāsvapi salilādyabhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:544_9: yada caivamuktena prakāreṇānupalambhena salilābhāvapratītirna yujyate 'nalapratibhāsinaśca jñānasya pratiniyatākāratā nābhyupagamyate “tasmādayam” analadarśī pratipattānalaṃ “paśyannapi” saṅkīrṇarūpapratibhāsinā jñānena ‘
SA15arhebt2u:544_10: analo 'yaṃ na salilam'; iti nādhyavasyati anadhyavasyaṃśca salilarūpasyāpi pratibhāsanāt tadarthī “na tiṣṭhet” pravarteta “nāpi pratiṣṭheta” salilārthī na pravarteta /
SA15arhebt2u:544_11: tathāhi- salilaṃ nāma taducyate yat sarvodanyāsantāpādyapanayanakṣamaṃ sakalatadanyarūpāsaṃkīrṇapratiniyatākārajñānāvabhāsi /
SA15arhebt2u:545_1: na mayā salilopalambhanivṛttimātrāt tu ccharūpāt tadabhāvagatirucyate,
SA15arhebt2u:545_2: yathoktadoṣaprasaṅgāt / kintu yadetadekasya kevalasyānalasya darśanaṃ tata evānyasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya salilasyābhāvagatirbhavati ‘
SA15arhebt2u:546_5: salilaṃ nāsti'; iti niścayaḥ sañjāyate / tathāhi- anala iva salilamapi yadi tatrābhaviṣyat tadapyanalavad darśane pratyayabhāsiṣyata tayoḥ svajñānaṃ pratyaviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā naikasya pratibhāso yuktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:546_6: tasmādekapratibhāsanamanyābhāvanāntarīyakaṃ ityanyābhāve tato jñānamutpadyate anyavastuni ca vijñānaṃ nāstīti jñānaṃ janayati /
SA15arhebt2u:546_8: tadrūpatayaiva ca tajjñānamanyat pratiyadevaṃ vyapadiśyate 'nyathā tadayogādityanyapratipattireva tadabhāvavikalpaheturiti siddhāntavādyāha- “idameva” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:546_9: nanvasmābhiridameva prāgabhihitaṃ “tayoḥ satoḥ naikarūpaniyatā pratipattiḥ asambhavāt” ityādibhirvacanaiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:546_10: tato yadevānyāsaṃsargiṇaḥ kevalasya pratibhāsanaṃ tadeva tadanyābhāvasyāpi,
SA15arhebt2u:546_12: tataḥ pratyakṣāvabhāsitatvāt tadabhāvasya tabdalāt pāścātyaṃ vyavahārapravartanarūpaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ vikalpakamājāyate /
SA15arhebt2u:546_14: yatastadanyavastuni vijñānaṃ pratyakṣātmakamapyanavagate tadanyābhāve jñānaṃ janayat pṛthagabhāvapramāṇatayā vyavasthāpyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:546_15: tathā hi- tadanyākāraśūnya eva tadekajñānākāraḥ saṃvedyate /
SA15arhebt2u:546_20: analo 'trāsti'; iti pāścātyo vikalpo vyavahārapravartanamātraṃ na tataḥ pṛthak pramāṇaṃ yathoktaṃ prāk,
SA15arhebt2u:546_21: tathā nāstitājñānamapi vikalpakaṃ tatphaṃladvāreṇa vānyavastuvijñānaṃ na pratyakṣāt pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:546_23: tadeva tvayāpyabhidhīyata iti kasmāt paruṣamivābhāti yatastadanabhyupagamena pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇamabhyupagatamityupahasati /
SA15arhebt2u:546_24: tathā hyagatyedānīṃ tvayocyate na madhyasthatayā anyathedameva kiṃ na pūrvamevābhihitam?,
SA15arhebt2u:546_25: yata ālajālabhidhānenātmā parikleśita ityupasaṃharannāha- “ tasmāt tīrādarśineva” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:546_26: yathā kila vahanārūḍhairvarṇigbhiḥ śakunirmucyate api nāma tīraṃ drakṣyatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:546_27: sa yadā sarvataḥ paryaṭaṃstīreṃ nāsādayati tadā vahanamevāgacchati tadvadetadapi draṣṭavyam /
SA15arhebt2u:546_28: yataścāvaśyabhyupagamanīyo 'yaṃ pakṣastasmānna kiñcidanayāvidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ pratipattyā prayojanam /
SA15arhebt2u:547_2: iti codite ‘na vai kutaścit sambandhād'; ityādyabhihitam / ataḥ ‘anyabhāva eva tadabhāvo 'nyabhāvagatireva ca tadabhāvagatiḥ';
SA15arhebt2u:547_3: iti prasādhayatā kumārilaparikalpitaḥ kasyacidabhāvaniścayārthamabhāvapramāṇavādaḥ prasaṅgato nirastaḥ samprati tu-
SA15arhebt2u:549_1: yadi hi “ekasya” kevalasya paricchedādanyasya “vyavacchedaḥ” pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyati tadā sarvasyā a(syā)nyasyāviśeṣeṇaiva “tatra” deśe yatrāsāvekaḥ paridṛśyate tatrābhāvasiddhirbhavet,
SA15arhebt2u:549_2: na tu viśeṣaparigraheṇa tulyā svajñānajananaṃ prati yogyāvasthā yasya tasyaiveti /
SA15arhebt2u:549_3: tathā hi- asau yathā tulyayogyatārūpapadārthaviviktarūpa upalabhyate,
SA15arhebt2u:549_6: tataśca tadviviktākāratayā tadanyābhavasādhane viśeṣābhāvāt pradeśarūpajñānaṃ ghaṭābhavamiva rasādyabhāvamapi sādhayet,
SA15arhebt2u:550_2: kiṃ kāraṇam? yato ye 'pyanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāsteṣāmapi tatra deśe tadekākāratayā jñānasya vyavacchedo bhavatyeva /
SA15arhebt2u:550_3: tathā hi- yathopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāstadekākāravati jñāne na pratibhāsante tataśca vyavacchidyante tathānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptā apīti kim ‘
SA15arhebt2u:550_5: evaṃ pūrvapakṣe vyavasthite yadi tadanyavyavacchedaḥ- tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇamanyatvena vyavasthāpanamabhimataṃ tadabhyupagamyata eva /
SA15arhebt2u:550_6: atha taddeśakālayorabhāvaḥ, tadayuktam, yena hi sāmarthyena tulyayogyatārūpasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya cābhāvaṃ sādhayati na tatsāmarthyamatulyayogyatārūpe 'nupalbdhilakṣaṇaprāpte vā sambhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:550_10: yat puro 'vasthitaṃ pratyakṣe 'vabhāsate tasyaikasyātmanaḥ pratiniyatasya rūpasya paricchedāt tadākārotpattyā vidhivikalpotpādanena ca yaḥ “tadanyaḥ” tato 'nyastadvayatiriktastasya sarvasya ya “ātmā” svabhāvastato [Hbṭ_195] “vyavacchedo” bhedanaṃ pṛthakkaraṇamanyatvasādhanamasaṅkīrṇarūpatāpratyāyanaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:550_11: kathaṃ punarekātmaparicchedādeva tasya tadanyātmano vyavacchedaḥ pratyakṣeṇa kriyate?,
SA15arhebt2u:550_13: yattu tadvayatiriktamaśeṣapadārthajātaṃ tadātmanastasya puro 'vasthitasya kathaṃ tavdyavacchedakam? ataḥ tavdyavacchedārthamabhāvapramāṇamabhyupeyam,
SA15arhebt2u:552_5: tasmin pararūpāsaṃkīrṇe svabhāvata eva tadātmaniyato yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ pararūpapratibhāsāsaṃkīrṇaḥ tadekapadārthasāmarthyabhāvini pratyakṣe pararūpapratibhāsāyogāt tasya bhrāntatāpattyā pratyakṣātāhāneḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:552_7: tasya tadātmaniyatapratibhāsaya jñānāt pratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvittyā saṃvedanāt /
SA15arhebt2u:552_8: tatsaṃvedanameva hi pratyakṣasyātadrūpād “vyavacchedanaṃ” pṛthakkaraṇaṃ tabdalenaiva ca pāścātyaḥ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:552_9: anyātmakametanna bhavati'; ityasāṃkaryavasthāpratyayo vikalpakaḥ saṃjāyate gṝhītagrāhī /
SA15arhebt2u:553_0: yadi nāma tadātmaniyatapratibhāsajñānaṃ tathāpi kathamanyātmanaḥ tasya pṛthakkaraṇam? ityata āha- “na hi tadātma” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:553_1: yasmāttasya vastuno ya ātmā pararūpāsaṃkīrṇaḥ sa tadanyasya śeṣasya vastuna ātmā na bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:553_7: tadāsya viṣayasyānyātmanaḥ sakāśādavyavacchede pṛthagavyavasthāpane parātmano 'pi tatra paricchedaḥ syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:554_0: na kevalamanyātmanastannivartayati tadātmano 'pyaśeṣamanyaditi darśayannāha- “taṃ ca” agrataḥ sthitaṃ deśakālasvabhāvāvasthāniyataṃ tadanyadeśādibhyo vyāvṛttātmanaḥ svahetubhyaḥ evāsya bhāvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:554_1: “tadātmanā” deśādiniyatenātmanā tathāvidhasvabhāvasyaivānukārādupalabhamānā buddhiḥ “tathātvapracyutim” anyadeśakālasvabhāvāvasthatām “asya” svaviṣayasya “vyavacchinatti” tataḥ pṛthakkaroti /
SA15arhebt2u:554_2: kasmātpunaranyadeśāditāṃ tataḥ pṛthagavasthāpayati ityata āha- “evaṃ hi” yasmādanyadeśatādestataḥ pṛthakkaraṇe sati taddeśādiniyataḥ padārthaḥ paricchinno bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:554_3: tadrūpasyaivānukārād / yadyanyathābhāvo 'nyadeśāditā tadrūpānanukārāvdyavacchinnaḥ- bhavati tathātvaṃ ca taddeśādiniyatatvaṃ ca,
SA15arhebt2u:554_5: yata evam “iti” tasmādanyathābhūtādanyadeśādimatastathābhūtaṃ taddeśādimaṃtaṃ “vyavacchindatyeva” nivartayantyeva tat paricchinattīti pūrvakasyopasaṃhāraḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:554_6: tathā “tathābhūtādanyathābhūtaṃ vyavacchindatyeva” iti dvitīyasyopasaṃhāraḥ kārya iti /
SA15arhebt2u:554_7: “evam” uktena nyāyena “ekasya” pramāṇasya pratyakṣasyānumānasya vā tasyāpyevameva svaviṣayaparicchedād “vṛttiḥ” pravṛttiḥ sarvabhāvān “dvairāśye” tattve 'nyatve ca “vyavasthāpayati” /
SA15arhebt2u:555_3: iti / pratyakṣaṃ ca nirvikalpakamiṣyate tat kathamasāṃkaryasiddhistataḥ? ityata āha- “tasyānvaye” tyādi /
SA15arhebt2u:555_4: taddhi pratyakṣaṃ vidhipratiṣedhavikalpau yadā svaviṣaye janayati tadaivāsya sāphalyam,
SA15arhebt2u:555_5: tadaiva ca pramāṇamiṣyate nānyadā ata evaikasyārthasvabhāvasyāpratipannāṃśābhāvāt sarvātmanā paricchede 'pi bhrāntikāraṇasadbhāvāt kṣaṇikatādāvanvayavyatirekabuddhī janayitumasāmarthyāt tatrāsya prāmāṇyaṃ neṣyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:556_0: syānmatam- dvairāśyasādhane 'pyasāṃkaryasiddhyarthā mā bhūdabhāvapramāṇakalpanā kintu prakārāntarābhāvasiddhyarthā bhaviṣyati /
SA15arhebt2u:556_1: na hi tadabhāvasiddhau pratyakṣasya kaścid vyāpāraḥ pratipādita iti ata āha “tadvyatirikte”tyādi /
SA15arhebt2u:556_2: tasmāt paridṛśyamānād vyatiriktasyāśeṣasya vastuno vyavacchedena tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇenānyatvena yā vyāptistatsādhanādeva prakārāntarasya tattvānyatvabahirbhūtasyābhāvaḥ sidhyati /
SA15arhebt2u:557_0: atha matam- sarvasyāparidṛṣṭasya dṛśyamānādanyatayā vyāptiṃ naivaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sādhayati tat kutastṛtīyarāśyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣata eva syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:557_1: yato 'bhāvaprāmāṇyakalpanā vyarthā bhavedityata āha- “tasya” tṛtīyarāśitayā kalpyamānasya tato dṛṣṭādanyatayā vyāptyabhāve “tena” pratyakṣeṇa “tato”'rthāt svaviṣayasya “avyavacchedā” dapṛthakkaraṇāt,
SA15arhebt2u:557_2: tadarthasya ca rāśyantaratvena kalpyamānasya svaviṣayādavyavacchedāt apṛthakkaraṇāt punarapi bhāvasya svaviṣayasyāparicchedaprasaṅgāt /
SA15arhebt2u:557_3: sa hi tadviṣayaḥ sakalapararūpāsaṃkīrṇātmā yadi tenātmanā na paricchinnaḥ kathaṃ tena tasya paricchedaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:557_4: tenātmanā paricchede vā kathaṃ sarvasya tadanyatayā vyāptyasādhanam? anyathaikasyāpi tadanyatvaṃ na syāt,
SA15arhebt2u:557_5: nimittasya samānatvāditi / yata evaṃ “tasmāt” kvacidvastuni pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣādikaṃ [Hbṭ_198] pravṛttaṃ tadvastu pratiniyatenātmanā paricchinatti,
SA15arhebt2u:558_0: evamekasya pramāṇasya vyāpāra eṣo 'nantarokta iti tamevopasaṃhṛtya sukhapratipattaye darśayannāha- “tathāhi” kvacidvastuni “pramāṇaṃ” pratyakṣādi pravṛttaṃ “tadeva” vastu tadanyasmāt “pārūpād vyavacchinatti” tataḥ pṛthakkaroti tadasaṃkīrṇarūpatayā pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt2u:558_1: paramārthatastasya tadrūpatvāt yathāvastu ca pratyakṣeṇa rūpānukārāt /
SA15arhebt2u:558_4: tathā “tadanyadeva ca” tasmād dṛśyamānādanyadeva ca vyavacchinatti /
SA15arhebt2u:558_5: kutaḥ? / “tasmāt” svaviṣayāt / na kevalaṃ svaviṣayaṃ parato vyavacchinatti,
SA15arhebt2u:558_6: paramapi svaviṣayād iti / kuta etad? / anyasya pararūpasya tatra khālambane 'paricchedādavaśyamevāparicchinnasya paricchinnādanyatvaṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:558_7: yata evamataḥ “tad” eva pramāṇamekavastuparicchedakaṃ prakārāntarābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
SA15arhebt2u:558_8: nābhāvākhyam / kuta etat? / tasmiṃ dṛśyamāne vastuni dṛṣṭatadanyatvena tasyānyasya tatrāparicchidyamānasyānyatvaṃ tadanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭāt tadanyatvaṃ “dṛṣṭatadanyatvaṃ” tena sarvasya tavdyatiriktasya vyavasthāpanānna a(panena a) tadanyasyaiva ca yadanyanna bhavati puro 'vasthitaṃ sakalaparabhāvavyāvṛttaṃ tasyaiva tattvena dṛśyamānaprakāratayā vyavasthāpanāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:559_1: etena anantaroktena nyāyena pratiniyataikapadārtharūpānukāriṇī buddhirupajāyamānā tadviparītarūpaṃ sarvaṃ svaviṣayād vyavacchindatī dvairāśyaṃ tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ ca sādhayatīti ye kecidanyonyavyacchedarūpāḥ kramākramanityānityādayaḥ te vyākhyātāḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:559_2: [Hbṭ_199] tathā hi- kāryasya kramamananyasahāyatāṃ pratiyatyeva buddhistasyākramaṃ kāryāntarasāhityaṃ tataḥ pṛthakkaroti /
SA15arhebt2u:559_3: tataḥ kramākramatayā dvaitasiddheḥ tṛtīyasya prakārasya sambhavo nirasto bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:559_5: evamudayānantaradhvaṃsitā kṣaṇikatocyate iti pratīyatī vyavasthāpanākāla eva buddhistadviparītarūpatāyāḥ svaviṣayādapākaraṇāt tato 'nyatvena prakārāntare 'vasthāpanād rāśyantarābhāva iti /
SA15arhebt2u:560_0: tadevamekapramāṇanibandhanāmasāṅkaryasiddhiṃ pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tadevam” uktena nyāyena “ekasya” pratiniyatātmana upalambhāt tasyopalabhyamānasya yastato 'nyastattulyayogyatārūpastavdiparīto vā tadrūpavikalastadātmano “vyavacchedaḥ” pṛthakkaraṇaṃ tasyopalabhyamānasyānupalabhyamānasvabhāvād rūpāntareṇa pratibhāsanāt /
SA15arhebt2u:560_1: tathā tasya svaviṣayasya tadanyātmatāyā bhāvapradhānatvānnirddeśasya “vyavacchedo bhavati” asāṅkaryaṃ sidhyati /
SA15arhebt2u:561_0: tad yadyetadaviśeṣeṇānyasya sarvasya tannābhāvasiddhiḥ syādityatrābhimataṃ tadā siddhasādhanam,
SA15arhebt2u:561_1: yataḥ sarvamaviśeṣeṇaiva tadekākārayā budhyā tadrūpavikalaṃ svaviṣayādavacchidyate,
SA15arhebt2u:561_3: atha taddeśakālayorabhāvaḥ sarvasya tadviparītarūpasya vyavacchedo 'bhimataḥ sa na yukta iti darśayati- “na taddeśakālayoḥ” yatrāsau pratiniyatātmā sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaḥ padārtha upalabhyate tatra sarvasyānyasya bhāvasya tattulyayogyatārūpasyetarasya vā vyavacchedaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:561_4: yena hi kāraṇena tattulyayogyatārūpasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya pratiṣedhastasmin sati tadekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatterasaṃbhavāt tadabhāvanāntarīyikā sā bhāvantī tatpratiṣedhaṃ gamayatīti tatkāraṇamanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpte tadatulyayogyatārūpe ca na sambhavatīti kathaṃ tadabhāvaḥ sidhyet /
SA15arhebt2u:562_1: etadevopasaṃharannāha- “tasmādatadātmā” ca sarvastadviparītarūpastadekākārayā buddhyā prasādhitaḥ syāt “taddeśakālaśca” tasya pratibhāsamānasya yau deśakālau tau yasya,
SA15arhebt2u:562_2: sa ca syāt / kiṃvat? / rasarūpādivaditi / nahi rūpapratibhāsinā jñānena tadrūpavikalasya rasasya svaviṣayāt pṛthakkaraṇe 'pi tadasāṃkaryasādhane 'pi taddeśakālayorabhāvaḥ sidhyati /
SA15arhebt2u:565_1: sa evānyabhāvastadviṣayā copalabdhiḥ tadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam';
SA15arhebt2u:565_2: iti tatrānyabhāvasya tadabhāvaṃ prati liṅgatve niraste tadviṣayāyā upalabdhernirākurvannāha- “anyābhāvaviṣaye”tyādi /
SA15arhebt2u:565_6: kiṃ kāraṇam? / yataḥ tatrāpyanyabhāvaviṣayāyāmupalabdhāva'bhāvasya pṛthaganyabhāvāt sādhyatve kalpyamāne sambandhābhāvasya tadabhāvena tulyatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:565_7: na hi tasyā api anyabhāvarūpāyāḥ tadabhāvena kaścidekārthasamavāyādirūpaḥ sambandho 'stīti /
SA15arhebt2u:566_1: yeyamanyabhāvaviṣayā upalabdhirlliṅgatayocyate tasyāstadviviktapradeśākārāyā [Hbṭ_201] “avirbhāvakāla eva” janmakāle pratītikāla eva vā tadabhāvasiddheśca /
SA15arhebt2u:566_3: tadeva sādhayati- na hyanyasya tadviviktasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya pratipattā punaruttarakālaṃ tatpratipatteranyabhāvapratipattestadabhāvenānvayavyatirekau prasādhya pratibandhasādhakena pramāṇena tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
SA15arhebt2u:566_4: kiṃ tarhi? / tadanyaṃ tadviviktarūpaṃ pratipadyamāna eva tasya pratiyogino 'bhāvaṃ pratipadyate,
SA15arhebt2u:566_6: tathā hi- saghaṭapradeśāsaṃkīrṇarūpasya kevalapradeśasya darśanameva ghaṭābhāvadarśanam /
SA15arhebt2u:566_7: nahi ‘ghaṭo 'tra nāsti'; ‘ghaṭavānayaṃ na bhavati'; ‘saghaṭādanyaḥ'; ityarthabhedaḥ kaścit / tataḥ saghaṭādanyatayā kevalapradeśasya darśanameva ghaṭābhāvadarśanamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:566_9: kathaṃ jñāyate iti cet / darśanānantaramanvayavyatirekasādhanalakṣaṇena vyavadhānena vinā ‘
SA15arhebt2u:566_11: ‘idaṃ tu ghaṭavastu nāsti'; iti pāścātyena vikalpadvayena vyavasthāpanāt /
SA15arhebt2u:567_2: ihāpyastyevānvaya iti cet, āha- “na hyevaṃ śakyam” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:567_3: kasmānna śakya darśayitum? / tadekopalabdheḥ tasyaikasyānanyasaṃsargiṇo yopalabdhirviśeṣarūpā tasyāḥ kvacidapyanyatrābhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:567_4: atha tadviviktopalabdhisāmānyaṃ heturūcyate- yatra yatra ghaṭaviviktabhūtalopalabdhistatra tatra ghaṭābhāvo yathā pūrvānubhūte ghaṭavivikte pradeśa ityāha- “sāmānyena pradarśane kriyamāṇe” dṛṣṭānte 'pi pūrvānubhūtaghaṭavivikte pradeśe ghaṭābhāvasya prasādhakaṃ pratyakṣādikaṃ pramāṇāntaramanyabhāvaviṣayopalabdhernāsti,
SA15arhebt2u:567_5: kiṃ tu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya sādhikā /
SA15arhebt2u:567_6: [Hbṭ_202] sā ca yathā sādhyadharmiṇi tadabhāvasiddhye dṛṣṭāntamapekṣate tathā dṛṣṭānte 'pi /
SA15arhebt2u:567_16: mūḍhapratipattau sādhyāyāṃ / yastvamūḍho viṣayapratipattau viṣayiṇaṃ smaratyeva tasyābhāvavyavahāraḥ pratyakṣanibandhana eveti na tatrānupalabdherliṅgateti sucarccitamevānyatretīhālaṃ prasaṅgeneti /
SA15arhebt2u:569_1: katham? / siddhe tatprasādhakena pramāṇena kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇasyānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:569_2: kīdṛśasya? / siddhābhāvasya / tathā, vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ tatprasādhanapramāṇabalenaiva siddhābhāvasyaiva vyāpakasya nānyasya vyāpakānupalabdherevāsiddhatāprasaṅgād /
SA15arhebt2u:569_4: evaṃ trividhānupalabdhiḥ / kathaṃ punaḥ kāraṇavyāpakayorabhāvavyavahāraḥ sidhyati yatastayoḥ siddhābhāvatocyata ityāha- “tatra kāraṇavyāpakayorapi” na kevalaṃ yasya sākṣādabhāvavyavahāraḥ sādhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:569_8: samuccayārtho vāśabdaḥ / atha kiṃ svabhāvānupalabdhāvapyabhāvo liṅgatayā sādhyata ityāha- “svabhāvānupalabdhau tu” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:570_0: atra parasya vacanāvakāśamāśaṅkayāha- “yadi” tarhi “kāraṇavyāpakau” siddho 'savdyavahāro yayoḥ tau santau /
SA15arhebt2u:570_1: kena? / “tadanyasya” kāraṇavyāpakaviviktasya bhāvasya siddhiryā pratyakṣatmikā tadrūpayānupalabdhyā,
SA15arhebt2u:570_2: anyasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vābhāvamabhāvavyavahāraṃ ca sādhayataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:570_3: sā cānyabhāvopalabdhistayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakayorupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāveva satyāmasavdyavahārasya sādhikā nānyathā ityevamiṣyamāṇe sati kathaṃ tayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ parokṣe 'rthe viṣaye prayogaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:570_4: yadā kāryasvabhāvahetvorvyatirekaprayogaḥ kriyate- yatra yatrāgnirnāsti tatra tatra dhūmo 'pi nāsti,
SA15arhebt2u:570_5: tathā yatra yatra vṛkṣo nāsti kṣaṇikatā vā tatra tatra śiṃśapā nāsti sattvaṃ vā ityaśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa vyatirekaprayoge sati /
SA15arhebt2u:570_6: nahi tadāgnivṛkṣavyatiriktāḥ sarve 'rthāḥ pratyakṣatā(kṣā) akṣaṇikatā vā /
SA15arhebt2u:570_7: tataśca kathaṃ tadviviktopalabdhilakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ pratiyogino vopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatā siddhā? /
SA15arhebt2u:570_8: tathā ca kathamaśeṣopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptyā kāryasvabhāvahetvo 'rvyatirekaḥ sidhyet? /
SA15arhebt2u:571_0: siddhāntavādyāha- “naiva” parokṣe 'rthe kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ “prayogo” vyatirekopadarśanakāle “pramāṇatayā” kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vānupalabdhiḥ pramāṇabhūtā naiva prayujyate /
SA15arhebt2u:571_1: kasmāt? / “liṅgasya” kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhilakṣaṇasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya vā “aniścayāt” tadanupalabdhyoḥ sandeharūpatvāt tadabhāvasya ca sandigdhatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:571_2: kathaṃ tarhi tadānayoḥ prayoga iṣyate? ityāha- “kevalam” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:571_3: kāraṇavyāpakayorhikāryakāraṇabhāvaprasādhakena [Hbṭ_204] pūrvoktena pramāṇena vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasādhakena ca tadutpattilakṣaṇe tādātmyalakṣaṇe ca sambandhe sādhite siddhasambandhayoryadyabhāvo yatra yatrā bhāvaḥ syāt parasyāpi kāryasya vyāpyasya vāvaśyaṃ niyamenābhāvo 'nyathāhetukatvaprasaṅgāt,
SA15arhebt2u:571_4: niḥsvabhāvatāprasaṅgācca / taddvāreṇa pratibandhaprasādhake pramāṇe smṛtiḥ kathaṃ nāma syādityetasyārthasya darśanārthamete kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī prayujyete iti /
SA15arhebt2u:571_5: darśanādarśanabalena tu sādhane yatraivaikadarśane paro dṛṣṭo 'darśane vā na dṛṣṭaḥ tatraiva tasya bhāvo 'bhāvo vā bhavatu sarvatra tu kasmād bhavati? /
SA15arhebt2u:571_6: na hyapratibaddhātmanāṃ gavāśvādīnāṃ kvacit tathābhāvadarśane 'pi sarvatra tathābhāvo bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:571_7: puruṣasya tu sarvadā kvacidekabhāvābhāvayoraparasya bhāvābhāvādarśanaṃ yadṛcchāsaṃvādaḥ sambhāvyeta asati pratibandhe /
SA15arhebt2u:573_2: na cāsau vyāptyānvayavyatirekopadarśanamantareṇa khyāpayituṃ śakyata iti ‘
SA15arhebt2u:573_4: pratibandhe hi pramāṇasiddhe satyavaśyameva yatra yatra kāryaṃ tatra tatra kāraṇam,
SA15arhebt2u:573_5: yatra yatra tadabhāvaḥ tatra tatra ca kāryasyāpyabhāvo 'nyathā kāraṇamantareṇa kāryasya bhāve tasyāhetutaiva syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:573_7: tathā yatra yatra yatsvabhāvastatra tatra tadbhāvaḥ anyathā tasya nairātmyameva syāditi vyāptyaivānvayavyatirekopadarśane pratibandhaḥ khyāpayituṃ śakyate nānyatheti prāgeva vistarato vipañcitam /
SA15arhebt2u:575_0: evaṃ kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhilakṣaṇe eva pakṣadharme tatsādhakapramāṇasadbhāvādanvayavyatirekasadbhāvo nānyatreti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- [Hbṭ_205] “iti” eṣa eva svabhāvakāryānupalabdhilakṣaṇaḥ pakṣadharmo 'nvayavyatirekavān pratibandhasadbhāvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:575_1: yataśvānvayavyatirekavān pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇasadbhāvāduktena nyāyena “iti” tasmāt “tadaṃśena vyāpto”'nvayavyatirekaniścayenaiva tadaṃśavyāpterniścayād yathoktaṃ prāk,
SA15arhebt2u:575_2: tataśca tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt trilakṣaṇa eva “trirūpa eva” trividha eva heturgamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo vā yathoktatrairūpyasadbhāve rūpāntarasya vaiyarthyāt yathoktatrairūpyābhāve ca rūpāntarakalpanāyāmapyavyabhicārābhāvenāgamakatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:575_3: kasmāt trilakṣaṇa eva trividha eva heturgamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo veti darśayati “svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārād” iti trilakṣaṇasyaiva svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt /
SA15arhebt2u:575_4: svasādhyadharmāvyabhicāra eva ca gamakatvamiti rūpāntarakalpanā vyarthā /
SA15arhebt2u:575_6: tadanena ‘tridhaiva sa'; ityasya trilakṣaṇa eva “sa heturaḥvinābhāvasya” svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya “niyamād” avaśyantayā sadbhāvāt pratibandhanimittatadaṃśavyāptyanabhyupage (game)ca rūpāntarakalpanāyāmapi “hetvābhāsāstato 'pare” yathoktatrilakṣaṇādapare rūpāntarayogitayā vikalpyamānā hetvābhāsā avinābhāvasya svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya teṣvabhāvādityaparo 'rtho darśita iti /
SA15arhebt2u:577_1: iti tatra pareṣāṃ vipratipattiṃ darśayannāha- “ṣaḍlakṣaṇo heturityapare” naiyāyika- mimāṃsakādayo manyante /
SA15arhebt2u:577_5: abādhitaḥ pramāṇenānirākṛto viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvamaparaṃ rūpam /
SA15arhebt2u:577_7: ekā saṃkhyā yasya hetudravyasya [Hbṭ_206] tadekasaṃkhyaṃ vivakṣitamekasaṃkhyaṃ hetudravyamāśrayatvena yasya hetusāmānyasya tadvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaṃ tadbhāvo 'paraṃ rūpam /
SA15arhebt2u:577_8: yadyekasaṃkhyāvyāvacchinnāyāṃ pratiheturahitāyāṃ hetuvyaktau hetutvaṃ bhavati tadā gamakatvaṃ na tu pratihetusahitāyāmapi dvisaṃkhyāyuktāyāmiti /
SA15arhebt2u:577_9: yadi viruddhāvyabhicāryaparaṃ hetvantaraṃ nopadarśyata iti yāvat /
SA15arhebt2u:577_11: nahyajñāto hetuḥ svasattāmātreṇa gamako yuktaḥ iti /
SA15arhebt2u:577_12: tatraiteṣu rūpāntareṣu yadetabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nāma tat tāvat pratibandhanibandhanānvayavyatirekātmakāvinābhāvasambhave sati tataḥ pṛthaganyallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:577_14: kasmāt pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati? bādhāyā avinābhāvasya ca virodhāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:577_15: tathā hi- satyapyavinābhāve yathokte bādhāsambhavaṃ manyamānairabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaramucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:577_19: satyeva hi sādhyadharme bhāvo hetoravinābhāva ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:577_21: yadi hi satyeva tasmiṃstadabhāvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravarteta tadāsya bhrāntatvādapramāṇataiva syāt iti kuto bādhā? /
SA15arhebt2u:577_23: atra ca sādhyadharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet”? yato bādhāvakāśaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:577_24: tasmādavinābhāvasya pramāṇabādhāyāśca sahānavasthānamavinābhāvenopasthāpitasya dharmiṇi sādhyadharmabhāvasya pramāṇabādhopasthāpitasya ca tadabhāvasya parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇatayā virodhenaikatra dharmiṇyasambhavāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:578_0: tameva virodhaṃ spaṣṭīkartuṃ paropahāsavyājenāha- “pratyakṣānumāne hi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:578_3: tasmiṃśca sādhyadharme satyeva tadavinābhāvitvāddheturbhavaṃ “staṃ” sādhyadharmaṃ [Hbṭ_207] niṣkāsyamānaṃ gale gṛhītvā haṭhāt “tatraiva” dharmiṇyavasthāpayatīti “paraṃ” prakṛṣṭaṃ bata “bhāvānāṃ” sādhyadharmalakṣaṇānāmasvāsthyaṃ vartate /
SA15arhebt2u:578_4: tathā hi- yantradvayaniyantritānāṃ nirucchāvasitayā maraṇameva prāptamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:579_0: paro bādhāvinābhāvayorviṣayabhedādavirodhaṃ darśayannāha- “anyatra” sādhyadharmiṇaṃ parihṛtya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī heturna punaḥ sādhyadharmiṇyeva /
SA15arhebt2u:579_1: tataḥ kuto bādhāvinābhāvayorvirodho 'nyatra bādhayā sādhyadharmābhāvasādhanādanyatra ca hetunā tadbhāvasādhanāt /
SA15arhebt2u:579_2: tathā caivaṃvidhe satyapi avinābhāve bādhāsambhavād abādhitaviṣayatvasya rūpāntarasya sambhava iti /
SA15arhebt2u:580_0: evaṃvidhāvinābhāvopagame satyapyabādhitaviṣayatvādike rūpāntare “hetvābhāsāstato 'pare” rūpāntarasambhavina ityāpāditāṃ hetvābhāsatāṃ vivarītuṃ paropahāsapūrvakamāha- tat kim “ayaṃ” sādhyadharmī “tapasvī” varākaḥ “śaḍḍha(ṇḍha)mudvāhya tasmiṃn” sādhyadharmasādhanaśaktivikalaṃ hetuṃ pariṇāyya sādhyadharmalakṣaṇaṃ “putraṃ mṛgayate?” /
SA15arhebt2u:580_4: na hy ambhastvasya samudre lavaṇatvenāvinābhāve 'pi tavdyatirikte 'mbhasi lavaṇatayā sādhyatveneṣṭe 'mbhastvabhāve 'pi lavaṇatvasiddhiriti /
SA15arhebt2u:581_2: yata eva heturanyathāpi sādhyadharmamantareṇāpi dharmiṇi bhavedambhastvādiṣu tathādarśanāt,
SA15arhebt2u:581_3: sādhyadharmiparihāreṇa cāvinābhāvopagamāt ata eva kāraṇāt pramāṇābhyāmabādhitadharmā dharmītyucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:581_4: yadi pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ [Hbṭ_208] sādhyadharmiṇi hetorviṣayaḥ sādhyadharmo na bādhyate yathāmbhastvasya lavaṇatvam,
SA15arhebt2u:581_5: tadā tasya gamakatvam, nānyatheti / tato 'nyatrāvinābhāvamātreṇa sādhyasiddheranabhyupagamāt na yathokto doṣa iti /
SA15arhebt2u:582_0: siddhāntavādyāha- “tat kim” idānīṃ yadā hetordharmiṇyavinābhāvitānabhyupagamāt sādhyasiddherabhāvāt tatsiddhaye rūpāntaramabādhitaviṣayatvamucyate tadā hetorna kiñcit sāmarthyam /
SA15arhebt2u:582_2: tathā hyatra kalpanādvayam- bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo niyato vā syād? aniyato vā? /
SA15arhebt2u:582_3: tatra yadi pūrvo vikalpastadā sādhyābhāvo hi bādhakapramāṇasya vṛttau niyataḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:582_5: tasmād “abādhāyāṃ” bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve tanniyatasya sādhyābhāvasyāpyabhāvāt “sādhyasiddhiḥ” bhavatyeveti vyartha eva heturiti nopanyasanīya eva /
SA15arhebt2u:582_7: syānmatam- mā bhud bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve hetoḥ sāmarthyam,
SA15arhebt2u:582_8: yadā tu sādhyasya bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ dharmiṇi vartate tadā hetoḥ sādhyasādhane sāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “bādhāyāmapi” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:582_9: yadi bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vartate tadā tena sādhyābhāvasya dharmiṇi sādhanāt punarbrahmaṇāpi tadbhāvasya kartumaśakyatvāt kimaṅga punaḥ śaṭhena hetuneti kutaḥ sādhanasya hetoḥ sāmarthyam? /
SA15arhebt2u:582_10: ata eva hi bhavadbhirabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaramucyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:583_0: atha bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo na niyataḥ tadabhāve 'pi bhāvāditi dvitīyaḥ pakṣa iṣyate tadāpyabādhāyāḥ sāmarthyaviraha iti darśayannāha- “aniyame” bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvasyeṣyamāṇe satīdamāpatitam /
SA15arhebt2u:583_1: na ca- bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt “sādhyābhāvasya ca sambhavaḥ”- iti “na” sādhyasādhane “sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ” satyāmapi tasyāṃ sādhyābhāvasya sambhavāditi tadyogino 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti /
SA15arhebt2u:584_1: yaduktam “abādhayaiva sādhyasiddhervyartho hetuḥ” iti tatrānyathārthamabādhāyā darśayan hetusāmarthyaṃ pratipādayannāha paraḥ- na bādhāyā abhāvo mamābādhābhimatā /
SA15arhebt2u:584_2: kiṃ tarhi? / bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ / sā ca tadanupalabdhiḥ puruṣasya śaktivaikalyāt kvacid deśādau bādhāyāḥ sambhave 'pi syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:584_3: tato bādhānupalabdhimātreṇa sādhyasiddherabhāvāt tatsiddhaye 'vaśyaṃ heturabhidhānīya iti sa hetuprayogasya viṣayastadā hi hetuḥ svasādhyaṃ sādhayan kathamasamarthaḥ syāt? iti /
SA15arhebt2u:585_0: siddhāntavādyāha- kiṃ nu vai heturbbādhāyā yā upalabdhistasyāḥ vibheti na punarbbādhāyā yena bādhāṃ sambhavantīmapyanādṛtya tadanupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iṣṭo bhavataḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:586_0: kadācit paro brūyāt- kiṃ kariṣyati vidyamānāpi bādhā tapasvinī,
SA15arhebt2u:586_1: tadupalabdhireva rākṣasī / tasmāt tata eva hetorbhayaṃ tadabhāve hetuḥ prayoktavya evetyata āha- “sa tarhi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:586_2: evaṃ tarhi paramārthena bādhā kimasti nāstītyetadanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iti kākvā pṛcchati /
SA15arhebt2u:586_3: kadācit paro brūyāt- uktamevaitat kimarthaṃ pṛcchyate? ityāha- “kimarthaṃ prayujyata” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:586_5: paro 'navagatābhiprāya āha- “sādhyasiddhyartham” iti bādhakapratyayābhāve pramāṇyasyeṣṭatvāt tataḥ sādhyasiddhiraviruddhaiveti manyate /
SA15arhebt2u:586_6: siddhāntavādī satyāṃ bādhāyāṃ tadanupalambhe 'pi sādhyasiddhimasambhāvayan pṛcchati “sa kiṃ kvacid” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:586_7: kiṃ punarasau hetuḥ satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayediti sambhāvyate bhavatā yenāsyā bādhāyā abhāvaniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuśca prayujyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:586_8: evametat iti cet; tathā satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyasādhanasāmarthopagame satyabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:586_9: kiṃ kāraṇam? / bādhāyāmapi satyāmasya hetoḥ “sāmarthyāt” sāmarthyopagamāt /
SA15arhebt2u:586_10: taddhi hetorlakṣaṇamucyate yena vinā sādhyaṃ na sādhayediti /
SA15arhebt2u:587_3: evaṃ hi sati bādhāyāḥ sadbhāvasambhave 'pi tāmabhyupagamya tadanupalambhamātreṇa hetoḥ prayogaḥ prāptaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:587_4: yadi hi bādhāmabhyupagamya hetuprayogo nābhimataḥ syāt tadānupalambhamātreṇa bādhāyaṃ saṃśayāt- satāmapi keṣāñcit kathañcidanupalambhasambhavāt- saṃśayitasya hetuprayoge pravṛttireva na yujyeta /
SA15arhebt2u:587_5: tasmād yo yatsaṃśaye 'pi pravartate sa tasya bhāvapakṣamabhyupetyaiva pravartate /
SA15arhebt2u:587_6: tathā ca yathā bādhānupalabdhau tāmabhyupagamya hetuḥ prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāvapi prayujyatām,
SA15arhebt2u:587_7: bādhāyāḥ sadbhāvābhyupagame sati tadupalambhānupalambhayorviśeṣābhāvāditi nānupalabhyamānabādhatvamapi hetulakṣaṇaṃ yujyata iti kuto bādhakapratyayavirahe 'pyasati pratibandhe prāmāṇyasya sambhava iti /
SA15arhebt2u:588_1: naiva hi bādhāyāṃ saṃtyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyamiṣyate tat kathaṃ tadupalambhe 'pi prayogaḥ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:588_2: siddhāntavādyāha- “yadyevaṃ” bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ heturasamartho yadīṣyate tadānirṇīto bādhāyā asaṃbhavo yasya hetoḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ prayogaṃ bādhānupalambhamātreṇa nārhati /
SA15arhebt2u:588_3: kiṃ kāraṇam? / mā bhūd bādhāyāḥ sambhavapakṣe “prayuktasyāpi” hetoḥ sādhyasiddhau “asāmarthyamiti” /
SA15arhebt2u:588_4: pūrvapakṣavādyāha- bādhānupalambhe sati bādhāyā abhāvāt sadupalambhakapratyayābhāve satyavaśyamarthānāmasattvāddhetoḥ sāmarthyam iti cenmanyase siddhāntavādyāha- “kimupalambho bādhām” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:588_5: upalambho hyarthānāṃ kāryam, na ca kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyāpnoti /
SA15arhebt2u:588_10: etacca parairapīṣyata eva; pramāṇatayopagatasyāpyudayakāle 'nupalabdhabādhasya kālāntareṇa [Hbṭ_211] bādhakapratyayotpāde satyaprāmāṇyopagamāt /
SA15arhebt2u:590_0: iti anenaiva nyāyena jñānanivṛttyā bādhānivṛtterityāha- ta- thāpi vyartho hetuḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:590_3: tathā hi- yatra bādhāyā anupalambhastatra paramārthata eva sā na vidyata iti manyase /
SA15arhebt2u:590_4: yatra cāsau paramārthato nāsti tatra sādhaydharmasyābhāvo 'pi paramārthenaiva nāstyanyathā paramārthena bādhāyā abhāvāyogāt /
SA15arhebt2u:590_5: tataśca sādhyadharmasyābhāvābhāve sati bhāva iti bhavanmatyā sādhyapratītervyarthatā hetoriti /
SA15arhebt2u:591_0: atha mā bhūd yuktivirodha iti nopalambhanivṛttau bādhānivṛttiriṣyate,
SA15arhebt2u:591_1: tatrāha- upalambhasya nivṛttāvapi satyāṃ bādhāyā anivṛttāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ tadavasthaṃ hetorasasāmarthyam yadavasthaṃ bādhopalambha iti hetoraprayoga iti kasyābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ syāt? /
SA15arhebt2u:592_1: yata evaṃ vyāptyā hetoḥ sarvatra sādhyenāvinābhāvābhyupagame bahirvyāptāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ vaiyarthyaṃ hetuprayogasyāpadyate tasmāt “svasādhyabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ anyathāpi” svasādhyabhāve 'pyabhavanna'bhāve 'pi ca bhavan heturdharmiṇi kiñcit sādhyaṃ “na bhāvayati” na sādhayati “na vibhāvayati” tadviparītaṃ na niṣedhayati “iti” tasya vidhipratiṣedhāvakurvata “upakṣepaḥ” prayogo “na samarthaḥ” ityavaśyaṃ hetuprayogamicchatā svasādhyāvinābhāvaḥ sarvatra hetorabhyupagantavyaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:592_5: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇenābādhā rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:593_0: yadi nāma bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahāvasthānābhāvādavinābhāve [Hbṭ_212] satyabādhā gamyate rūpāntaraṃ tu kimiti na bhavati? iti,
SA15arhebt2u:593_1: ata āha- “tannāma” ityādi / taddhi tasmād viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ bhaved vastusthityā /
SA15arhebt2u:593_2: lakṣaṇakāraiśca rūpāntaratvenopādānamarhati yasya viśeṣaṇasya bhāve 'pi yasyāparasyābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:593_3: yataḥ sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo na sambhava eva kevale /
SA15arhebt2u:593_5: satyapi hi dharmisambandhe śrāvaṇatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāvo nāsti /
SA15arhebt2u:593_6: satyapi ca cākṣuṣatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāve sādhyadharmiṇi śabde sambandho nāsti /
SA15arhebt2u:593_8: ihāpyevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ced āha- “na caitad” anantaroditamabādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:593_9: satyavinābhāve niyamenābādhāyāḥ sambhavāvdyabhicārābhāvāt kuto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo kṣaṇāntaratvena copādānamarhati? iti na hetoḥ sādhyāvinābhāvino viruddhasya ca sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvino viṣaye bādhā sambhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:593_10: uktena prakāreṇa viparyaye samyaggheturevāviṣaye tu prayogāddhetvābhāsa ucyate /
SA15arhebt2u:593_11: yata evam “iti” tasmānna tadabhāvo bādhāvirahaḥ pṛthagavinābhāvādanvayavyatirekātmano 'nayorhetuviruddhayorlakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:593_13: yataścāvinābhāve sati bādhā na sambhavati virodhāt,
SA15arhebt2u:593_14: tasmāddhetoryathoktalakṣaṇasya prayoge sati gamyārthāyā api pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣaviruddhādīnāṃ sambhavo nāsti,
SA15arhebt2u:594_1: āha- “nāpi” ityādi / hetuprayoge hyasati kevalā pratijñaiva na prayujyate,
SA15arhebt2u:594_3: tataśca śāstrakārairna pratijñādoṣāḥ pratyakṣaviruddhādayo vācyā iti /
SA15arhebt2u:594_4: diṅnāgapādaistu sādhyāsādhyaviparyayeṇa [Hbṭ_213] vipratipattidarśanādaprayogārhasyāpi pakṣasya lakṣaṇavidhāne nyāyaprāptamevāpakṣatva na ni(tvaṃ ni)rākṛtapadena pramāṇaviruddhasyākhyānam,
SA15arhebt2u:595_0: tadevamabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nirākṛtya rūpāntaraṃ nirākurvannāha- “etena” avinābhāve sati bādhāyā asambhavadarśanena “ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣāpi” viruddhāvyabhicāridoṣavipakṣeṇocyamānā “pratyuktā” pratyākhyātā /
SA15arhebt2u:596_0: paraḥ pṛcchati- “katham” iti kena prakāreṇa- yathā bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahānavasthānaṃ tathā pratihetvavinābhāvayorapi?,
SA15arhebt2u:597_1: eko hi heturlakṣaṇayuktaḥ / svasādhyāvyabhicārī kathaṃ bhavati? /
SA15arhebt2u:597_4: yatraiva dharmiṇi sa tallakṣaṇa eko bhavati tatraiva dharmiṇi tasmādanyo 'pi pratiheturviruddhastena hetulakṣaṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ bhavati? /
SA15arhebt2u:597_5: ekasya hetoryat sādhyaṃ tabdādhakasya tadviruddhasyāparasya dharmasya bhāva eva nābhāve bhāvādavinābhāvāditi bādhayā samānaṃ bādhāsambhavena samānaḥ pratiheturiti tannirāsenaiva nirasta iti /
SA15arhebt2u:598_1: “vastutaḥ” paramārthato yasya pratiheturna sambhavati kimasau samyagjñānasya viparyasya vopanyastasādhyaviparītajñānasya vā heturiṣṭo yato vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ tallakṣaṇamucyate,
SA15arhebt2u:598_2: āhosvid yasya pratihetustatsādhyaviparītasādhako na pradarśitaḥ paramārthataḥ sannapīti /
SA15arhebt2u:598_4: yadi nāma purvo vikalpa uttaro vā tataḥ ko doṣaḥ? iti /
SA15arhebt2u:599_3: kasmāt? / aśakyo niścayo yasya vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetutvasya sa tathoktaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:599_7: sa cānupalabhyamāno 'pi kadācit syāditi vastutastadabhāvo niścīyate /
SA15arhebt2u:599_9: nahi tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇe pratibandhe pramāṇataḥ siddhe tannimittāvinābhāvitayā ekena hetunā svasādhye sādhite punastatraiva dharmiṇi tallakṣaṇasya tadviruddhārthasādhakasya pratihetoḥ sambhavaḥ śaṅkayate,
SA15arhebt2u:599_12: viruddhadharmasādhakasambhave ca tasyaiva svasādhyāvinābhāvinaḥ prathamasya tatra pramāṇato bhāvasiddhayayogāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:600_0: syānmatam- yadi nāma prastutaḥ pratihetvasambhavo 'smābhirniścetumaśakyastathāpyasambhavatpratihetutvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvapratipāditaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ kasmānna bhavati? ityāha- “na hyaniścitātmanaḥ” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:600_1: pratipādako yo dharmo hetostasyāniścitasvabhāvasya yasmāt tallakṣaṇatvaṃ pratipādakadharmatā na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:600_3: nāpi sandhigdhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa heturbhavatīti na kaściddheturbhavediti hetvabhāvo vā ityasya samarthanam /
SA15arhebt2u:601_0: syānmatam- yasya pratiyogī dṛśyate tasyaiva pratihetubhāvāt ahetutvaṃ bhavatu,
SA15arhebt2u:601_1: yasya tu pratiyogī heturna dṛśyate sa vastuta evāsambhavatpratihetuḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:601_2: na hi tatra vastutaḥ pratihetusambhavaḥ śaṅkayate,
SA15arhebt2u:603_2: śaṅkayamānapratihetunā tulyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ darśanādarśanamātranimittāvinābhāvarūpaṃ yasya tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ pratihetorbbādhakasya sambhavaḥ sa yeṣāmapi tattulyalakṣaṇānāṃ pratiyogī na dṛśyate teṣvapi śaṅkāṃ pratihetusambhavaviṣayāmutpādayati /
SA15arhebt2u:603_7: nāśaṅkā niḥpra(ṣpra)māṇikā'; iti / atha viśeṣaḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvaniścāyako dṛṣṭapratihetoradṛṣṭapratiyogina iṣyate yataḥ pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkāstamupaiti /
SA15arhebt2u:603_8: tadā sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetorlakṣaṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:603_9: kiṃ kāraṇam? / yatastato viśeṣāddheturekāntena niścayena nirastapratipakṣastathāvidhe dharmiṇi pratihetvasambhavāt svasādhyaṃ niścāyayatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:603_10: yastathāvidho na bhavati tadviśeṣavirahāt dṛṣṭapratihetuḥ so 'tallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt /
