SA15arhebt2u:603_12: hetoḥ kimāyātam, yena tannivṛttaye tatraikasaṃkhyāvivakṣā kriyate,
SA15arhebt2u:603_13: yathoktāvinābhāvavacanenaiva tannivṛtterityāha- “tathā ca hetau” tadviśeṣayogini “pratihetvasambhave” sati “vyarthā” niṣprayojanā “ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣeti” /
SA15arhebt2u:603_14: yathoktaviśeṣāṅgīkarane tallakṣaṇasya pratihetorasambhavāt kasyaikasaṃkhyāvivakṣayā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate? yato 'sya sārthakatvaṃ syāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:604_1: vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetutvasiddhaye ca pratibandhalakṣaṇe viśeṣe hetāviṣyamāṇe viruddhāvyabhicāryapi hetvābhāso na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:604_2: tato vyavacchedyābhāvāt kimekasaṃkhyāvivakṣayā? iti darśayannāha- “ataḥ” pratibandhalakṣaṇaviśeṣopagamāt “viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo hetvābhāsasya yallakṣaṇaṃ taddhīyeta” na sambhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:604_4: hetoryadātmīyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tadyuktayorhetvorekatra [Hbṭ_216] dharmiṇi virodhena parasparaviruddhasādhyasādhakatvenopanipāte sati viruddhāvyabhicārīti viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:604_5: na ca tat pratibandhāṅgīkaraṇe sati sambhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:604_6: nahi tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ svasādhyapratībandhavatyekatra hetau kvaciddharmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyastallakṣastatraiva hetuḥ sambhavet,
SA15arhebt2u:604_9: tadavyabhicāriṇo hetordvitīyasya tatra kutaḥ sambhavāvakāśa iti /
SA15arhebt2u:605_0: nanu yadi tathavidhāviśeṣasambhave sati viruddhāvyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ hīyate,
SA15arhebt2u:605_3: tat kimuktaṃ hetvabhāvo vetyata āha- “na ca” naiva “tasya” viśeṣasya pratibandhalakṣaṇasya,
SA15arhebt2u:605_5: “svarūpaṃ” tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaṃ nirddiśyate bhavadbhiḥ yathāsmābhirnirdiṣṭaṃ yadrūpaṃ “pratītya” pratipadya pratiyoginaḥ ambhavāsambhavāvutpaśyāmaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:605_6: yatra sa viśeṣo nāsti tatra pratiyoginaḥ sambhavaḥ kalpita āgamāśraye 'numāne /
SA15arhebt2u:605_7: yatra tvasti sa viśeṣo vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne tatra pratiyogino 'sambhava iti /
SA15arhebt2u:605_8: yata evaṃ tasmānnāstyeva bhavatāṃ sa viśeṣaḥ- bhavadbhirna jñāyata eva sa viśeṣa iti /
SA15arhebt2u:605_9: tasmāt sarvatra yatrāpi pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatrāpi śaṅkayā pratiyogiviṣayayā bhavitavyam /
SA15arhebt2u:605_11: yasyāpi hi pratiheturdṛṣṭasyāpi prāk praityogidarśanāditareṇa sarvakālamadṛṣṭapratiyoginā na kaścid viśeṣo lakṣyate yaddarśanājjñāyeta ‘
SA15arhebt2u:605_14: tathāpi paścāttatra pratiyogī dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra tattulyalakṣaṇe pratiyogisadbhāvaśaṅkā na nivartata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:606_0: syānmatam- yeṣu pratiyogī sambhavati teṣvaśyameva kadācidasāvupalabhyate /
SA15arhebt2u:606_1: yeṣu tu puruṣāyuṣeṇāpi nopalabhyate teṣvasau nāstyeva /
SA15arhebt2u:606_3: tat kathaṃ hetvabhāvo 'smākam? ityata āha- “na ca” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:606_4: yeṣāmapi hi pratihetuḥ sambhavati teṣāmapi naiva sarvadā tasya pratihetorūpalabdhiḥ pratipattṝṇām /
SA15arhebt2u:606_7: nanu ca yatra sarvadaiva pratipatra(ttrā) pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatra tadāśaṅkākathaṃ kriyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:610_0: sa sarvavyavahāreṣu saṃśayātmā kṣayaṃ vrajet //” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:611_1: tathā hi kasyacideva pramātuḥ kuśāgrīyamateratiśayavatī prajñā pratihetūtprekṣiṇī dṛṣṭāsmābhiḥ yathā vedaprāmāṇyanirākartṛṣu [hetuṣu] saugataiḥ śiṣyaparamparayā kumārilotpādātprāgadṛṣṭapratiyogiṣūpanyasteṣu,
SA15arhebt2u:611_2: tenaiva prajñātiśayaśālinā pratihetava utprekṣitāḥ tatastaddarśanāt yāvajjīvaṃ adṛṣṭapratihetuṣvapi tadāśaṅkā na nivartate /
SA15arhebt2u:611_10: iti / yata evaṃ sarvatra pratiyogyāśaṅkā na nivartate bhavaddarśane tena kāraṇenāniścayaḥ pratiyoginaḥ sambhavāsambhavayoḥ ‘
SA15arhebt2u:611_11: iha pratiyogī sambhavati iha tu na sambhavati';
SA15arhebt2u:611_12: ityevaṃrūpa iti / tasmādvastuto 'sambhavatpratihetutvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ [Hbṭ_218] hetoḥ tasyāniścitatvādekasaṃkhyāvivakṣāvādināṃ na kaściddhetuḥ syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:612_1: iti amuṃ vikalpaṃ nirākṛtya dvitīyaṃ vikalpaṃ nirācikīrṣurāha- “athāpradarśitapratihetuḥ” samyagjñānaviparyaheturiṣṭa iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:612_2: ayaṃ ca pakṣaḥ kila diṅnāgācāryasyāpyabhimata iti para upadarśayannāha- “yathāha diṅnāgācāryaḥ” /
SA15arhebt2u:612_3: kimāha?”yadā tarhi” ityādi / “śrāvaṇatvasya hi na kathañcivdyavacchedahetutvam” iti diṅnāgācāryeṇokte pareṇābhihitam- “yadā tarhi vaiyākaraṇaḥ śabdatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaṃ nityamabhyupagacchati tadāyaṃ śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ hetureva syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:612_4: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavat” ityevaṃ pareṇokte satyācāryeṇoktam- “yadyatra śabdākhye dharmiṇyanityatvahetuṃ kṛtakatvaprayatnānatarīyakatvādilakṣaṇaṃ kaścid vaiśeṣikādirna darśayet tadāyamapradarśitapratiheturhetureva bhavet” iti /
SA15arhebt2u:612_5: tadevāmācāryapādaiḥ sākṣitve datte bhujamutkṣipya śāstrakāraḥ pūtkurvannāha- “idamidānīm” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:612_6: yadā hyācāryasyāpyetadabhimatamiti kaiścivdyākhyāyate tadidaṃ sumahavdyasanamāyātam- gurubhirabhihitatvādaprakāśyam,
SA15arhebt2u:612_9: tat kiṃ gurūn dūṣayāma uta nyāyamapyupekṣāmahe ityubhayamapyaśakyamiti “kaṣṭataraṃ vyasanaṃ kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta?” /
SA15arhebt2u:612_10: na kathaṃciditi / kaḥ punaratra doṣo yenedaṃ kaṣṭataramityāha- “sa tāvadayaṃ” śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo “heturvastūni” śabdādīni svasādhyaṃ tattvaṃ nityatvaṃ “tatprakṛtīni” tadātmakāni “kṛtvā” tacchrāvaṇatvaṃ pramāṇaṃ yeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ mīmāṃsakavaiyākaraṇādīnāṃ tān “abhyudayena” [Hbṭ_219] svargeṇa “niḥśreyasena” cāpavargeṇa “yojayitvā” /
SA15arhebt2u:612_11: tathā hi- vastutattvaṃ bhāvayan yāvat kleśānn prajahāti tāvat svargamāsādayati,
SA15arhebt2u:612_13: athāvā śabdanityatvapratītau vedaprāmāṇyāt tadvihitāgnihotrānuṣṭhānāt svargo vedāntaniṣevaṇādaparvaggaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:612_14: punaruttarakālaṃ “pratibhāvatā” prajñājātīyena vaiśeṣikādinā puruṣeṇa “hetvantarasya” pratihetoḥ “nidarśanena” yadasya “nityatvasādhanasāmarthyaṃ” pratihetvanupadarśane satyāsīt ttatadupadarśanena “utkīlitam” apanītamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:612_16: tāṃśca tatpramāṇakān puruṣān svargāpavargasampadaḥ pracyāvya śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ śaktivaikalyāt paritrātumaśakto bhraṣṭarājya ieva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati svaireva duścaritairiti kimatra vayaṃ brūmaḥ? /
SA15arhebt2u:613_1: yada hyapradarśitapratiheturheturheturiṣyate tadā puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvamabhyupagataṃ bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:613_2: tataśca vastuto na kiñcit sādhanamasādhanaṃ vā prāptam /
SA15arhebt2u:613_3: tathā hi- yadā pratiheturnopadarśyate tadā sādhanam,
SA15arhebt2u:613_4: yadā tūpadarśyate tadā na sādhanamiti puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvamāyātamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:614_0: api ca- apradarśitapratihetorhetorhetutve 'ṅgikriyamāṇe vikalpadvayam- kiṃ paramārthato hetustaddharmabhāvī,
SA15arhebt2u:614_1: utātaddharmabhāvīti? / tatrādyaṃ vikalpamadhikṛtyāha- “sa ca” heturyo 'sau prathamaṃ upādīyate /
SA15arhebt2u:614_2: sa “yadi svabhāvata” eva “tasmin” sādhyadharme “satyeva bhavati” ityevaṃśīlo 'smadupavarṇitapratibandhopagamāt yadīṣyate “tadā kathamanyathā kriyeta” hetvantareṇātaddharmabhāvī kathaṃ kriyeta? /
SA15arhebt2u:614_3: na kathañcit / kiṃ kāraṇam? / vastūnāṃ hetulakṣaṇānāṃ yaḥsvabhāvaḥ- ‘
SA15arhebt2u:614_4: satyameva sādhyadharme bhavanātmakaḥ'- “tadanyathābhāvasya” tadviparyayasya “abhāvād” ubhayośca svasādhyadharmāvinābhāvitve [Hbṭ_220] svabhāvata eva dharmiṇyekatra tayorbhāve viruddhāvubhau svabhāvāvekasya syātām /
SA15arhebt2u:614_7: atha dvitīyo vikalpastadā “ataddharmabhāvī ca” asatyapi sādhyadharme bhavanaśīlaḥ pratibandhānabhyupagamāt “kathamanyadāpi” apradarśitapratihetvavasthāyāmapi “sādhanaṃ” kasyacit? /
SA15arhebt2u:614_8: naiva tadāpi sādhanam, na kevalaṃ pradarśitapratihetvavasthāyāmiti /
SA15arhebt2u:615_1: yata evaṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'nyathā kartuṃ na śakyate,
SA15arhebt2u:615_2: viruddhobhayasvabhāvaścaiko na sambhavati tasmāt paramārthataḥ svena svena sādhyenāvinābhāvinoryathoktalakṣaṇayoḥ kāryasvabhāvahetvoḥ tallakṣaṇasya kāryasvabhāvalakṣaṇasya pratihetorasambhavād “alakṣaṇamekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā” vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:615_5: sa ca pratihetuḥ svalakṣaṇayuktayoḥ kāryasvabhāvayorna bhavatyeveti kathaṃ taddhetulakṣaṇaṃ syāditi /
SA15arhebt2u:615_6: tadevamanayordvayo rūpayoryaḥ sambhavo yathoktāvinābhāvāsambhave satīti rūpāntaropagame 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti “hetvābhāsāstato 'pare iti” ityasyārtho vivṛta iti /
SA15arhebt2u:616_1: avādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ ca kārya- svabhāvahetvorevāvinābhāve sati bādhāpratihetvorasambhavāt vyavacchedyābhāvatvena satyapi liṅgadharmatve tallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavatītyuktam /
SA15arhebt2u:616_4: tacca jñānameva, tadutpāde sati jñāta iti vyavahārāt /
SA15arhebt2u:616_5: na ca tat liṅgasyātmarūpamiti kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? /
SA15arhebt2u:616_6: yadyapi vikalpapratibhāsī sāmānyākāro liṅgatayāvasthāpyate tathāpi na jñānasya liṅgadharmatā /
SA15arhebt2u:616_10: sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpe vastudarśanahāneḥ svalakṣaṇasya kvacidananvayācca taddharmatāmeva tvanusmaranto vikalpā nānaikavyatirekān saṃdarśayanto vastuni paramparayā pratibandhādavisaṃvādakāḥ kāryādiliṅgavyapadeśanibandhanaṃ cetyuktaprāyam /
SA15arhebt2u:617_4: yasmādabādhyasyāpi bāhyatayā vyavasitasyānanuyāyino 'pyanuyāyitayā sāmānyātmakatvaṃ tathātve cāsya vikalparūpatā kutaḥ? yadāha-
SA15arhebt2u:619_0: na jñānasya liṅgadharmatā / etadeva sādhayannāha- “kiṃrūpād” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:619_1: kimātmakāt “hetoranumeyo 'rtho jñātavyaḥ iti cintāyāṃ” prakṛtāyāṃ “pratipattuḥ” puṃso yadavisaṃvādakaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya svarūpamabhidhīyate śāstrakāraiḥ yasya rūpasya darśanādayaṃ pratipattā ‘
SA15arhebt2u:619_3: iti pravibhāgena vyavasthāpya yattatra sādhanatvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyeṣṭārthasannidhānasampratyayāt pravṛttimavalambate /
SA15arhebt2u:619_4: tathā, etasmiṃśca nyāye vyavasthite yadasya liṅgasyātmarūpaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ bhavitumarhati pakṣadharmādivat na tu yat pararūpam /
SA15arhebt2u:620_0: syādetat- jñātasya liṅgasya sādhakatvād yuktaiva sādhyasiddhyupayogino jñānasya liṅgalakṣaṇatetyata āha- “pratipattijanmani” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:620_1: yadyanumeyapratītijanmanyupayujyate jñānamiti tanmātreṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇamiṣyate tadātiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti /
SA15arhebt2u:620_2: tamevāha- “evaṃ pratipattijanmanyupayogamātrālliṅgalakṣaṇatve prameyasya” arthasya “puruṣasya” pramātuḥ [Hbṭ_222] “ādi” śabdāt saṃyogasamavāyādīnāmālokamanaskārādīnāṃ liṅgalakṣaṇatvaṃ bhavet /
SA15arhebt2u:620_3: atra kāraṇamāha- “nahi teṣvapi” prameyādiṣu asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā /
SA15arhebt2u:620_5: yadi pararūpatvājjñānaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati tadā ca yadetadācāryeṇa-
SA15arhebt2u:622_1: tathā hi- niścayo hi liṅgasya pararūpameva /
SA15arhebt2u:622_2: sa cet tallakṣaṇam, jñānaṃ kimiti neṣyate yato niścayo vijñānameva tadviśeṣatvādasyeti /
SA15arhebt2u:623_0: siddhāntavādyāha- “na na kartavyaṃ” kintu kartavyameva tasya niścitagrahaṇasya liṅgarūpapratipādanyārthatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:623_2: pare hi sapakṣe darśanamātreṇāsapakṣe cādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetumicchanti /
SA15arhebt2u:623_3: teṣāṃ naiva darśanamātreṇa sādhyasiddhau samartho heturbhavatīti jñāpanārthaṃ niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15arhebt2u:623_5: sa śyāmaḥ, tatputratvāt'; ityādau / yata evaṃ tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvatrābhāvaviśiṣṭenāsapakṣe ca sarvatrābhāvena sapakṣe tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇabhāvaviśiṣṭena gamako heturityasyārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ lakṣaṇavākye niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyam /
SA15arhebt2u:623_6: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yāveva sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyā niścitau tābhyāmeva heturgamako bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:623_7: na tu yathākathañciddarśanamātreṇetyasyārthasya jñāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:624_2: na rūpāntarābhidhānāya, anātmarūpasya ca lakṣaṇatā na yujyate,
SA15arhebt2u:624_3: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
SA15arhebt2u:624_4: yataḥ tena jñānādinā pararūpeṇa liṅgasya na kaścid rūpaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:625_1: nanu ca pare 'pi sapakṣavipakṣayorbhāvābhāvābhyāṃ gamakaṃ hetumicchanti,
SA15arhebt2u:625_4: ata āha- “tau hi” ityādi / yadyapi pare bhāvābhāvābhyāmeva gamakaṃ hetumicchanti tathāpi sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eveti bhāvābhāvau darśanādarśanamātrato vyavasthāpayanti /
SA15arhebt2u:625_7: tasmād yau ‘hetoḥ sapakṣe eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva';
SA15arhebt2u:625_8: ityevamātmakau bhāvābhāvau tau tadbhāvasya sādhakaṃ yat pramāṇaṃ tādātmyatadutpattisādhanaviṣayaṃ taddhṛttyā voddhavyau /
SA15arhebt2u:625_9: kutaḥ? upāyāntarasyābhāvāt / tadanabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣa eva bhāvaḥ sarveṣāṃ hetumatāṃ bhāvānāṃ sādhyenānugamadarśane sati vipakṣe cābhāva eva sādhyavikalānāṃ sarvārthānāṃ hetuviviktānāṃ upalambhe sati syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:625_11: yata upāyāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayorviśiṣṭayorbhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣaṇe lakṣaṇakāreṇeti /
SA15arhebt2u:626_0: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrādeva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayoreva sattā na prasidhyediti,
SA15arhebt2u:628_0: ityanenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇā niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayorbhāvābhāvayoryat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vṛttiryadyapyākṣipyate /
SA15arhebt2u:628_1: kathaṃ punarniścitagrahaṇamantareṇa bhāvābhāvavacanamātratastaddhṛtteḥ ākṣepaḥ? ityāha- “anyathā” yadi tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttirnākṣipyeta,
SA15arhebt2u:628_2: tadā “tayoreva” sapakṣavipakṣayoreva bhāvābhāvayoryā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā “aprasiddheḥ” /
SA15arhebt2u:628_3: kasmādaprasiddhiḥ? ityāha- “jñānasya” upalabdheryā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvājjñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:628_7: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vināpi “tatsādhanaṃ” tatsattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam “ākarṣati” ākṣipatīti /
SA15arhebt2u:628_8: kiñca, parārthatvācca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttirākṣipyate iti sambandhaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:628_9: kīdṛśaṃ punastacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇamākṣipati? ityāha- “ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ vaḥ saṃvādakaṃ prāpakaṃ” vāñchitasyārthasyeti /
SA15arhebt2u:628_10: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttimākṣipatītyāha- “tadrūpaṃ” tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye pratipattāro na vidanti,
SA15arhebt2u:628_13: yata evam “iti” tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvādeva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvādeva pravartake trirūpaliṅge jñānaṃ siddhamiti yadyapi niścitagrahaṇamatiricyate tathāpi tāveva liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayorbhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau śāstroktau ‘
SA15arhebt2u:628_16: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ- tanmātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti “yata eva iti” tasmātteṣāṃ vādināṃ niṣedhārtho 'yaṃ lakṣaṇe niścitaśabdaḥ prayukta ācāryeṇāsmābhiścābhyupagata iti /
SA15arhebt2u:628_17: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti /
SA15arhebt2u:629_0: kimiti punarddarśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviṣayābhyāṃ sapakṣā [sa]pakṣayoḥ viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvāvanvayavyatirekātmakau neṣyete ityāha- “satorapi” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:629_1: satyapi kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvaciccāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane ‘
SA15arhebt2u:629_3: tathā hi- anvayo nāma sarvatra satyeva sādhye hetorbhāvo [Hbṭ_225] vyāptyā cāsati sādhye hetorabhāvo vyatirekaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:629_4: na ca kvacit sati sādhye hetorbhāvadarśane 'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati,
SA15arhebt2u:629_6: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve satyabhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyamabhāvaḥ,
SA15arhebt2u:629_8: tasmāt pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva yathoktau sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārthameva niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityupadarśayannāha- “tasmāt” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:630_1: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tanna kartavyameveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhavatīti darśayannāha- “yato 'pi”ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:630_5: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetorupanayasyārtho 'vagatastasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
SA15arhebt2u:630_6: pakṣadharmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt tataḥ pṛthagupanayo rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati;
SA15arhebt2u:631_1: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyājjñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam “hantaḥ” tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekācca pṛthaganvayaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:631_2: kiṃ kāraṇam? / ekasyānvayasya vyatirekasya vā prayogādubhayasya gateḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:631_4: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ kartavyamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:632_0: siddhāntavādyāha- “na, hetoḥ” ityādi / nānvayavyatirekayorna pṛthaktvaṃ kintu bhinnarūpataiva /
SA15arhebt2u:632_1: tathā hi- anvayo hetoḥ [Hbṭ_226] sapakṣe bhāva ucyate,
SA15arhebt2u:632_3: na ca tau parasparamākṣipataḥ parasparamantarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayorbhinnasvabhāvatvāt /
SA15arhebt2u:632_4: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yukto /
SA15arhebt2u:632_5: nanu ca yadyanvayavyatirekayorbhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trirūpaṃ liṅgamucyate? /
SA15arhebt2u:632_8: naiṣa doṣaḥ, yato yathānvayavyatirekau vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo (pyete tathā tayo)ranantarbhāva ucyate nānyathā /
SA15arhebt2u:632_12: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstītyekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpamityucyate iti /
SA15arhebt2u:633_2: anyatra prayogabhedād'; iti? ata āha- “ekaṃ vākyam” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:633_3: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktamekaṃ vākyamubhayamanvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇameva gamayatītyucyate 'smabhirnaiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyocyate,
SA15arhebt2u:634_0: atra para āha- “na tu tatraiva” ityādi /
SA15arhebt2u:634_2: sa ca vidyata eva / tathā hi- ‘tatraiva bhāvaḥ'; ityatra lakṣaṇavākye tadarthatayā tadabhāve 'bhāvo gamyate;
SA15arhebt2u:634_3: ‘atadbhāve 'vaśyamabhāvaḥ'; iti cātra ‘tadbhāve bhāvaḥ'; / na hyasati pratibandha ekābhāve 'parasyābhāvaḥ /
SA15arhebt2u:634_5: tataścaikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayorbhāvābhāvapratipādakena prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagaterdvitīyavacanaṃ na kartavyamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:635_4: katham? iti cet, āha- “ekasyāpi vākyasya” kīdṛśasya? /
SA15arhebt2u:635_10: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanamiti na punarekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham /
SA15arhebt2u:635_11: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ propalakṣaṇārthena ca śāstrapraṇayanenāśritajñānasyaiva trairūpyasya pratipādanāllabdhasya jñānasya punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanamastīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktamiti /
SA15arhebt2u:636_0: syānmatam- kevalāvapi tarhyekavākyārthānantarbhūtau parasparama'bhinnasvabhāvau bhaviṣyataḥ tata evaivakavākyārthāntarbhāvādityata āha- “na punaḥ kevalau” ekavākyārthānapekṣau tadantarbhāvamātreṇa sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau parasparamākṣipato 'ntarbhavataḥ bhinnarūpāṇāmapyarthānāmekavākyāntarbhāvadarśanāt /
SA15arhebt2u:636_2: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayorapi tatprasaṅga ityata āha- “niyamavantau ca” sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau “na kevalau” kintu sahitāveva /
SA15arhebt2u:637_0: tadevaṃ sāvadhāraṇena vākyena naiva kevalo 'nvayo vyatireko vābhidhīyate /
SA15arhebt2u:637_1: tadantarbhāvāttu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparāntarbhūtāveva sahitāvekena vākyenābhidhīyete iti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tasmāt” tatraiva sapakṣa eva bhāva [Hbṭ_228] ityanena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate /
SA15arhebt2u:637_2: kiṃ tarhi? / asapakṣe 'bhāvo 'pi, tathā cetareṇāpyasapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi,
SA15arhebt2u:637_3: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyamākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt /
SA15arhebt2u:637_4: tasmād yadānvayavyatirekau bhavābhāvāvabhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāveveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? /
SA15arhebt2u:637_5: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyādevobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na kartavyameva /
SA15arhebt2u:638_0: syānmatam- yathānvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataśca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
SA15arhebt2u:638_1: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśāstrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
SA15arhebt2u:638_2: na tatrāntarbhatam, tato rūpāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “naivam”,
SA15arhebt2u:638_5: kutaḥ? / “paropalakṣaṇāt”- pare upalakṣyante upalakṣaṇa(ṇaṃ) trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmādavyatirekādāgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye 'ntarbhāvāditi yāvat,
SA15arhebt2u:638_7: tadayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānamevocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtamiti na tallakṣaṇam /
SA15arhebt2u:638_8: athāvi(pi) jñānāpekṣaḥ karmabhāvo jñātatvamucyate tadāpi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ jñānamākṣipati /
SA15arhebt2u:638_9: tatastadapekṣo 'pi karmabhāvo 'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkartavyam /
SA15arhebt2u:639_0: tadevamabādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayannāha- “tasmānna hetuḥ ṣaḍlakṣaṇaḥ /
